sìxì yuèyù
wait for an opportunity to break prison
组织越狱
zǔzhī yuèyù
organize a jailbreak
他因越狱罪加刑10年，已经判得很轻了。
Tā yīn yuèyùzuì jiāxíng shínián，yǐjing pàn de hěnqīng le。
Because of his escape from prison, he was sentenced to another ten years in prison, which was less severe than he deserved.
给越狱逃犯加刑。
越狱脱逃。
抓获越狱的罪犯。
to break prison
越狱
His attempted escape from prison was a failure.
他企图越狱的想法彻底落空了。
The stakes of this escaped prisoner is ten thousand.
捉拿这个越狱的犯人的悬赏是一万元。
We created a diversion to escape from prison.
Wǒmen wèile yuèyù，shēngdōngjīxī，fēnsàn zhùyìlì。
我们为了越狱，声东击西，分散注意力。
The break was carefully planned and three inmates escaped.
Tāmen chénggōng de cèhuàle zhècì yuèyù，sānmíng fànrén táole chūqù。
他们成功地策划了这次越狱，三名犯人逃了出去。
The dangerous convict escaped from the prison yesterday morning.
Zhè míng wēixiǎn de qiúfàn zuótiān zǎochén yuèyù le。
这名危险的囚犯昨天早晨越狱了。
He will try to break out of prison.
Tā huì shèfǎ yuèyù。
他会设法越狱。
The last they heard was that he had gone over the wall for two years.
Tāmen tīngdào de zuìhòu yì tiáo xiāoxi shì tā zài liǎng nián qián yuèyù le。
他们听到的最后一条消息是他在两年前越狱了。
Nobody can break out--this prison is high security.
Méiyǒu rén néng yuèyù，zhè zuò Jiānyù gùruòjīntāng。
没有人能越狱，这座监狱固若金汤。
The breakout was carefully planned.
Zhè cì yuèyù shì jīngxīn cèhuà de。
这次越狱是精心策划的。
他已经在这座小城的监狱里当了20年的狱吏了。
Tā yǐjing zài zhèzuò xiǎochéng de jiānyù lǐ dāng le èrshínián de yùlì le。
He has been warder in the small town\'s prison for 20 years.
犯人生病了，狱吏都会找狱医来为他们治疗。
Fànrén shēngbìng le，yùlì dōuhuì zhǎo yùyī lái wèi tāmen zhìliáo。
If the prisoner is sick, the warder will call in the prison doctor to treat him.
为了提前出狱，他买通了监狱长。
Wèile tíqián chūyù，tā mǎitōngle jiānyùzhǎng.
In order to get out of prison early he bribed the prison governor.
他是聚众劫狱的首要分子。
Tā shì jùzhòngjiéyù de shǒuyào fènzǐ。
He is the ringleader in the prison raid.
多年的冤狱终于得到了申雪。
Duō nián de yuānyù zhōng yú dédào le shēnxuě。
The longstanding wrong was at last redressed.

sìxì yuèyù
wait for an opportunity to break prison

cóngjiānyù lǐ táo chūqù

yù zhōng de shēnghuó

典狱
diǎnyù
prison warden
冤狱
yuānyù
an unjust charge or verdict; a miscarriage of justice; frame-up
他害怕自己会坠入阿鼻地狱。
Tā hàipà zìjǐ huì zhuìrù ābí dìyù。
He dreaded being condemned to the hell of Avicinaraka.
在监狱改造多年，他觉得自己得到了重生。
Zài jiānyù gǎizào duōnián，tā juédé zìjǐ dédào le chóngshēng。
He felt reborn after being reformed in prison over several years.
他断狱多年从来没有出现过差错。
Tā duànyù duōnián cónglái méiyǒu chūxiàn guò chācuò。
He has never made any mistakes when handling cases all these years.
他是个惯盗，已经入狱好几次了。
Tā shì gè guàndào，yǐjing rùyù hǎo jǐ cì le。
He is an incorrigible thief and has been to the jail many times.
这名惯贼多次被捕入狱。
Zhè míng guànzéi duō cì bèibǔ rùyù。
This hardened thief has been in jail many times.
你好好改造，出狱重新做人。
Nǐ hǎohǎo gǎizào，chūyù chóngxīn zuòrén。
Try to learn from your mistakes in prison, then make a clean start.
他因越狱罪加刑10年，已经判得很轻了。
Tā yīn yuèyùzuì jiāxíng shínián，yǐjing pàn de hěnqīng le。
Because of his escape from prison, he was sentenced to another ten years in prison, which was less severe than he deserved.
这个监狱的监规很人性化，得到犯人们的好评。
Zhège jiānyù de jiānguī hěnrénxìnghuà，dédào fànrénmen de hǎopíng。
The regulations of this prison are human-friendly, and receive a good appraisal from the prisoners.
听说他的仇人要出狱了，他整天惊魂不定。
Tīngshuō tā de chóurén yào chūyù le，tā zhěngtiān jīnghún búdìng。
He is frightened at the news that his enemy is being released from jail.
他坑蒙拐骗，无恶不做，迟早是要进监狱的！
Tā kēngméng guǎipiàn，wúè búzuò，chízǎo shì yào jìn jiānyù de！
He will be imprisoned sooner or later for committing swindles and every crime imaginable.
他不遵纪守法，终于有一天郎当入狱。
Tā bùzūnjì shǒufǎ，zhōng yú yǒu yìtiān lángdāng rùyù。
He didn\'t abide by laws, and observed discipline but was chained and put in prison one day.
炼狱是个宗教词汇，是洗脱人罪过的地方。
Liànyù shì gè zōngjiào cíhuì，shì xǐtuō rén zuìguò de dìfāng。
Purgatory is a religious word which is a place for people to wash away their sins.
他的这次经历犹如炼狱一般，饱受熬煎。
Tā de zhècì jīnglì yóurú liànyù yìbān，bǎoshòu áojiān。
His experience this time was like going through  prugatory, he had suffered a lot.
这个监狱是专门关押少年犯的。
Zhège jiānyù shì zhuānmén guānyā shàoniánfàn de。
This prison is specially built for juvenile delinquents.
他已经进过好几次监狱了，真是个屡教不改的顽凶。
Tā yǐjing jìnguò hǎo jǐ cì jiānyù le，zhēnshì gè lǚjiào bùgǎi de wánxiōng。
He has been put into prison several times. He is really a bad man who refuses to mend his ways in spite of repeated admonition.
由于官场黑暗，监狱里瘐毙的人很多。
Yóuyú guānchǎng hēi\'àn，jiānyù lǐ yǔbì de rén hěn duō。
Because of corrupt official circles, many people are tortured to death in prison.
由于条件太差，好多犯人瘐死狱中。
Yóuyú tiáojiàn tài chà，hǎoduō fànrén yǔsǐ yù zhōng。
Due to bad conditions, many prisoners died in the prison.
这里的狱卒总是在看守犯人的时候喝酒。
Zhèlǐ de yùzú zǒngshì zài kānshǒu fànrén de shíhou hējiǔ。
Warders here always drink when watching the prisoners.
监狱为防止犯人逃走，在四周的围墙上布满了铁丝网。
Jiānyù wèi fángzhǐ fànrén táozǒu，zài sìzhōu de wéiqiáng shàng bùmǎn le tiěsīwǎng。
To prevent the prisoners from escaping, they have laid iron wires around the prison.
孩子过着地狱般的生活。
Háizǐ guòzhe dìyùbānde shēnghuó。
This child has had a hellish life.
他在监狱中服了3年刑。
Tā zài jiānyù zhōng fúle sānniánxíng。
He served a three-year prison sentence.
基于确凿的证据，他被判入狱。
Jīyú quèzáo de zhèngjù，tā bèipànrùyù.
On the basis of irrefutable evidence he was sent to jail.
刑满出狱后他有所敛迹。
Xíngmǎn chūyù hòu tā yǒusuǒ liǎnjì.
After he was released from jail he lay low for a while.
这所监狱押着几百名犯人。
Zhè suǒ jiānyù yāzhe jǐbǎimíng fànrén。
Several hundred convicts are held in this prison.
锒铛入狱(被铁锁链锁着进监狱)。
缧绁(捆绑犯人的绳索，借指牢狱)。

被警察逮捕后，他直接入狱了。
Her fans have stayed very loyal in the past, but this scandal could really cook her goose.

military/prison slang

One of us has to be the sacrifice and go back to jail.
我们中的一人必须作出牺牲，回到监狱去。
He, in his prison, like a cage, began to howl.

在好似一个笼子的监狱里，他开始号啕大哭。
She was damned to hell.

她被诅咒下地狱。

I was detained for a few hours in jail.

There are currently more male blacks in jail in the US than at university.

目前，美国监狱中的黑人男性数量超过了他们在大学里的数量。
A Brazilian illegal immigrant has been sentenced to 33 months in jail for blackmailing a judge.
Yìmíng bāxī fēifǎ yímín yóuyú lèsuǒ fǎguān ér bèipànrùyù 33 gè yuè。

She\'s bound to end up dead or in jail.

她注定最后不是死亡就是进监狱。

Tāmen chénggōng de cèhuàle zhècì yuèyù，sānmíng fànrén táole chūqù。
他们成功地策划了这次越狱，三名犯人逃了出去。
The prisoners broke from the jail.
Qiúfànmen táochūle jiānyù。
囚犯们逃出了监狱。
During his last period in prison, he was able to escape after a guard was bribed.

在上一次入狱期间，他设法贿赂一名警卫而逃了出来。
She toiled away in prison for more than seven years.
Tā zài jiānyù zhōng kǔ gàn le qī nián duō。
她在监狱中苦干了七年多。
Prisons are filled with bad men who got caught.
Jiānyù zhōng mǎn shì bèi zhuāzhù de huàirén。
监狱中满是被抓住的坏人。
The suspect was bailed out of jail.
Fànzuìxiányírén bèi bǎoshìchūyù。
犯罪嫌疑人被保释出狱。
The prison chaplain came to me in my cell and tried to make a bargain with me.
Jiānyù mùshī láidào wǒ de qiúshì，shìtú hé wǒ dáchéng yí xiàng xiéyì。
监狱牧师来到我的囚室，试图和我达成一项协议。
They would\'ve clapped you in jail in the old days.

要是在过去，他们已经把你关进监狱了。
He called collect from jail to talk to his mother.
Tā cóng Jiānyù bōdǎle duìfāng fùfèi diànhuà，hǎo gēn tā māma shuōhuà。
他从监狱拨打了对方付费电话，好跟他妈妈说话。
He is in prison for committing violent crimes.
Tā yīn fànxià bàolì zuìxíng ér rùyù。
他因犯下暴力罪行而入狱。

这名危险的囚犯昨天早晨越狱了。
The ship\'s captain and crew may even be sent to prison.

这艘船的船长和船员甚至可能被投入监狱。
Now you can use your influence in the big house.
Xiànzài nǐ kěyǐ zài zhège jiānyù lǐ yùnyòng nǐ de shìlì。
现在你可以在这个监狱里运用你的势力。
Well, the school with its rules sounds like a prison.
È，zhège dàiyǒu guīzhāngzhìdù de xuéxiào sìhū jiùshì gè jiānyù。
呃，这个带有规章制度的学校似乎就是个监狱。
More than 70 prisoners were rioting in the prison.
Yǒu 70 duōmíng qiúfàn cānyùle zhècì jiānyù bàoluàn。
有70多名囚犯参与了这次监狱暴乱。
Two screws stood right in front of the prisoners.
Liǎng míng yùzú zhànzài qiúfàn de zhèng qiánfāng。
两名狱卒站在囚犯的正前方。
It is not exactly the storming of the Bastille.
Zhè bù quánshì duì Bāshìdǐyù de tūxí。
这不全是对巴士底狱的突袭。
He has been thrown into prison for debt!
Tā yǐ yīnwèi qiànzhài ér bèi sòng jìn jiānyù。
他已因为欠债而被送进监狱。
In Jefferson Prison inmates are kept in tiny cells, with the bare minimum of furniture.
Zài Jiéfóxùn Jiānyù lǐ，qiúfàn bèi guān zài xiáxiǎo de dānrén láofáng lǐ，jīhū méiyǒu shénme jiājù。
在杰佛逊监狱里，囚犯被关在狭小的单人牢房里，几乎没有什么家具。
A prisoner has been telling a jury how his inmate beat him across the back.

一个囚犯一直在跟陪审团述说同狱犯人如何从背后袭击他。
They kept him in irons until they arrived at the prison.
Tāmen yìzhí bèi kàozhe liàokào，zhídào dǐdá jiānyù。
他们一直被铐着镣铐，直到抵达监狱。
He spent four years in the pen for robbery.
Tā yīnwèi qiǎngjié ér bèipàn rùyù sì nián。
他因为抢劫而被判入狱四年。
As a result, they were transferred to different prisons
Qíjiéguǒ，tāmen bèi zhuǎnyí dào bùtóng de jiānyù fúxíng。
其结果，他们被转移到不同的监狱服刑。
The poor guy opted to go to prison rather than pay his fine.
Zhège dǎoméi de jiāhuo juédìng nìngkě dūn Jiānyù yě bù jiāo fákuǎn。
这个倒霉的家伙决定宁可蹲监狱也不交罚款。

escape from prison

cóngjiānyù lǐ táo chūqù 
escape from prison
在监狱改造多年，他觉得自己得到了重生。
Zài jiānyù gǎizào duōnián，tā juédé zìjǐ dédào le chóngshēng。
He felt reborn after being reformed in prison over several years.
他坑蒙拐骗，无恶不做，迟早是要进监狱的！
Tā kēngméng guǎipiàn，wúè búzuò，chízǎo shì yào jìn jiānyù de！
He will be imprisoned sooner or later for committing swindles and every crime imaginable.
这个监狱是专门关押少年犯的。
Zhège jiānyù shì zhuānmén guānyā shàoniánfàn de。
This prison is specially built for juvenile delinquents.
他已经进过好几次监狱了，真是个屡教不改的顽凶。

He has been put into prison several times. He is really a bad man who refuses to mend his ways in spite of repeated admonition.
由于官场黑暗，监狱里瘐毙的人很多。

Because of corrupt official circles, many people are tortured to death in prison.
他已经在这座小城的监狱里当了20年的狱吏了。
Tā yǐjing zài zhèzuò xiǎochéng de jiānyù lǐ dāng le èrshínián de yùlì le。
He has been warder in the small town\'s prison for 20 years.

他在监狱中服了3年刑。
Tā zài jiānyù zhōng fúle sānniánxíng。
He served a three-year prison sentence.
为了提前出狱，他买通了监狱长。
Wèile tíqián chūyù，tā mǎitōngle jiānyùzhǎng.
In order to get out of prison early he bribed the prison governor.
这所监狱押着几百名犯人。
Zhè suǒ jiānyù yāzhe jǐbǎimíng fànrén。
Several hundred convicts are held in this prison.

监狱。

把犯人押解到监狱。

被押解到监狱

实行最严格防备措施的监狱

He was freed last week from the prison.
他上周从监狱被释放。
He can only imagine the freedom of living outside of jail.
对监狱外边的自由生活他也只能想象而已。
The last time she was in the can, she attacked another prisoner.
她在监狱最后一次服刑的时候，袭击了另一个犯人。
You\'ll end up doing time in the jail.
你会在监狱度过余生。
He never let his jailers break him.
他是永远不会让他的监狱看守弄垮的。
the high walls of the prison
监狱的高墙
Jack often dreamed of home from his prison cell.
杰克在监狱牢房里常常梦见家乡。
in jail
在监狱
the nick
[BRIT] [inf] 监狱
military/prison slang
军队/监狱俚语
Does putting people in prison stop crime?
把人关在监狱里能阻止犯罪吗？
to be thrown in(to) jail {or} prison
被投入监狱
The prison guard was found to have deserted from the post last night.
这个监狱的看守昨晚擅离职守被发现了。
That prison is maximum security and there is no way for any prisoner to escape.
那座监狱处于最严密的防卫状态，犯人不可能逃跑。
Jim\'s commitment in the provincial prison began in 1934.
吉米在省监狱的服刑是从一九四三年开始的。
One of us has to be the sacrifice and go back to jail.
我们中的一人必须作出牺牲，回到监狱去。

在好似一个笼子的监狱里，他开始号啕大哭。

Bǐ ěr bèi pàn zài xiànjí jiānyù fúxíng yì nián。
比尔被判在县级监狱服刑一年。

She\'s bound to end up dead or in jail.

她注定最后不是死亡就是进监狱。

Prisons are filled with bad men who got caught.

监狱中满是被抓住的坏人。
The prison chaplain came to me in my cell and tried to make a bargain with me.

监狱牧师来到我的囚室，试图和我达成一项协议。

要是在过去，他们已经把你关进监狱了。
He called collect from jail to talk to his mother.
Tā cóng Jiānyù bōdǎle duìfāng fùfèi diànhuà，hǎo gēn tā māma shuōhuà。
他从监狱拨打了对方付费电话，好跟他妈妈说话。
The ship\'s captain and crew may even be sent to prison.
Zhè sōu chuán de chuánzhǎng hé chuányuán shènzhì kěnéng bèi tóurù jiānyù。

xià dìyù
go down to hell

They are like twins both in appearance and in behavior.

It is very impolite for you to enter the leaders\' office without permission.
小孩子要从小养成使用礼貌用语的习惯。

Children should nurture the habit of using courteous formulae since their youth.

懂礼貌
dǒng lǐmào
have good manners

She teaches her children to have good manners.
有礼貌
yǒu lǐmào 
be courteous; be polite
没礼貌
méi lǐmào 
have no manners; be impolite
我觉得这么早就走不大礼貌。

礼貌语言
lǐmào yǔyán 
polite language

严刑逼供
yánxíngbīgòng
extort a confession by cruel torture
严刑拷打并未使她屈服。
Yánxíng kǎodǎ bìng wèi shǐ tā qūfú。
Torture failed to make her submit.
他经受不住严刑拷打，只好在花押上签字认罪。

He couldn\'t endure the cruel torture, and could do nothing but sign on the mark.
在一定的历史时期，使用严刑峻法比宽松政策更有效。
Zài yídìng de lìshǐ shíqī，shǐyòng yánxíng jùnfǎ bǐ kuānsōng zhèngcè gèng yǒuxiào。
During a certain period of time in history, severe punishments were much more effective that lax policies.
严刑峻法太多了，大家都很有意见。
Yánxíng jùnfǎ tài duō le，dàjiā dōu hěn yǒu yìjiàn。
People are dissatisfied with so many severe punishments and harsh laws.
车裂是古代的一种最严酷的刑罚。

恶作剧过火，已触犯刑律
Witches had to be burned at the stake or drowned.
必须把巫婆绑在火刑柱上烧死或者淹死。
The weaponeer was sentenced to death for treason.
这个军火专家因为叛国被判处死刑。
缓刑二年
huǎnxínɡ èr nián
two years\' probation
缓刑是一种经常出现的刑名。
Huǎnxíng shì yìzhǒng jīngcháng chūxiàn de xíngmíng。
The suspended sentence is a common title of punishment.
判处死刑，缓期二年执行
pànchǔ sǐxíng，huǎnqī èr nián zhíxíng
condemned to death with the sentence suspended for two years; sentenced to death with a two-year reprieve
缓刑。
to be on probation
[criminal+] 在缓刑中
to put sb on probation
[+criminal] 判某人缓刑
He was convicted of carrying an offensive weapon and got a 28-day suspended sentence.
Tā yīn xiédài gōngjīxìng wǔqì ér bèi pàn yǒuzuì，bìng chǔ yǐ èrshíbā tiān de huǎnxíng。
他因携带攻击性武器而被判有罪，并处以28天的缓刑。
He was placed on probation.
Tā bèi pàn huǎnxíng。
他被判缓刑。
Probation is part of the sentencing process.
Xuāngào huǎnxíng shì liàngxíng chéngxù de yí bùfēn。
宣告缓刑是量刑程序的一部分。
The judge stayed the execution order.
Fǎguān zànhuǎnle sǐxíng zhíxínglìng。
法官暂缓了死刑执行令。
我公安部向国际刑警组织通报缉获国际贩毒集团的情况。
服刑期满
fúxíng qī mǎn
complete a term of imprisonment
他已服刑三年。
Tā yǐ fúxíng sān nián。
He has served three years in prison.
对于法院定的罪刑，他服从判决。
Duìyú fǎyuàn dìng de zuìxíng，tā fúcóng pànjué。
He accepted the judgement of the crime and punishment handed down by the court.
他在监狱中服了3年刑。
Tā zài jiānyù zhōng fúle sānniánxíng。
He served a three-year prison sentence.
犯人对刑事判决不服，可以提出上诉。
Fànrén duì xíngshì pànjué bùfú，kěyǐ tíchū shàngsù。
The convict can make an appeal if he disagrees with the court\'s decision.
严刑拷打并未使她屈服。
Yánxíng kǎodǎ bìng wèi shǐ tā qūfú。
Torture failed to make her submit.

āndǐ Lāsà（Lhasa）

nípúsà guòhé——zìshēn nánbǎo

fall into the water with a splash
扑通一声，他扎进水里去了。

He dived into the water with a splash.

Jack is a broad-minded person who never argues with his friends over trivial things.
经过三轮投票，杰克终于膺选校学生会主席。

杰克是个优柔寡断的人，遇事难作决断。

Jack fell down yesterday and got a big bruise on his face.
杰克隐居山林，一直过着与世隔绝的生活。

Zhèjiàn shì chéngle tā zhōngshēng xǐbúdiào de wūdiǎn。
This affair became the stain that he was never able to wash away.
污点
污点。
不要给自己留下污点。
The stains on the tiles are very hard to rub off.
瓷砖上的污点很难擦掉。
The scandal spotted his career.
这个丑闻给他的职业生涯染上了污点。
It was a small blot on his credibility as a witness in court.
Yígè xiǎoxiǎo de wūdiǎn lìng tā zuòwéi zhèngrén de kěxìndù chūlediǎn wèntí。
一个小小的污点令他作为证人的可信度出了点问题。
He wanted to inflict some brand of disgrace upon the man\'s character.
Tā xiǎng yào ràng zhège nánrén de pǐnxíng zhānshàng wūdiǎn。
他想要让这个男人的品行沾上污点。
They blotted out the stain on the shirt.
Tāmen yǎngài zhù chènshān shàng de wūdiǎn。
他们掩盖住衬衫上的污点。
I did notice someone scrubbing out spots  on the upholstery.
Wǒ quèshí zhùyì dào yǒu rén cādiào shìnèi zhuānghuáng pǐn shàng de wūdiǎn。
我确实注意到有人擦掉室内装潢品上的污点。
He nailed down a spot at Harvard.
Tā zài Hāfó liúxiàle wūdiǎn。
他在哈佛留下了污点。
He managed to wash out the stains.
Tā nǔlì xǐqù wūdiǎn。
他努力洗去污点。
He had a smudge on his cheek.
Tā de miànjiá shàng yǒu yí gè wūdiǎn。
他的面颊上有一个污点。
Can you wash away the spots on the windows?
Nǐ néng xǐqù chuānghù shàng de wūdiǎn ma？
你能洗去窗户上的污点吗？
这块污渍要用强力去污粉才能擦得干净。
Zhèkuài wūzì yào yòng qiánglì qùwūfěn cáinéng cā de gānjìng。
This stain can not be cleaned without powerful cleaning powder.
有效防治污染必须坚决消灭污染源。
Yǒuxiào fángzhì wūrǎn bìxū jiānjué xiāomiè wūrǎnyuán。
In order to prevent and dispose of pollution effectively, we must eliminate the polluting sources.
保护环境，防止污染
Bǎohù huánjìng, fángzhǐ wūrǎn。
protect the environment against pollution
藏垢纳污之所
cánggòunàwū zhīsuǒ 
a sink of iniquity
将贪污分子逮捕法办
jiāng tānwū fènzǐ dǎibǔ fǎbàn
have the grafters arrested and brought to justice
反贪污
fǎn tānwū
combat corruption
反对贪污浪费
fǎnduì tānwū làngfèi
fight against corruption and waste
含硫污水
hán liú wūshuǐ

污染监测器
wūrǎn jiāncèqì 
contamination monitor
省政府派小组进驻县政府调查贪污现象。
Shěngzhèngfǔ pài xiǎozǔ jìnzhù xiànzhèngfǔ diàochá tānwū xiàn xiàng。
Provincial authorities sent a group to the county to investigate corruption.
雷厉风行地开展反对贪污浪费的斗争
léilìfēngxíng de kāizhǎn fǎnduì tānwū làngfèi de dòuzhēng
launch a vigorous, resolute struggle against corruption and waste
按贪污论罪
àn tānwū lùnzuì 
be found guilty of corruption
农药污染
nónɡyào wūrǎn
pesticide pollution
污辱人格
wūrǔ réngé
insult human dignity
环境污染问题日趋严重。
Huánjìng wūrǎn wèntí rìqū yánzhòng。
Environmental pollution is an increasingly serious problem.
贪污分子
tānwū fènzǐ
a person guilty of corruption; grafter; embezzler
荡涤旧社会遗留下来的污泥浊水
Dàngdí jiù shèhuì yíliú xiàlái de wūní zhuóshuǐ。
clean up the filth left by the old society
污染地带
wūrǎn dìdài 
contaminated zone
生活污水
shēnɡhuó wūshuǐ 
domestic sewage
污水管
wūshuǐɡuǎn 
sewage pipe; sewer (pipe)
污水管道
wūshuǐ ɡuǎndào 
sewage conduit; sewer line
法院一审作出判决，认定他挪用公款不能退还的行为构成贪污罪。
Fǎyuàn yìshěn zuòchū pànjué，rèndìngtā nuóyònggōngkuǎn bùnéng tuìhuán de xíngwéi gòuchéngtānwūzuì。
The court convicted him in first instance and confirmed that his embezzlement of public funds without means to return them constituted a crime of corruption.
一个满身油污的老工人
yígè mǎnshēn yóuwū de lǎogōngrén 
an old worker covered all over with greasy dirt
脏污的手
zāngwū de shǒu
dirty hand
脏污的思想
zāngwū de sīxiǎng
dirty mind
与他这种人讲话，我还怕脏污了我的嘴呢。
Yǔ tā zhèzhǒng rén jiǎnghuà，wǒ hái pà zāngwū le wǒ de zuǐ ne。
By speaking to someone like him I shall only be fouling myself.

xuèwū zìrǎn

贪官污吏
tānguānwūlì
corrupt officials; venal officials
这样卑污的念头，亏他想得出来！
Zhèyàng bēiwū de niàntóu，kuī tā xiǎng de chūlái！
How could he have such a nasty thought?
由于防护不当，这件案子的污点证人被害。
Yóuyú fánghù búdàng，zhèjiàn ànzi de wūdiǎn zhèngrén bèihài。
Due to inadequate protection, the main witness to the crime was murdered.
这家公司管理混乱藏污纳垢，已经停业查办了。
Zhèjiā gōngsī guǎnlǐ hùnluàn cángwūnàgòu，yǐjing tíngyè chábàn le。
This company has been stopped for an audit because of its messy management and tolerance of misconduct.
这件工作不要交给他，他只会拆烂污。
Zhèjiàn gōngzuò búyào jiāogěi tā，tā zhǐhuì chāilànwū。
Don\'t assign this work to him. He\'ll just ruin it.
最近污染比较严重，空气中含有大量尘雾。
Zuìjìn wūrǎn bǐjiào yánzhòng，kōngqì zhōng hányǒu dàliàng chénwù。
It\'s severely polluted, there is a great deal of smog in the atmosphere.
地沟堵了，污水流了一地。
Dìgōu dǔ le，wūshuǐ liú le yí dì。
The underground drain is blocked and sewage is everywhere.
由于电子污染，我的手机信号不是很稳定。
Yóuyú diànzǐ wūrǎn，wǒ de shǒujī xìnhào búshì hěnwěndìng。
My cell phone can\'t receive stable electronic signals because of  electronic pollution.
二恶英污染奶粉肉类等食品的事件令人心惊。
Èr\'èyīng wūrǎn nǎifěn ròulèi děng shípǐn de shìjiàn lìngrén xīnjīng。
The reports on the contaminated milk powder and meat are really appalling.
这件新款羽绒服采用的是防雨防污的新面料。
Zhèjiàn xīn kuǎn yǔróngfú cǎiyòng de shì fángyǔ fángwū de xīn miànliào。
This new type of down coat is made of new water-proof and dirt-proof materials.
这个工厂在治理粉尘污染方面下了不少功夫。
Zhège gōngchǎng zài zhìlǐ fěnchén wūrǎn fāngmiàn xià le bùshǎo gōngfu。
This plant paid great attention to dealing with dust pollution.
鸡鸭的浮尸把这条小河污染了。
Jīyā de fúshī bǎ zhètiáo xiǎohé wūrǎn le。
The river has been polluted by floating corpses of chickens and ducks.
这是幅污水处理的工艺流程图。
Zhè shì fú wūshuǐ chǔlǐ de gōngyì liúchéngtú。
This is a drawing of the technological process of sewage processing.
这片湖沼很靠近森林，因此没有受到很大的污染。
Zhè piàn húzhǎo hěnkàojìn sēnlín，yīncǐ méiyǒu shòudào hěndà de wūrǎn。
The lake is very close to the forest, thus it hasn\'t been polluted much.
这个城市的空气污染情况，经过治理已经好多了。
Zhège chéngshì de kōngqì wūrǎn qíngkuàng，jīngguò zhìlǐ yǐjing hǎo duō le。
The air pollution in this city has been reduced and controlled, and now the environment is much better.
农民赖以生存的土地就这样被污染毁掉了！
Nóngmín làiyǐ shēngcún de tǔdì jiù zhèyàng bèi wūrǎn huǐdiào le！
The land on which farmers rely for existence has been destroyed by pollution.
这个官员的贪污罪行造成民怨沸腾。
Zhège guānyuán de tānwū zuìxíng zàochéng mínyuàn fèiténg。
The people are boiling with resentment over the officials embezzlement.
这个县长已经因为贪污受贿而被拿问了。
Zhège xiànzhǎng yǐjing yīnwèi tānwū shòuhuì ér bèi náwèn le。
The head of the county has been detained for interrogation due to corruption and bribery.
玩儿过打仗游戏之后，这群孩子全都满身泥污了。
Wánr guò dǎzhàng yóuxì zhīhòu，zhè qún háizi quándōu mǎnshēn níwū le。
After the play battle, the crowd of children were all covered in mud.
环境污染正在啮噬人类的健康。
Huánjìng wūrǎn zhèngzài nièshì rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？
Wǒmen qiànxià de huánjìng de wūrǎn nièzhài，nándào yào děng xià yídài lái chánghuán ma?
Should the next generation pay for what we have done to the environment?
你不应该平白无故地污蔑他人格低下。
Nǐ bùyīnggāi píngbái wúgù de wūmiè tā réngé dīxià。
You shouldn\'t sully his character for no reason.
渠水的污染给当地居民带来了健康危机。
Qúshuǐ de wūrǎn gěi dāngdì jūmín dàilái le jiànkāng wēijī。
The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.
环境污染是个全球性的问题。
Huánjìng wūrǎn shì gè quánqiúxìng de wèntí。
Environmental pollution is a world wide problem.
由于建筑规划和空气污染等因素，城市的热岛效应越来越严重了。
Yóuyú jiànzhù guīhuà hé kōngqì wūrǎn děng yīnsù，chéngshì de rèdǎo xiàoyìng yuèláiyuè yánzhòng le。
Because of factors such as construction layout and air pollution, the city\'s heat island effect is getting more and more severe.
最近河水的色度有些偏黄，是不是附近存在污染源啊？
Zuìjìn héshuǐ de sèdù yǒuxiē piānhuáng，shì bùshì fùjìn cúnzài wūrǎnyuán a ？
Recently the chroma of the river water is a little yellowish. Does there exist any polluting sources nearby?
空气中有大量的有害微生物，造成了很严重的生物污染。
Kōngqì zhōng yǒu dàliàng de yǒuhài wēishēngwù，zàochéng le hěnyánzhòng de shēngwù wūrǎn。
There are a lot of harmful microorganisms in the air, causing serious biological pollution.
这个海域的水色是红的，肯定是被污染了。
Zhège hǎiyù de shuǐsè shì hóng de，kěndìng shì bèi wūrǎn le。
The color of water in this sea is red, so it must have been polluted.
我们采集了这条河的多份水样，分析发现不同河段存在不同的污染物质。
Wǒmen cǎijí le zhètiáo hé de duōfèn shuǐyàng，fēnxī fāxiàn bùtóng héduàn cúnzài bùtóng de wūrǎn wùzhì。
We\'ve collected several water samples from this river, and analysis shows that there are different pollutants in different reaches.
对于贪官污吏我们要从严惩治。
Duìyú tānguān wūlì wǒmen yào cóngyán chéngzhì。
We must severely punish corrupt government officials.
这些贪污腐化的官员都受到了应有的制裁。
Zhèxiē tānwū fǔhuà de guānyuán dōu shòudào le yīngyǒu de zhìcái。
These government officials led a dissipated life and have all been subjected to the punishment they deserve.
这个地区的土壤污染非常严重，我们应尽早治理。
Zhège dìqū de tǔrǎng wūrǎn fēicháng yánzhòng，wǒmen yīng jìnzǎo zhìlǐ。
The soil pollution in this area is very serious, we should deal with it as soon as possible.
秦桧在历史上留下的污名是永远抹不掉的。
Qín Huì zài lìshǐshàng liúxià de wūmíng shì yǒngyuǎn mòbúdiào de。
Qing hui\'s bad reputation can never be erased from history.
这些淫秽录像是你思想颓废的污染源！
Zhèxiē yínhuì lù xiàng shì nǐ sīxiǎng tuífèi de wūrǎnyuán！
The dirty videos are the source of pollution for your corrupt mind.
这台发动机因为使用年代太久而污损了。
Zhètái fādòngjī yīnwèi shǐyòng niándài tài jiǔ ér wūsǔn le。
The engine is dirtied, and worn from aging.
爸爸要求我下午必须处理掉这些污物。
Bàba yāoqiú wǒ xiàwǔ bìxū chǔlǐ diào zhèxiē wūwù。
My father asks me to dispose of the garbage.
不要总是满口污言秽语，要讲究文明。
Búyào zǒngshì mǎnkǒu wūyán huìyǔ，yào jiǎngjiū wénmíng。
Be civilized, and don\'t use crude language.
再难洗的污渍都难不倒这种洗衣粉。
Zài nán xǐ de wūzì dōu nánbùdǎo zhèzhǒng xǐyīfěn。
This kind of laundry detergent can clean the most difficult smudges.
必须修筑围堤，坚决防止污水下泄。
Bìxū xiūzhù wéidī,jiānjué fángzhǐ wūshuǐ xiàxiè.
We must build banks to prevent the flood from flowing downward.
积极开展阳光工程，又省能源又减少污染 。
Jījí kāizhǎn yángguāng gōngchéng，yòu shěng néngyuán yòu jiǎnshǎo wūrǎn。
We should develop the sunshine project actively, it can save energy resources as well as reduce pollution.
他的鞋上有污泥，所以在房间里留下许多印子。
Tā de xié shàng yǒu wūní，suǒyǐ zài fángjiān lǐ liúxià xǔduō yìnzi。
The mud on his shoes left lots of footprints around the room.
下水道被脏物淤阻了，污水流得满地都是。
Xiàshuǐdào bèi zāngwù yūzǔ le，wūshuǐ liú de mǎndì dōushì。
The sewer is silted up by foulness, and the waste water is everywhere on the ground.
噪声污染严重影响人的身体健康。
Zàoshēng wūrǎn yánzhòng yǐngxiǎng rén de shēntǐjiànkāng。
Noise pollution has gravely affected people\'s health.
治污人员的工作异常辛苦。
Zhìwū rényuán de gōngzuò yìcháng xīnkǔ。
The work for staff controlling pollution is extremely hard.
自来水厂不能建在河流中下游，会污染水源的。
Zìláishuǐchǎng bùnéng jiànzài héliú zhōng xiàyóu，huì wūrǎn shuǐyuán de。
The waterworks should be built at the middle or lower reaches of the river to avoid polluting the water source.
大气污染将直接威胁人类的健康。
Dàqì wūrǎn jiāng zhíjiē wēixié rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Air pollution will directly threaten people\'s health.
日常生活中，微波炉等家用电器的放射性污染不可忽视。
Rìcháng shēnghuó zhōng，wēibōlú děng jiāyòng diànqì de fàngshèxìng wūrǎn bùkě hūshì。
We should not ignore the radioactive pollution caused by home appliances in our daily life.
废旧电池即使没有了使用价值也不可随手乱丢，因为它们会污染环境！
Fèijiù diànchí jíshǐ méiyǒule shǐyòng jiàzhí yě bùkě suíshǒu luàn diū，yīnwèi tāmen huì wūrǎn huánjìng！
Old batteries can\'t be discarded casually even when they are no longer useful, because they\'ll pollute the environment!
政府下令要综合治理水污染。
Zhèngfǔ xiàlìng yào zōnghé zhìlǐ shuǐwūrǎn。
The government gave orders for comprehensive control of water pollution.

wūdiǎn zhèngrén

Zhègedìqū zhēnshìgè cángwūnàgòuzhīdì。

tānwūfǔhuà

Tā yīn shèxián tānwū bèi dàibǔ。
He was arrested on suspicion of corruption.
这里污染严重、环境恶劣，一如所闻。
Zhèlǐ wūrǎnyánzhòng、huánjìng èliè，yì rú suǒ wén。
It \' s heavily polluted here – it\'s just like people say it is.
跟我住的地方比，这里的环境污染程度有过之无不及。
Gēn wǒ zhù de dìfāng bǐ，zhèlǐ de huánjìng wūrǎn chéngdù yǒuguòzhī-wúbùjí。
The environmental pollution here is even worse than where I live.

增资幅度
zēngzī fúdù 
the range of pay raise
本季度的财政收入大幅增加。
Běnjìdù de cáizhèng shōurù dàfú zēngjiā。

大幅度增长
dàfúdù zēngzhǎng 
increase by a wide margin; rise by a big margin
由于生产技术的改进，产量的增加值大幅度提高。
Yóuyú shēngchǎn jìshù de gǎijìn，chǎnliàng de zēngjiāzhí dà fúdù tígāo。
With the improvement in production technology, the added value of the production volume increasesed by a large margin.
大幅度持续增产
dàfúdù chíxù zēngchǎn 
large continuous increase of crops
这幅画给这间屋子增色不少。
Zhèfúhuà gěi zhè jiān wūzi zēngsè bùshǎo。
The picture adds beauty to the room.
增幅高于去年同期。
营业额增幅较大。

这幅画的线条非常柔和。

节省篇幅
jiéshěngpiānfú 
save space
为了节省篇幅，恕不一一缕述。
Wèile jiéshěngpiānfú，shù bùyīyī lǚshù。
For economy of space, I shall not go into details.
文章因篇幅有限，不可能讲得面面俱到。
Wénzhāngyīn piānfú yǒuxiàn，bùkěnéngjiǎng de miànmiànjùdào。
Limitation of space forbids full treatment of the subject.
这篇文章篇幅不太长。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpiānfú bú tài cháng。
This article is not very long.
篇幅有限
piānfú yǒuxiàn
have limited space
报纸用大量篇幅报道了这次会议的情况。
Bàozhǐ yòng dàliàng piānfú bàodào le zhècì huìyì de qíngkuàng。
The press gave the conference wide coverage.
一篇占有整版篇幅的社论
yì piān zhànyǒu zhěngbǎn piānfú de shèlùn
a full-page editorial
限于篇幅，来电不能一一登载。
Xiànyú piānfú，láidiàn bùnéng yīyī dēngzǎi。
As space is limited, it is impossible to publish all the messages we have received.
文章篇幅不要过长。
Wénzhāng piānfú búyào guòcháng.
The essay shouldn\'t be overlong.
报纸用整版篇幅登载了这条消息。
Bàozhǐ yòng zhěngbǎn piānfú dēngzǎile zhè tiáo xiāoxi.
The newspaper gave this story a whole page.
这些诗篇构成了一幅农村生活多彩的画图。

These poems give a colourful picture of country life.
小说篇幅虽短，但明线与暗线交错，内容十分丰富。
因篇幅所限，例句从略
这篇文章篇幅太长。
限于篇幅，小说转载时作了删节
用两版的篇幅报道世界杯的消息。
限于篇幅。
限于篇幅，不再赘述。
这篇散文就像一幅优美的风景画图

似乎有太多篇幅是有关自动驾驶仪的。

削减开支包括大幅降低可自由支配的个人费用，比如约定劳务、旅游和销售费用。
The only practicable solution to the problem is a substantial fall in real interest rates.
Zhège wèntí de wéiyī kěxíngfāng\'àn shì dàfú jiàngdī shíjì lìlǜ。
这个问题的唯一可行方案是大幅降低实际利率。
After the melamine- contaminated milk incident the sales volume of milk headed into a steep dive.
毒牛奶事件后，牛奶销量大幅下降。
Oil prices fell sharply, then rose a little on renewed fear of damage to the oil fields.
Suízhe qìyóujiàgé de dàfú xiàjiàng，rénmen yòu kāishǐ dānxīn duì yóutián de pòhuài le。
随着汽油价格的大幅下降，人们又开始担心对油田的破坏了。
In 1986 and 1987 the real interest rates again became heavily negative.
Zài yījiǔbāliù nián hé yījiǔbāqī nián，shíjì lìlǜ zàicì dàfú xiàjiàng。
在1986年和1987年，实际利率再次大幅下降。
They cut costs to the bone to maximise their profits.
Tāmen dàfúdù jiàngdī chéngběn， yǐ móuqǔ zuì dà lìyì。
他们大幅度降低成本，以牟取最大利益。
The tear devalues the painting.

这处破损降低了这幅画的价值。

The beautiful open country is a painting done by nature.

The picture is small but it shows broad vistas.
这幅画幅宽三米。
Zhèfúhuà fúkuān sān mǐ。
The picture is three meters in width.

Bǎ zhèfúhuà hǎohāo bǎocáng qǐlái。

Zhèfúhuà de bèijǐng shì yípiàn sēnlín。
The painting shows the woods in the background.
这幅画画得不怎么样。
Zhèfúhuà huà de bùzěnmeyàng。
This isn\'t much of a painting.

This painting exhibits a force and vigour characteristic of a master\'s hand.
一幅画
yì fú huà
a picture; a painting

这幅画色调明朗。

这幅画颜色太浓。

这幅画的线条非常柔和。

Bǎ qiángshàng nàfúhuà jiēxiàlái。
Take that picture off the wall.
节省篇幅
jiéshěngpiānfú 
save space
这两幅画有些近似。
Zhè liǎngfú huà yǒuxiē jìnsì。
These two paintings are somewhat similar.
巨幅标语
jùfú biāoyǔ
a huge poster
宽幅布
kuānfúbù
broad (or wide) cloth
这幅画立意新颖。
Zhèfúhuà lìyì xīnyǐng。
This painting shows an interesting new approach.
我国幅员辽阔。
Wǒ guó fúyuán liáokuò。
Our country has a vast territory.
为了节省篇幅，恕不一一缕述。
Wèile jiéshěngpiānfú，shù bùyīyī lǚshù。
For economy of space, I shall not go into details.
文章因篇幅有限，不可能讲得面面俱到。
Wénzhāngyīn piānfú yǒuxiàn，bùkěnéngjiǎng de miànmiànjùdào。
Limitation of space forbids full treatment of the subject.
这幅画描绘了西湖的景色。
Zhèfúhuà miáohuì le Xī Hú de jǐngsè。
The painting gives a view of the West Lake.
这幅画色调明朗。
Zhèfúhuà sèdiào mínglǎng。
This picture is painted in bright, warm colours.
这幅画颜色太浓。
Zhèfúhuà yánsè tài nóng。
The painting is too heavily coloured.
这篇文章篇幅不太长。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngpiānfú bú tài cháng。
This article is not very long.
篇幅有限
piānfú yǒuxiàn
have limited space
报纸用大量篇幅报道了这次会议的情况。
Bàozhǐ yòng dàliàng piānfú bàodào le zhècì huìyì de qíngkuàng。
The press gave the conference wide coverage.
晚霞恰如一幅图画。
Wǎnxiá qiàrú yì fú túhuà。
The evening glow is just like a painting.
这幅画画得真是入神。
Zhèfúhuà huà de zhēn shì rùshén。
This painting is really superb. or This is a marvellous picture.
这个条幅墨色很润。
Zhège tiáofú mòsè hěn rùn。
This scroll is written in dark full-bodied ink.
一篇占有整版篇幅的社论
yì piān zhànyǒu zhěngbǎn piānfú de shèlùn
a full-page editorial
调幅广播
tiáofú guǎngbō 
AM broadcast

zhǎnxiàn chū yìfú zhuànglì de tújǐng
open up a magnificent prospect

píngfú zàoxǐjī

zēngzī fúdù 
the range of pay raise

Zhèfúhuà guà de bú zhèng。

In my spare time, I often imagine my life in old age , in which I lead an easy and carefree life.
这幅画虽然有立体感，但看似有些比例失调。

他在这幅神像的周围又画上了一圈灵光。

一见这幅门联，就知道其字出自书法名家之手。

这幅用碎布头拼制出来的布贴画，可真漂亮！

The cloth-paste painting, which is made of small bits of cloth quilted together, is really beautiful!
经过名家品题，这幅作品显得更有价值了。
Jīngguò míngjiā pǐntí，zhè fú zuòpǐn xiǎnde gèng yǒujiàzhí le。
Having been appraised and commented on by famous people, the piece of work has become more valuable.
这幅作品上还有宋代苏东坡的品题呢！
Zhè fú zuòpǐn shàng háiyǒu Sòngdài Sū Dōngpō de pǐntí ne！
The appraisal and comments of Su Dongpo, a famous poet in Song dynasty, are on the piece of work.
这幅画虽然很古老了，但是品相依然很好。
Zhèfúhuà suīrán hěngǔlǎo le，dànshì pǐn xiàng yīrán hěnhǎo。
Although the painting is old, it still has good appearance.
临行前她送给我两幅软木画作为纪念。
Línxíng qián tā sònggěi wǒ liǎng fú ruǎnmùhuà zuòwéi jìniàn。
Before I left she gave me two cork paintings as a souvenir.
请问：请他写一幅字的润格是多少？
Qǐngwèn：qǐng tā xiě yìfú zì de rùngé shì duōshǎo ？
Excuse me. Could you please tell me how much is for one work of calligraphy.
这幅油画主要是采用了三原色。
Zhè fú yóuhuà zhǔyào shì cǎiyòng le sānyuánsè。
The canvas mainly uses the tricolor.
为了完成好这幅图画，我又新买了一套色笔。
Wèile wánchéng hǎo zhèfú túhuà，wǒ yòu xīn mǎi le yítào sèbǐ。

他在这幅画上稍加改动，感觉就大不一样了。

大幅度持续增产
dàfúdù chíxù zēngchǎn 
large continuous increase of crops
大幅度提高
dàfúdù tígāo 
be increased by a big margin
大幅度增长
dàfúdù zēngzhǎng 
increase by a wide margin; rise by a big margin
工业品价格大幅度下调。
Gōngyèpǐn jiàgé dàfúdù xiàtiáo。
There has been a drastic downward adjustment of the prices of industrial goods.
要想大幅度提高利润就必须在技术上下硬功。

If you want to increase profits by a large margin, you should work hard on technological development.

Xuéxiào shēngxuélǜ dàfúdù yuèshēng。
Our school\'s enrollment quotas have surged by a large margin.

With the improvement in production technology, the added value of the production volume increasesed by a large margin.

贫血。

治疗兔热症会引起不可再生性贫血.

Yóuyú jiājìng pínqióng，tā měiwǎn zhǐnéng shuìzài jiǎnpǔ de zhútà shàng。
Due to poverty, she has to sleep on a simple bamboo couch every night.
他们从此不再贫穷。
Tāmen cóngcǐ búzài pínqióng。
After that they were no longer poor.
贫穷是造成犯罪的原因之一。
Pínqióng shì zàochéng fànzuì de yuányīn zhīyī.
Poverty is one of the causes of crime.
对于贫困地区最好的救穷法不是输血而是造血。
Duìyú pínkùn dìqū zuìhǎo de jiùqióngfǎ búshì shūxiě ér shì zàoxiě。
The best way to relieve a poor area is not to give transfusions, but to help them produce blood.
贫穷
贫穷。
家境贫穷
贫穷落后的地区。
科技扶贫是救穷的好办法。
to initiate, litigation informa pauperis
作为一个(可免交诉讼费用的)贫穷起诉人提出诉讼
to languish in poverty
为贫穷所困
I can do nothing else than admire people so poor that they go on smiling like if they were the richest of the world.
我敬佩这些人，尽管贫穷但他们仍保持微笑，就好像自己是世界上最富有的人一样。
A new proposal to help the fight against poverty has been advanced yesterday during the meeting.
昨天的会议上提出了一个消灭贫穷的新建议。
In poor countries, one in every hundred of children has a chance at university education.
在贫穷国家，平均每一百个孩子中只有一个能有机会上大学。
The rivers of blood still run deep in many poor countries involved in civil war.
在很多卷入内战的贫穷国家，血流成河仍是屡见不鲜。
She devoted her life to fighting poverty.
她一生都在与贫穷作斗争。
The Prime Minister toured the poorest area of Liverpool.
首相巡视了利物浦最贫穷的地区。
Some people living in extremely poor area can\'t get adequate food supply.
有些生活在极度贫穷地区人得不到足够的食物。
Poverty remains a considerable problem in many parts of the world.
在世界很多地方，贫穷仍是一个亟待重视的问题。
They scraped out a meager existence from the small plot of land.
他们靠一小块土地过着贫穷的生活。
Some people believe poverty provides the soil for crime.
一些人认为贫穷滋生犯罪。
Poverty encourages crime.
贫穷滋生犯罪。
The contemporary writers of Shakespeare were much poorer than him.
和莎士比亚同时代的作家都比要他贫穷许多。
The poor condition of his family disposes him to committing theft.
他贫穷的家境使他走上了偷窃的道路。
He used to be rich, but eventually resulted in poverty.
他曾经很富有，但最终陷入了贫穷的泥沼。
The old man is actually generous to the needy.
这位平凡的老人对贫穷的人很慷慨。
Nudity and topless bathing are still taboo in poor Balkan countries.
全身或半裸游泳在贫穷的巴尔干半岛国家仍然是被禁止的。
The Great Depression forced families into poverty.
Dà xiāotiáo shǐ jiātíng xiànrù pínqióng。
大萧条使家庭陷入贫穷。
Corruption and of abuse of the government against the people is extremely common in some poorer countries.
Zhèngfǔ wéifǎn rénmín dàzhòng de lìyì，fǔbài qiě lànyòng quánlì，zhè zài yìxiē jiào pínqióng de guójiā shì jíwéi pǔbiàn de xiànxiàng。
政府违反人民大众的利益，腐败且滥用权力，这在一些较贫穷的国家是极为普遍的现象。
Most poorer countries are 50 years behind the developed countries.
Dàbùfèn pínqióng guójiā bǐ fādá guójiā luòhòu 50 nián。
大部分贫穷国家比发达国家落后50年。
Poverty does not prevent kids from booting a ball around in the playground or on the streets.
Pínqióng méiyǒu zǔzhǐ háizǐmen zài cāochǎng shàng huò jiēdào shàng tīqiú。
贫穷没有阻止孩子们在操场上或街道上踢球。
The figure of the impoverished poet is a commonplace in literature.
Zhège pínqióng shīrén de xíngxiàng shì wénxuéshǐ shàng lǎoshēngchángtán de dōngxi。
这个贫穷诗人的形象是文学史上老生常谈的东西。
The conventional view of poverty is based solely on the distribution of net incomes.
Guānyú pínqióng de chuántǒng guāndiǎn jǐnjǐn shì jīyú jìngshōurù de fēnpèi。
关于贫穷的传统观点仅仅是基于净收入的分配。
It is a bit like a rich person living in a wealthy neighborhood not seeing any poverty.
Yǒudiǎn xiàng yí gè zhùzài fùrénqū yǒuqiánrén，kàn bù chū rènhé pínqióng。
有点像一个住在富人区有钱人，看不出任何贫穷。
The goal of the World Bank is to promote growth in poor countries.
Shìjièyínháng de mùbiāo shì tuīdòng pínqióng guójiā fāzhǎn。
世界银行的目标是推动贫穷国家发展。
Poverty was an attribute of the working classes in England
Zài yīngguó ，pínqióng shì gōngrénjiējí de dàimíngcí。
在英国，贫穷是工人阶级的代名词。
He had risen from rags to riches and fallen into rags again.
Tā céngjīng yóu chìpín biànwéi jùfù，yòu huídào pínqióng zhuàngtài。
他曾经由赤贫变为巨富，又回到贫穷状态。
Glad you were not ground down by illness or poverty.
Hěn gāoxìng nǐ méiyǒu bèi jíbìng huò pínqióng zhémó。
很高兴你没有被疾病或贫穷折磨。
Luxury and poverty have always existed side by side.
Shēhuá hé pínqióng jīngcháng xiānghù zhīchízhe cúnzài。
奢华和贫穷经常相互支持着存在。
The poverty of a district is an obstacle to good education.
Qūyùxìng de pínqióng zǔ\'ài shíxiàn liánghǎo jiàoyù。
区域性的贫穷阻碍实现良好教育。
Migrants are likely to be poor and underemployed.
Yímínmen hěn kěnéng pínqióng、jiùyè bùzú。
移民们很可能贫穷、就业不足。
Much poverty can be traced to the underdevelopment of industry.
Pínqióng de hěn dà yuányīn shì gōngyè bù fādá。
贫穷的很大原因是工业不发达。
The dominant character of the cityscape is its poverty.
Zhège chéngshì zuì xiānmíng de tèzhēng jiùshì pínqióng。
这个城市最鲜明的特征就是贫穷。
They studied forerunners of richness or poverty.
Tāmen yánjiūle fùyǒu huò pínqióng de xiānzhào。
他们研究了富有或贫穷的先兆。
&quot;Rich&quot; and &quot;hard-up&quot; are contrastive terms.
“fùyǒu”hé“pínqióng”shì duìbǐ guānxi shùyǔ。

Pínqióng de shēnghuó shǐ tāmen shīdiàole rénxìng。
贫穷的生活使他们失掉了人性。

来自贫穷环境的孩子，他们身上显示出漠不关心、道德堕落和漠视法律的家庭生活模式。
The richness all around unsettled him for he had expected to find poverty.
Zhōuwéi de fùrén ràng tā gǎndào bù\'ān，yīnwèi tā yuán xiǎng zhèli hěn pínqióng。
周围的富人让他感到不安，因为他原想这里很贫穷。
Their indigence appalled him.
Tāmen de pínqióng ràng tā zhènjīng。
他们的贫穷让他震惊。
他说话幽默而不贫气。
他衣着朴素，但一点儿也不贫气
这身衣服华丽中却透着贫气。
他在戏里扮一位老贫农。
Tā zài xìlǐ bàn yíwèi lǎo pínnóng。
In the opera he plays the part of an old poor peasant.
我们家三代都是贫农，到了我这一代才有所好转。
Wǒmen jiā sān dài dōushì pínnóng，dào le wǒ zhè yídài cái yǒusuǒ hǎozhuǎn。
Three generations of our family have all been poor peasants, things have turned out better when it comes to me.
这些贫农们认为庄头是地主的走狗。

These poor farmers consider land managers the servile followers of land owners.
爷爷是贫下中农，我是贫下中农的后代。
Yéye shì pínxià zhōng nóng，wǒ shì pínxià zhōng nóng de hòudài。
My grandpa is a poor, lower-middle class peasant, so I am a descendant of poor and lower-middle class peasants.
在这部关于清代农奴们贫苦生活的电影中，我扮演的是剥削农奴的农奴主。
Zài zhèbù guānyú Qīngdài nóngnúmen pínkǔ shēnghuó de diànyǐng zhōng，wǒ bànyǎn de shì bōxuē nóngnú de nóngnúzhǔ。
In this film about serfs\' poor lives in the Qing Dynasty ,I played a serf owner exploiting the serfs.

Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.

贫困化
pínkùnhuà

Because his family was poor, he was given to others as their child when he was born.
贫困的他已经鹑衣百结了。

Poverty has driven him to dress in rags.

The theme of this session is poverty in Eastern Africa.
一向俭约的王大爷为贫困儿童捐献了一万元。
Yí xiàng jiǎnyuē de Wáng dàye wèi pínkùn értóng juānxiàn le yíwàn yuán。
Grandpa Wang, who leads a frugal life, donated ten thousand yuan to poor children.
他的一生贫困潦倒，非常蹇滞。
Tā de yìshēng pínkùn liáodǎo，fēicháng jiǎnzhì。
All through his life, he has been poverty-stricken and unfortunate.
国家要为贫困生排难解忧。
Guójiā yào wèi pínkùnshēng páinán jiěyōu。

The best way to relieve a poor area is not to give transfusions, but to help them produce blood.

I used to be a poor Confucian scholar.
因为过于贫困，他的生活一直过得很郁抑。
Yīnwéi guòyú pínkùn，tā de shēnghuó yìzhí guò de hěn yùyì。
Due to extreme poverty, his life has always been quite depressing.
贫困生们领到了助学金后都不再为学费发愁了。
Pínkùnshēngmen lǐngdào le zhùxuéjīn hòu dōu búzài wèi xuéfèi fāchóu le。
After receiving the grant, the poor students stopped worrying about their tuitions.
他家的生活水平一直都在贫困线以下。

Poverty does not prevent kids from booting a ball around in the playground or on the streets.
Pínqióng méiyǒu zǔzhǐ háizǐmen zài cāochǎng shàng huò jiēdào shàng tīqiú。
贫穷没有阻止孩子们在操场上或街道上踢球。
Boys from a deprived environment, wherein the family life revealed a pattern of neglect, moral degradation, and disregard for law.
Láizì pínqióng huánjìng de háizi，tāmen shēnshàng xiǎnshì chū mòbùguānxīn、 dàodé duòluò hé mòshì fǎlǜ de jiātíng shēnghuó móshì。
来自贫穷环境的孩子，他们身上显示出漠不关心、道德堕落和漠视法律的家庭生活模式。
贫病交加。
在贫病交加中弃世。
你既然选择了这个清贫的行业，就要安贫乐道。
Nǐ jìrán xuǎnzé le zhège qīngpín de hángyè，jiùyào ānpín lèdào。
Now then you have chosen this poor industry, you should be content with it .
爷爷是贫下中农，我是贫下中农的后代。
Yéye shì pínxià zhōng nóng，wǒ shì pínxià zhōng nóng de hòudài。
My grandpa is a poor, lower-middle class peasant, so I am a descendant of poor and lower-middle class peasants.
他帮扶过不少贫困家庭脱贫致富。
Tā bāngfú guò bùshǎo pínkùn jiātíng tuōpín zhìfù。
He has helped to lift many poor families out of poverty.
摆脱贫穷落后的状态
bǎituō pínqióng luòhòu de zhuàngtài 
be lifted out of poverty and backwardness
他在戏里扮一位老贫农。
Tā zài xìlǐ bàn yíwèi lǎo pínnóng。
In the opera he plays the part of an old poor peasant.
极端贫困
jíduān pínkùn 
in dire poverty
家境贫寒
jiājìngpínhán 
with one\'s family in straitened circumstances
贫富两极分化
pín fù liǎngjí fēnhuà
the polarity between rich and poor
受贫穷奴役
shòu pínqiónɡ núyì
be enslaved by poverty
贫富不均
pín fù bù jūn
unequal distribution of wealth
他的嘴真贫。
Tā de zuǐ zhēn pín。
He is really too garrulous.
经验贫乏
jīngyàn pínfá
lack experience
语言贫乏
yǔyán pínfá
flat, monotonous language
贫寒人家
pínhán rénjiā
an impoverished family
矿石贫化
kuàngshí pínhuà
ore dilution
贫瘠的土壤
pínjí de tǔrǎng
poor soil; impoverished soil
贫苦无告
pínkǔ wú gào
miserably poor and friendless
贫红铁矿
pín hóngtiěkuàng
low-grade red iron ore
生活贫困
shēnɡhuó pínkùn
live in poverty
贫困化
pínkùnhuà
pauperization
城市贫民
chénɡshì pínmín
the urban poor
再生障碍性贫血
zàishēngzhàng\'àixìngpínxuè
aplastic anaemia
贫油国
pínyóuɡuó
an oil-poor country
家道清贫
jiādào qīngpín
be a person of scanty means
贫富悬殊
pínfù xuánshū
a wide gap between the rich and the poor
贫(富)者
pín(fù)zhě
the poor (rich)
贫寒
pínhán
poor; poverty-stricken
贫贱
pínjiàn
poor and lowly; in straitened and humble circumstances
贫油
pínyóu
oil-poor
他几十年如一日，总是这么安贫乐道的。
Tā jǐ shí nián rú yí rì，zǒng shì zhème ānpínlèdào de。
He calmly lives a simple life, which he devotes to the pursuit of wisdom, and he has been that way for over ten years.
都说家贫出孝子，其实也不尽然。
Dōu shuō jiāpín chū xiàozǐ，qíshí yě bújìnrán。
It is said that dutiful sons come from poor families, which is not necessarily the case.
在这个区居住的大部分人都是城市贫民。
Zài zhège qū jūzhù de dà bùfen rén dōushì chéngshì pínmín。
Most residents in this district are urban pauper.
由于家境贫困，他刚出生就被出继给别人。
Yóuyú jiājìng pínkùn，tā gāng chūshēng jiù bèi chūjì gěi biérén。
Because his family was poor, he was given to others as their child when he was born.
贫困的他已经鹑衣百结了。
Pínkùn de tā yǐjing chúnyī bǎijié le。
Poverty has driven him to dress in rags.
大农业体系的建立，使这个地区的农民很快脱贫致富。
Dànóngyè tǐxì de jiànlì，shǐ zhège dìqū de nóngmín hěnkuài tuōpín zhìfù。
Farmers in this region quickly got rid of poverty and became better off after the establishment of the agricultural economic system.
本校的大多数贫困生都领到了贷学金。
Běnxiào de dàduōshù pínkùnshēng dōu lǐngdào le dàixuéjīn。
Many needy students in the school have gotten student loan.
这次会议的主要议题就是东非的贫困问题。
Zhècì huìyì de zhǔyào yìtí jiùshì dōngfēi de pínkùn wèntí。
The theme of this session is poverty in Eastern Africa.
别看他平常喜欢犯贫，可一见了女孩儿就说不出话来了。
Bié kàn tā píngcháng xǐhuan fànpín，kě yíjiàn le nǚháir jiù shuōbùchūhuà lái le。
Though normally quick-tongued, he becomes speechless in front of girls.
这些富豪们仍不忘扶贫济困。
Zhèxiē fùháomen réng búwàng fúpínjìkùn。
This group of rich people never forget to help the needy.
封建社会贫民是被禁止进入皇庄的。
Fēngjiàn shèhuì pínmín shì bèi jìnzhǐ jìnrù huángzhuāng de。
In feudal society poor people were forbidden to enter the imperial country estate.
此地贫富差距较大，已经进入了黄灯区。
Cǐdì pínfù chājù jiàodà，yǐjing jìnrù le huángdēngqū。
The gap between the poor and the rich is very large in this area, and has already entered the yellow light region.
他从小就立下悬壶济世，救助贫病的宏愿。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù lìxià xuánhújìshì，jiùzhù pínbìng de hóngyuàn。
From a young age he has aspired to learn medicine well and cure the sick.
他因家贫无力养活家口，妻子带着三个孩子随岳父远去他乡。
Tā yīn jiāpín wúlì yǎnghuó jiākǒu，qīzǐ dài zhe sāngè háizi suí yuèfù yuǎnqù tāxiāng。
Because of his incapability of supporting his family, his wife took their three children together with her father and went far away.
他幼时家况贫寒，吃了很多的苦，现在生活终于有所好转。
Tā yòushí jiākuàng pínhán，chī le hěnduō de kǔ，xiànzài shēnghuó zhōng yú yǒusuǒ hǎozhuǎn。
When he was a child, he had many hardships, due to the  poor financial situation of his family, but now it is much better.
一向俭约的王大爷为贫困儿童捐献了一万元。
Yí xiàng jiǎnyuē de Wáng dàye wèi pínkùn értóng juānxiàn le yíwàn yuán。
Grandpa Wang, who leads a frugal life, donated ten thousand yuan to poor children.
他的一生贫困潦倒，非常蹇滞。
Tā de yìshēng pínkùn liáodǎo，fēicháng jiǎnzhì。
All through his life, he has been poverty-stricken and unfortunate.
国家要为贫困生排难解忧。
Guójiā yào wèi pínkùnshēng páinán jiěyōu。
The state must help relieve the students\'financial burdens.
他的慷慨令人惊服，很多贫苦的学生都得到他的资助。
Tā de kāngkǎi lìngrén jīngfú，hěnduō pínkǔ de xuésheng dōu dédào tā de zīzhù。
His generosity impressed and shocked many people, and many poor students have gained his finacial support.
对于贫困地区最好的救穷法不是输血而是造血。
Duìyú pínkùn dìqū zuìhǎo de jiùqióngfǎ búshì shūxiě ér shì zàoxiě。
The best way to relieve a poor area is not to give transfusions, but to help them produce blood.
现在有一种观点强调用累进税来调节贫富差距。
Xiànzài yǒu yìzhǒng guāndiǎn qiángdiào yòng lěijìnshuì lái tiáojié pínfù chāijù。
Now there is one opinion which seeks to adjust the gap between the rich and poor through progressive taxation.
在这部关于清代农奴们贫苦生活的电影中，我扮演的是剥削农奴的农奴主。
Zài zhèbù guānyú Qīngdài nóngnúmen pínkǔ shēnghuó de diànyǐng zhōng，wǒ bànyǎn de shì bōxuē nóngnú de nóngnúzhǔ。
In this film about serfs\' poor lives in the Qing Dynasty ,I played a serf owner exploiting the serfs.
他家虽然蓬户瓮牖、生活贫苦，但在买书方面从来都很舍得花钱。
Tā jiā suīrán pénghù wèngyǒu、shēnghuó pínkǔ，dàn zài mǎishū fāngmiàn cónglái dōu hěnshědé huāqián。
Although his family has a humble house and lives in poverty, they don’t begrudge money spent on books.
贫道脱离尘世，现在在武当山隐居。
Píndào tuōlí chénshì，xiànzài zài Wǔdāngshān yǐnjū。
I am isolated from mortal life, and lead a monastic life on Mt. Wudang.
生活在贫民窟里的儿童，会有快乐的童年吗？
Shēnghuó zài pínmínkū lǐ de értóng，huì yǒu kuàilè de tóngnián ma？
Will the children living in the slum have a happy childhood?
我们家三代都是贫农，到了我这一代才有所好转。
Wǒmen jiā sān dài dōushì pínnóng，dào le wǒ zhè yídài cái yǒusuǒ hǎozhuǎn。
Three generations of our family have all been poor peasants, things have turned out better when it comes to me.
贫僧自幼出家，在少林寺修道。
Pínsēng zì yòu chūjiā，zài shàolínsì xiūdào。
I entered into religion and have practiced doctrine in the Shaolin Temple since my childhood.
他总是贫嘴薄舌地挖苦人家，人家怎能高兴呢？
Tā zǒngshì pínzuǐ bóshé de wākǔ rénjia，rénjia zěnnéng gāoxìng ne？
He is always annoyingly garrulous and sharp-tongued towards everyone, how could anyone be happy?
他因家境贫穷而不得不弃学回家。
Tā yīn jiājìng pínqióng ér bùdébùqìxué huíjiā。
He cannot help dropping out of school, because his family is poor.
我本是一个贫困的儒生，并不富裕。
Wǒ běn shì yígè pínkùn de rúshēng，bìngbú fùyù。
I used to be a poor Confucian scholar.
据说这伙强盗专门杀富济贫。
Jùshuō zhè huǒ qiángdào zhuānmén shāfùjìpín。
It was said that this group of bandits just killed the cruel rich to help the poor.
做人不能太势利眼了，嫌贫爱富的人让人痛恨。
Zuò rén bùnéng tài shìlìyǎn le，xiánpín àifù de rén ràng rén tònghèn。
One shouldn\'t be too snobbish, as snobs are hated by all people.
扶贫济困是习武之人最基本的武德。
Fúpín jìkùn shì x wǔ zhī rén zuì jīběn de wǔdé。
The basic virtue of a swordsman is to help the weak and the poor.
这次扶贫选项关系民生，一定要慎重啊！
Zhècì fúpín xuǎn xiàng guānxì mínshēng，yídìng yào shènzhòng a！
This poverty alleviation program concerns people\'s livelihood. We must be cautious!
医疗队下乡给很多贫苦的人免费治病。
Yīliáoduì xiàxiāng gěi hěnduō pínkǔ de rén miǎnfèi zhìbìng。
The medical team went to the countryside to treat diseases for free for many poor people.
虽然张家家境贫寒，却是前朝皇室遗族。
Suīrán zhāng jiā jiājìng pínhán，quèshì qiáncháo huángshì yízú。
Although Xiao Zhang\'s family is poor, they are descended from royalty.
我国东南部沿海属于贫油区，不产石油。
Wǒ guó dōngnánbùyánhǎi shǔyú pínyóuqū，bùchǎn shíyóu。
The south-east coastal region of our country is poor in oil resources and doesn\'t have any petroleum.
土地经过多年轮种变的贫瘠，需要补充有机质。
Tǔdì jīngguò duōnián lúnzhòng biàn de pínjí，xūyào bǔchōng yǒujīzhì。
After several years of crop rotation, the land became infertile and needed to be supplemented with organic matter.
因为过于贫困，他的生活一直过得很郁抑。
Yīnwéi guòyú pínkùn，tā de shēnghuó yìzhí guò de hěn yùyì。
Due to extreme poverty, his life has always been quite depressing.
由于家境贫穷，她每晚只能睡在简朴的竹榻上。
Yóuyú jiājìng pínqióng，tā měiwǎn zhǐnéng shuìzài jiǎnpǔ de zhútà shàng。
Due to poverty, she has to sleep on a simple bamboo couch every night.
贫困生们领到了助学金后都不再为学费发愁了。
Pínkùnshēngmen lǐngdào le zhùxuéjīn hòu dōu búzài wèi xuéfèi fāchóu le。
After receiving the grant, the poor students stopped worrying about their tuitions.
这些贫农们认为庄头是地主的走狗。
Zhèxiē pínnóngmen rènwéi zhuāngtóu shì dìzhǔ de zǒugǒu。
These poor farmers consider land managers the servile followers of land owners.
他们用贫苦百姓的钱修了这座宏大的庄院。
Tāmen yòng pínkǔ bǎixìng de qián xiū le zhèzuò hóngdà de zhuāngyuàn。
They built this magnificent courtyard with the money of the poor.
他家的生活水平一直都在贫困线以下。
Tājiā de shēnghuó shuǐpíng yìzhí dōu zài pínkùnxiàn yǐxià。
The living standard of his family is always below the poverty line.
我们终于摆脱了贫困。
Wǒmen zhōngyú bǎituōle pínkùn。
We have finally broken free from poverty.
一个从赤贫走向成功的商业奇才
yígè cóng chìpín zǒuxiàng chénggōngde shāngyèqícái
a commercial genius who rose from utter destitution to success

Tāmen cóngcǐ búzài pínqióng。
After that they were no longer poor.

In big cities there\'s a huge gap between the rich and the poor.
人们担心，贫富不均可能会引起社会动荡。

我敬佩这些人，尽管贫穷但他们仍保持微笑，就好像自己是世界上最富有的人一样。
A new proposal to help the fight against poverty has been advanced yesterday during the meeting.
昨天的会议上提出了一个消灭贫穷的新建议。
A good government should work to narrow the gap between the rich and poor.
一个合格的政府应该致力于填补国内的贫富差距。
Housing trusts help to provide houses for poor families.

He came from a poor family.
他出身于一个贫寒家庭。

在贫穷国家，平均每一百个孩子中只有一个能有机会上大学。

政府决定在贫困地区建更多的学校。

我们必须要消除世界各地的贫富差距。

铁摄入量不足容易造成贫血症，但我想这不是问题所在。

该社区中心提供应急食品储藏库及社区支援服务如租房援助，或为贫困儿童提供学习用品。
We hear the success stories all the time, about the poor child from the inner city who manages— against all odds— to become a successful entrepreneur, a lawyer or a doctor.
我们总能听到一些来自贫民区的孩子获得成功的故事，他们克服种种劣势，成为出色的企业家、律师或医生。
Some institutions are going to launch a new scheme to encourage more youngsters from poorer backgrounds to go on to college.
一些机构准备计划一个新项目，以此鼓励更多来自贫困家庭的年轻人进大学深造。

吸引更多贫困学生申请入学，并不仅仅是联合大学需要面对的问题。

在很多卷入内战的贫穷国家，血流成河仍是屡见不鲜。

她一生都在与贫穷作斗争。

生活在贫困中的人们

他出身贫苦，但后来颇有成就并去了美国。

生活贫困
a rags-to-riches story
从赤贫到暴富的故事
socially deprived/disadvantaged

有些生活在极度贫穷地区人得不到足够的食物。

在世界很多地方，贫穷仍是一个亟待重视的问题。

一些人认为贫穷滋生犯罪。

贫穷滋生犯罪。

This poverty alleviation program concerns people\'s livelihood. We must be cautious!
这次会议的主要议题就是东非的贫困问题。

The theme of this session is poverty in Eastern Africa.
正颜厉色。
这位老人华发苍颜，但身体还不错。

Despite his aging face, he is in good health.
由于长期坚持体育锻炼，他看起来鹤发童颜。
Yóuyú chángqī jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn，tā kànqǐlái hèfātóngyán。
Thanks to his persistent physical exercise, he looks healthy, with white hair and a ruddy complexion.
他的书法是颜体的别体。
他那几个大字显然取法于颜体。
animals that mimic their environment
躯体颜色酷似其生活环境色彩的动物
Different species of snakes can often be distinguished by their characteristic color patterns.
蛇的种类可以从它们身体的颜色和图案特征来判断。
We see the color because the object reflects it to the eye.
Wǒmen kěyǐ kànjiàn bùtóng de sècǎi，shì yīnwèi wùtǐ jiāng yánsè fǎnshè jìn wǒmen yǎnjing lǐ。
我们可以看见不同的色彩，是因为物体将颜色反射进我们眼睛里。
The liquid will lighten the color of the skirt.
这种液体会淡化裙子的颜色。
暗淡的颜色
àndàn de yánsè 
a dull colour
领带颜色与上装不配。
Lǐngdài yánsè yǔ shàngzhuāngbúpèi。
The colour of the tie doesn\'t match that of the jacket.
这种料子的颜色和花样很大方。

The pattern and colour of this fabric are in good taste.
你如果不安分，他就要给你颜色看。
Nǐ rúguǒ bùānfèn，tā jiùyào gěi nǐ yánsè kàn。
If you go on making trouble, he\'ll show (or tell) you a thing or two.
颜色搭配得很和谐。
Yánsè dāpèi de hěn héxié。
The colours match quite well.
黑颜色禁脏。
Hēi yánsè jīnzāng。

这幅画颜色太浓。
Zhèfúhuà yánsè tài nóng。
The painting is too heavily coloured.
配颜色
pèi yánsè
mix colours (on a palette)
颜色不配。
Yánsè bú pèi。
Those colours don\'t match.
颜色漆太深(浅)
yánsè qī tài shēn（qiǎn）
paint a colour a bit too dark (light)
颜色太深。
Yánsè tài shēn。
The colour is too dark (or deep).
颜色深浅不同
yánsè shēnqiǎn bùtóng
of different shades
这两种颜色配得很调和。

These two colours blend well.

tiáopèi yánsè

yánsè xiānyàn

Yánliào zài cāngkù lǐ jiànjiàn biàndàn le。
颜料在仓库里渐渐变淡了。
Artists use &quot;paint&quot; and &quot;pigment&quot; interchangeably.
Huàjiāmen jí yòng“yóuqī”yě yòng“yánliào”。
画家们即用“油漆”也用“颜料”。
The paint on these walls gradates but you don\'t see it.
Qiángbì shàng de yánliào zài zhújiàn biànhuà，dàn nǐ wúfǎ chájué。
墙壁上的颜料在逐渐变化，但你无法察觉。
This type of dyeing assistant can improve the color quality of the fabric.
这种染料助剂可以改善布料的颜色质量。
These dyes and colors are guaranteed not to run.
Zhèxiē rǎnliào hé yánsè bǎozhèng búhuì shèn kāi。
这些染料和颜色保证不会渗开。

Tā jìng hòuyánwúchǐ de suǒyào huíkòu。

àndàn de yánsè 
a dull colour

jì yán

咱们搞这行的只不过是“逢场作戏”嘛。
Zánmen gǎo zhè háng de zhǐbúguò shì“féngchǎngzuòxì”ma。
We of this trade know too well that we are only playing a game.
你对吃挺行家嘛。
Nǐ duì chī tǐnghángjia ma。
You are quite a connoisseur of food!
开个玩笑嘛，何必当真呢？
Kāi gè wánxiào ma，hébì dàngzhēn ne?
I was only joking. Why take it so seriously?
礼尚往来嘛，对他的盛情，我们自当还席。
Lǐshàngwǎngláima，duì tā de shèngqíng，wǒmen zì dānghuánxí。
Courtesy demands reciprocity, so we shall certainly invite him to dinner in return for his hospitality.
这也不能怪他，头一回做嘛。
Zhè yě bùnéng guài tā，tóu yì huí zuò ma。
He\'s not to blame. After all, it was the first time he\'d done it.
这件事他是知道的嘛。
Zhèjiànshì tā shì zhīdào de ma。
He\'s well aware of it.
他本来就不愿意去嘛，就不要勉强他了。
Tā běnlái jiù bú yuànyì qù ma，jiù búyào miǎnqiǎngtā le。
He just doesn\'t want to go. Don\'t force him.
有意见就提嘛，你怎么不提呀？
Yǒu yìjiàn jiù tí ma，nǐ zěnme bùtí ya? 
If you have any suggestions to make, by all means make them. What are you keeping quiet for?
喂，汽车开慢点嘛！
Wei，qìchē kāimàn diǎn ma！
Hey, don\'t drive so fast!
既然你忙，就别去嘛。
Jìrán nǐ máng，jiù bié qù ma。
Since you are busy, don\'t go then.
这个问题嘛，很简单。
Zhège wèntí ma，hěn jiǎndān。
As for this problem, it\'s really quite simple.
好嘛，那就快找他去吧。
Hǎo ma，nà jiù kuài zhǎo tā qù ba。
OK. Go to him at once.
这事明明是他干的嘛！
Zhè shì míngmíngshì tā gàn de ma。
This is obviously his doing. or There can be no doubt that it was he who did it.
你别拿我撒气嘛。
Nǐ bié ná wǒ sāqì ma。
Don\'t take it out on me.
他们能够做到那样，我们难道就做不到吗？ 事在人为嘛。
Tāmen nénggòu zuò dào nàyàng，wǒmen nándào jiù zuò bu dào ma? Shìzàirénwéi ma。
If they could achieve so much, why can\'t we? Everything depends upon men\'s efforts.
通货一膨胀，物价就涨，水涨船高嘛。
Tōnghuò yì péngzhàng，wùjià jiù zhǎng，shuǐzhǎngchuángāo ma。
Prices rise in proportion to inflation, like boats going up with the level of the water.
他不对嘛，怎么能顺着他呢？
Tā bú duì ma，zěnme néng shùn zhe tā ne?
How can we do as he wishes when he\'s obviously wrong?
我即使干不了重活，也可以干点轻活嘛。
Wǒ jíshǐ gàn bu liǎo zhònghuó，yě kěyǐ gàn diǎn qīnghuó ma。
If I can\'t do heavy work, I can still do some light work.
这事还得你自己出面解决，解铃系铃嘛！
Zhè shì hái děi nǐ zìjǐ chūmiàn jiějué，jiělíng jìlíng ma！
You have to deal with it yourself. Only the one who tied it can untie it!
可不是嘛，我也觉得你们分开是好事情！
Kě búshì ma，wǒ yě juédé nǐmen fēnkāi shì hǎo shìqing！
Exactly, I also think it is a good thing for both of you to break up.
唱歌的时候你只是对对口型，这不是假唱嘛！
Chànggē de shíhou nǐ zhǐshì duìduì kǒuxíng，zhè búshì jiǎchàng ma！
You are lip-syncing since you just change the shape of your mouth instead of singing.
她有什么好狂气的，不就是刚当上学习委员嘛。
Tā yǒu shénme hǎo kuángqì de，bú jiùshì gāng dāngshàng xuéxí wěiyuán ma。
How can she be so arrogant? She has only been elected as a study leader right now.
妈妈如此窥度你的心事，还不是因为关心你嘛！
Māma rúcǐ kuīdù nǐ de xīnshì，hái búshì yīnwèi guānxīn nǐ ma！
Mother surmised you surreptitiously only because she cares about you.
他俩本来就是认识的，这摆明了是在拉偏架嘛！
Tā liǎ běnlái jiùshì rènshi de，zhè bǎimíng le shì zài lāpiānjià ma！
Since they already know each other, it is obvious that are partial to one another.
这个项目何必找外人呢，内包就可以了，大家共担风险、共同受益嘛！
Zhège xiàng mù hébì zhǎo wàirén ne，nèibāo jiù kěyǐ le，dàjiā gòngdān fēngxiǎn、gòngtóng shòuyì ma！
We don\'t need to find other people to do this project. Actually, we can have our own people do it , so that we can take the risk together and get mutual benefits.
你不要强迫他做他不愿意做的事了，人各有志嘛。
Nǐ búyào qiǎngpò tā zuò tā bú yuànyì zuò de shì le，rén gè yǒuzhì ma。
Don\'t force him to do what he is unwilling to do, everyone has his own ambitions.
对于这个问题，我们允许有不同的观点，仁者见仁，智者见智嘛！
Duìyú zhège wèntí，wǒmen yǔnxǔ yǒu bùtóng de guāndiǎn，rénzhě jiànrén，zhìzhě jiànzhì ma！
Different opinions are allowed on this matter. After all, different people have different opinions about the same things.
你怎么这样死性呀，这事应该灵活掌握嘛。
Nǐ zěnme zhèyàng sǐxìng ya，zhè shì yīnggāi línghuó zhǎngwò ma。
Why are you so inflexible? This should be handled according to the conditions.
我想利用业余时间找份外活儿干干，也好多挣点儿钱嘛。

I want to moonlight in my leisure time, as it can bring me more money.
这些消息是从哪里听来的？全都是误传嘛！

可不是嘛！

坐火车到我家乡仅仅比坐飞机便宜一点点而已。
Purchasing from the cheapest source can save a country substantial sums.

那家饭店的优点就是，离我家很近，而且价格非常便宜。

我经常光顾那家超市，它那里的菜很便宜。

就职于那家公司时，我要处理和客户的关系事宜。

Tā lǎoshì xiàng wǒmen jiǎng yìxiē shào\'er bùyí de huángsè xiàohua。

衬衫难看就难看些吧，因为便宜，我就买了。

你不能这么便宜了他。
Nǐ bùnéng zhème piányi le tā.
You shouldn\'t let him off so lightly.
既便宜且实用
jì piányi qiě shíyòng
cheap and useful
吃止痛药后不适宜饮酒。
Chī zhǐtòngyào hòu bú shìyí yǐnjiǔ。
After taking painkillers it\'s not advisable to drink alcohol.
腌制食品不宜多吃。

事不宜迟。
Shìbùyíchí。
Matters should not be delayed.
邮递印刷品很便宜。
Yóudì yìnshuāpǐn hěn piányi。

他总想沾点便宜。
Tā zǒng xiǎng zhān diǎn piányi。
He always wants to take advantage.
宜早不宜晚。
事不宜迟
通俗文章不宜用典太多

不能让他占了便宜

沾点便宜
zhān diǎn piányi
get a bargain

占便宜
zhàn piányi
gain extra advantage by unfair means; profit at other people\'s expense

Bàohuābǎn de jiàgé hěnpiányí。

羊毛衫。
弹羊毛。

这种毛料是用杂毛纺的∣杂毛羊。

The sweater is made from pure wool.
这件毛衣是纯羊毛做的。
Put on your wool socks to keep your feet warm.
穿上羊毛袜子，好让脚暖和。
I need a wool coat for this winter.
我今年冬天需要件羊毛衫。
Designers suggest dry cleaning your wool suits only twice a year to reduce deterioration of the fibers.
设计师建议羊毛套装一年只能干洗两次，这样可以减轻纤维的老化程度。
It is easier for beginners to spin threads with wool that has been washed.
新手用洗过的羊毛纺线比较容易。
We can felt the wool and make it into fabric.
我们可以把这些羊毛制成毡，然后用它制成织物。
The wool needs to be carded before we dye it.
Yángmáo zài wǒmen rǎnsè zhīqián xūyào bèi shūlǐ yíxià。
羊毛在我们染色之前需要被梳理一下。
Teasing wool is a long and tedious process.
Shūlǐ yángmáo shì yí xiàng hàoshí yòu kūzào de gōngzuò。
梳理羊毛是一项耗时又枯燥的工作。
Wool from Britain may have been traded in exchange for wine.
Guòqù yīngguó de yángmáo kě yònglái huàn jiǔ。
过去英国的羊毛可用来换酒。
He was wearing a coat and a thick woollen scarf.
Tā chuānzhe yí jiàn wàitào，wéizhe yì tiáo hòuhòu de yángmáo wéijīn。
他穿着一件外套，围着一条厚厚的羊毛围巾。
She quickly coated them in woolen blankets before they caught a chill.
Tā gǎnkuài gěi tāmen pīshàngle yángmáo tǎnzi，miǎn dé tāmen zháoliáng。
她赶快给他们披上了羊毛毯子，免得他们着凉。
The soft, fine feel tells you this is pure lambswool, pure luxury.

这种柔软良好的感觉告诉你这是纯羊毛，纯奢侈品。
She found him sharpening the shears which would be used to shear the sheep.
Tā kàndào tā zhèngzài mó yònglái xiūjiǎn yángmáo de dà jiǎndāo。
她看到他正在磨用来修剪羊毛的大剪刀。
He went to help on the farm for a few days sheep shearing.
Tā dào nóngchǎng qùle jǐtiān bāngmáng jiǎn yángmáo。
他到农场去了几天帮忙剪羊毛。
She found a cushion hanging in front of her place, sewn in neat wool stitches.
Tā fāxiàn zài tā de wèizhi qián yǒu yí gè diànzǐ，diànzǐ shì yóu xìxì de yángmáo xiàn zhēnjiǎo féngzhì de。
她发现在她的位置前有一个垫子，垫子是由细细的羊毛线针脚缝制的。
Wool from Britain may have been traded in exchange for wine.

英国产的羊毛可以用来和酒相互交换。
Wool knits up well.
Yángmáo fēicháng shìhé biānzhī。
羊毛非常适合编织。
They decided to lay a tax on foreign wool.

The wife can make the wool into cloth.
Tā de qīzǐ kěyǐ bǎ yángmáo zuòchéng bùliào。

大家都哀悯这只失去母亲的小藏羚羊。
Dàjiā dōu āimǐn zhèzhī shīqù mǔqīn de xiǎo zànglíngyáng。
Everyone felt sad for this baby Tibetan antelope who had just lost its mother.
辽阔的草原上，成群的牛羊在四下奔逐。
Liáokuò de cǎoyuán shàng，chéngqún de niúyáng zài sìxià bēnzhú。
On the wide plain, herds of cattle are frolicking about in the fields.
那只羚羊蹦跳着飞快向前。
Nà zhī língyáng bèngtiào zhe fēikuài xiàng qián。
The antelope jumped forward swiftly.
他家的羊膘情不好，全家人都很着急。
Tā jiā de yáng biāoqíng bùhǎo，quánjiārén dōu hěnzháojí。
His sheep are not very fat, which makes the family worried.
这只羊已经濒死，我们该怎么办？
Zhèzhī yáng yǐjīng bīnsǐ，wǒmen gāi zěnme bàn？
What can we do with this dying sheep?
这个冰塑的小羊真是惟妙惟肖。
Zhège bīngsù de xiǎoyáng zhēnshì wéimiàowéixiào。
This ice sculpture resembles a real little lamb.
一片苍绿的草原上，有几只山羊在悠闲地吃着草。
Yí piàn cānglǜ de cǎoyuán shàng，yǒu jǐ zhī shānyáng zài yōuxián de chī zhe cǎo。
Some goats are casually eating grass on a green prairie.
他带着儿子坐在高高的城垛上，看着远处的牛羊。
Tā dài zhe érzi zuòzài gāogāo de chéngduò shàng，kàn zhe yuǎnchù de niúyáng。
He had his child with him, sitting on the high rampart and looking at the flocks and herds far away.
牧童把羊群催赶到了小山坡上。
Mùtóng bǎ yángqún cuīgǎn dào le xiǎoshānpō shàng。
The flock of goats were driven onto a small hill by the shepherd boy.
羊就是从这个当子跑出去的。
Yáng jiùshì cóng zhège dāngzi pǎo chūqù de。
The sheep ran out at this very moment.
一家人围着电火锅吃涮羊肉。
Yì jiā rén wéi zhe diànhuǒguō chī shuànyángròu。
The family are eating instant-boiled mutton around an electric dish.
成群的牛羊正在甸子上吃着青草。
Chéngqún de niúyáng zhèngzài diànzi shàng chīzhe qīngcǎo。
Groups of cows and sheep are eating grass on the pasture.
天气转冷，不少绵羊都掉膘了。
Tiānqì zhuǎnlěng，bùshǎo miányáng dōu diàobiāo le。
It is becoming cold. Many sheep are losing weight.
老鼠搬家，牛羊狂躁，有可能是地震噩兆。
Lǎoshǔ bānjiā，niú yáng kuángzào，yǒu kěnéng shì dìzhèn èzhào。
When rats move house and cows and sheep become wild, it is a sign of an earthquake.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
这些牛羊肥得滚瓜流油，牧民们可高兴了。
Zhèxiē niúyáng féi de gǔnguā liúyóu，mùmínmen kě gāoxìng le。
The herdsmen are excited that the flocks of cattle, and sheep are round and fat.
她这个坎肩是软羊皮的，特别暖和。
Tā zhège kǎnjiān shì ruǎnyángpí de，tèbié nuǎnhé。
Her sleeveless jacket is made of soft sheepskin and is very warm.
他家的羊又啃青了，啃掉的那些可都是越冬小麦啊！
Tā jiā de yáng yòu kěnqīng le，kěndiào de nàxiē kě dōushì yuè dōng xiǎomài a！
Their goats are eating winter wheat again.
羚羊是豹子主要的猎食对象。
Língyáng shì bàozi zhǔyào de lièshí duì xiàng。
The antelope is the main prey of the leopard.
六畜是马、牛、羊、猪、狗、鸡这六种家畜家禽的合称。
Liùchù shì mǎ、niú、yáng、zhū、gǒu、jī zhè liùzhǒng jiāchù jiāqín de héchēng。
The six domestic animals refer to the horse, ox, goat, pig, dog and chicken.
绿野上有成群的牛羊，真是富饶之地啊。
Lǜyě shàng yǒu chéngqún de niúyáng，zhēnshì fùráo zhī dì a。
It is an abundant land with green fields, with flocks of cattle and sheep.
依我的口味，吃羊肉莫若吃烤鸭！
Yī wǒ de kǒuwèi，chī yángròu mòruò chī kǎoyā！
In my opinion, I prefer to eat roast duck rather than mutton.
医生说她有内火，不宜多吃羊肉等热性食物。
Yīshēng shuō tā yǒu nèihuǒ，bùyí duōchī yángròu děng rèxìng shíwù。
The doctor said that she had an inner fire and shouldn\'t eat too much hot food like mutton.
那件羊皮袍是妈妈亲手做的，我穿着特别暖和。
Nà jiàn yángpípáo shì māma qīnshǒu zuò de，wǒ chuān zhe tèbié nuǎnhé。
The sheep fur-lined robe my mom made is extremely warm.
在内蒙古，人们常用羊皮筒子做皮袍。
Zài Nèiménggǔ，rénmen chángyòng yángpí tǒngzi zuò pípáo。
In the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region, people often use semi-finished sheepskin lining to make fur-lined robes.
这件衣服不只含有羊毛，还含有大量的人造毛。
Zhèjiàn yīfu bùzhǐ hányǒu yángmáo，hái hányǒu dàliàng de rénzàomáo。
The garment contains wool and a great deal of artificial wool.
他把羊肉和牛肉分别放在了肉案的两边。
Tā bǎ yángròu hé niúròu fēnbié fàngzài le ròuàn de liǎngbiān。
He put mutton and beef on opposite ends of the long butcher\'s table.
这家火锅店选用的都是内蒙古的上等羊肉片儿。
Zhèjiā huǒguōdiàn xuǎnyòng de dōushì Nèiménggǔ de shàngděng yángròupiànr。
This hotpot shop uses superior quality sliced beef from the Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.
他留着独特的山羊胡子，所以我很容易就认出他来了。
Tā liú zhe dútè de shānyáng húzi，suǒyǐ wǒ hěn róngyì jiù rènchū tā lái le。
He has a distinctive goatee, so I can recognize him easily.
用什么办法可以去除羊肉中的膻味呢？
Yòng shénme bànfǎ kěyǐ qùchú yángròu zhōng de shānwèi ne ？
How can the smell of mutton be eliminated?
你宰羊的时候可得把尿泡切除干净啊。
Nǐ zǎiyáng de shíhou kě děi bǎ niàopào qiēchú gānjìng a。
Cut out the bladder completely when killing sheep.
烤羊肉时加入一些辣椒面可以提味儿。
Kǎoyángròu shí jiārù yìxiē làjiāomiàn kěyǐ tíwèir。
Put some powdered spices onto the roasted mutton and it will make the mutton taste better.
犯罪分子靠偷猎藏羚羊来牟取暴利。
Fànzuì fènzǐ kào tōuliè zànglíngyáng lái móuqǔ bàolì。

什么想法促使你(去干这事)？

促使某人做某事

Zhèzhǒng dànbáidòng de dànbáizhì hánliàng jí gāo。
This peptone is rich in protein.
胃蛋白酶能消化食物中的蛋白质。
Wèi dànbáiméi néng xiāohuà shíwù zhōng de dànbáizhì。
The pepsin can digest the protein in food.
乌鱼蛋含有大量蛋白质，一向被视为海味珍品。
Wūyúdàn hányǒu dàliàng dànbáizhì，yí xiàng bèi shìwéi hǎiwèi zhēnpǐn。
The cuttlefish\'s egg gland contains a lot of protein, and is regarded as a choice seafood.
真是个大笨蛋！
Zhēn shì gè dà bèndàn！
What a fool!
彻头彻尾的坏蛋
chètóuchèwěi de huàidàn 
an out-and-out villain
鱼塘和鸡场多了，大家都吃得上鲜鱼、鲜蛋了。
Yútánghé jīchǎngduō le，dàjiā dōu chī de shàngxiānyú、xiāndàn le。
There are plenty of fish ponds and chicken farms, supplying everybody with fresh fish and eggs.

母鸡下完蛋后，咯咯地叫个不停。

jiān jīdàn

Thrashing this scoundrel wouldn\'t be enough to slake our hatred for him.
这几天鸡蛋供应有点紧张。
Zhè jǐtiān jīdàn gōngyìng yǒudiǎn jǐnzhāng。

The little girl\'s rosy cheeks are like apples.
鸡蛋论斤卖。
Jīdàn lùn jīn mài。
Eggs are sold by the jin.
他骂我是笨蛋。
Tā mà wǒ shì bèndàn。

我常被她蔑称为傻瓜蛋。
Wǒ chángbèi tā mièchēngwéi shǎguādàn。
I\'m often scornfully referred to as a fool by her.
他们农场养的鸡每只年均产蛋240个。

The hens raised on their farm each average 240 eggs a year.
蛋白质遇热会凝固。
Dànbáizhì yù rè huì nínggù。
Protein becomes solid when heated.
胖鼓鼓的脸蛋儿
pànggǔgǔ de liǎndànr
a chubby face
这个小孩的脸蛋胖乎乎的。

以后再找这坏蛋算账。

我每天早上起来都喜欢吃两个茶叶蛋。

That guy is a bastard, he refuses to support his parents.

Suǒwèi“huózhì”，tā shì zìránjiè zhōng zhǔyào yóu dànbáizhì gòuchéng bìng jùyǒu shēngzhǎng、fāyù、fánzhí děng nénglì de wùtǐ。
Living objects are those that are constituted of proteins and have the ability to grow, develop and breed.
家养的鸡生出的蛋比较大，但是味道却不怎么样。
Jiāyǎng de jī shēngchū de dàn bǐjiào dà，dànshì wèidào què bùzěnmeyàng。
Domesticated chicken lays bigger eggs, but they don\'t taste so good.
这个蛋糕店还兼营奶茶，冰淇淋，生意很好。
Zhège dàngāodiàn hái jiānyíng nǎichá，bīngqílín，shēngyì hěnhǎo。
The cake shop has a sideline in selling milk tea and ice cream, which makes a good profit.
事事靠己是不现实的，要学会借鸡生蛋。
Shìshì kào jǐ shì bú xiànshí de，yào xuéhuì jièjī shēngdàn。
It is impossible to do eveything by yourself; you have to learn to work with others.
他绘制的蛋壳彩画，精致漂亮，堪称一绝！
Tā huìzhì de dànké cǎihuà，jīngzhì piàoliàng，kānchēng yìjué！
The eggs he decorated with colored drawings are really exquisite and beautiful. They can be called unique.
这家饭店做的醪糟鸡蛋味道很好。

The child\'s cheek is always red, and especially attractive.

Tā yòng qíshì de gāoyǎ fēngdù xiàng tā qiú\'ài。
他用骑士的高雅风度向她求爱。
The knight unsheathed his sword.
Qíshì báchūle tā de jiàn。
骑士拔出了他的剑。
But at any rate he got a knighthood for it.
Dànshì wúlùn rúhé，tā háishì yīncǐ ér huòdéle qíshì de chēnghào。
但是无论如何，他还是因此而获得了骑士的称号。
The warriors tilted back on their horses.
武士们骑在马上用长矛反击。
Henriette saw the weaving figure of an Apache warrior reel nakedly on a pony and rush by with a rifle raised.
Hēngruìtè kànjiàn yí gè Ābāqiē yǒngshì de shēnyǐng —— qízhe yì pǐ méiyǒu ānjiān de mǎ，shǒu jǔ yì bǎ bùqiāng，chōng xiàng qiánfāng。
亨瑞特看见一个阿巴切勇士的身影——骑着一匹没有鞍鞯的马，手举一把步枪，冲向前方。
The majority of the young ladies in the Royal Court are passionate, young horsewomen.
Huángshì dàbùfèn de niánqīng nǚshì dōushì rèqíng niánqīng de nǚqíshǒu。
皇室大部分的年轻女士都是热情年轻的女骑手。

(赛马时)挤其他骑师以占有利位置

qíqiángpài
fence-sitter

That sly politician is always trimming between parties.

骑马
qí mǎ
ride a horse; be on horseback

Wèile cānjiā zhè cì de qímǎ bǐsài，tā yòu mǎi le fù xīn de ānxīn。
He bought new saddling for the horse race.
由于从小骑马，长大后他成了罗圈儿腿。

He has ridden horses since he was young, so he has bowlegs after growing up.
到跑马场骑马，成了都市年轻人的时尚运动。
Dào pǎomǎchǎng qímǎ，chéng le dūshì niánqīngrén de shíshàng yùndòng。
Riding a horse on the racetrack is a fashionable sport loved by the young people in the city.
她第一次骑马就坠马骨折了。
Tā dìyīcì qímǎ jiù zhuìmǎ gǔzhé le。
The first time she rode a horse, she fell off and broke a bone.
骑在马上，他心情舒畅，不住地策马鸣鞭。
Qízài mǎ shàng，tā xīnqíng shūchàng，búzhù de cèmǎ míngbiān。
Riding on the horse, he feels happy, and keeps spurring the horse on.
他骑着高头大马，很威风。
Tā qí zhe gāotóu dàmǎ，hěnwēifēng。
He is riding a big strong horse, which is very impressive.
骑在那匹白马上的一定是他们的头人。

The 57-year-old champion jockey said he was in good shape.
Zhè wèi 57 suì de zhíyè qímǎ guànjūn shuō tā de zhuàngtài hěn hǎo。
这位57岁的职业骑马冠军说他的状态很好。

我年轻时花了几年时间骑马。

Those fellows did their horse trekking today, and tomorrow they\'re due to go rafting.

Zuìhòu jǐ tiān shíjiān dōu huā zài qímǎ shàng le。

The rider was precipitated from the startled horse
Nàge qímǎ de rén cóng shòujīng de mǎshàng dǒurán diàole xiàlái。
那个骑马的人从受惊的马上陡然掉了下来。
They decided to ride off into the sunset.
Tāmen juédìng qí mǎ líqù，bèn xiàng xīyáng。
他们决定骑马离去，奔向夕阳。
We rode out to the barbecue on horseback.
Wǒmen qí mǎ qù yěwài kǎo ròu。

Travelling on two or four legs is the most ancient way of getting around the world.

And I on the opposite shore will be，ready to ride and spread the alarm.

我将在对岸准备好马匹，随时骑马传达警报信号。
Did you gallop the horse just now?
Nǐ gāngcái qímǎ fēibēnle ma？
你刚才骑马飞奔了吗？

Tā zhǔnbèi qí zìjǐ de mǎ。

骑车
qí chē 
ride a bike

qí chē huíjiā
go home by bicycle

On my way to Tianjin, I came across an acquaintance. We greeted each other, and then I went on riding.
他骗腿骑车的动作很麻利。

He is very agile hopping onto a bicycle by swinging one of his legs sideways.

She can ride a motorcycle, to say nothing of a bicycle.

qí zìxíngchē 
ride a bicycle

go down town by bike

这个货架是他自己装的，骑自行车时可以放很多东西。

He fixed this rack himself. A lot of things can be put into it while he is biking.
你的自行车骑起来吱吱地响，看来是该上油了。

驯熟的熊猫还会骑自行车呢，真滑稽。

我这辆自行车的利用率太低，买来到现在就没怎么骑过。

Mark cycled to school every morning to keep fit and to save money.

陪审团审判权

他的话对陪审团发生重要影响

to keep sb company
陪伴某人
Children under ten must be accompanied by an adult to enter the ice stadium.
十岁以下儿童必须由家长陪伴才能进入滑冰场。
This loyal guide dog accompanied Magritte to the amusement park.
这个忠诚的导盲犬陪伴玛格丽特去了游乐园。
The parent can assign a responsible person to accompany their children under 12 on the airplane.
父母可以指定一个负责人在飞机上陪伴十二岁以下的儿童。
The husband accompanies his wife to charity events on a regular basis.
Zhàngfu jīngcháng péibàn tā de qīzǐ cānjiā císhàn shìyè。
丈夫经常陪伴他的妻子参加慈善事业。
She will serve as a paid companion to her godfather\'s widow.
Tā jiāng chōngdāng tā jiàofù de yíshuāng de shòugù péibànrén de juésè。
她将充当她教父的遗孀的受雇陪伴人的角色。
Anyway, I really like Elaine and enjoy her company.
Bùguǎn zěnyàng，wǒ zhēn de xǐhuan Yīlái\'ēn，xǐhuan yǒu tā péibàn。
不管怎样，我真的喜欢伊莱恩，喜欢有她陪伴。
Anyway, I really like Elaine and enjoy her company.
Bùguǎn zěnyàng，wǒ zhēn de xǐhuan Yīlái\'ēn，xǐhuan yǒu tā péibàn。
不管怎样，我真的喜欢伊莱恩，喜欢有她陪伴。
He enjoyed their company; they enjoyed his; he was gallant and flirtatious.
Tā xǐhuan tāmen de péibàn ； tāmen yě xǐhuan yǒu tā zài shēnbiān；tā jì yīnqín yòu qīngfú。
他喜欢他们的陪伴；他们也喜欢有他在身边； 他既殷勤又轻浮。
The teenage boys used to keep company with a lonely old woman.
Zhèxiē shàonián céngjīng péibàn guò yí gè gūdú de lǎo fùrén。
这些少年曾经陪伴过一个孤独的老妇人。
He missed their company.
Tā huáiniàn tāmen de péibàn。
他怀念他们的陪伴。
It was as if fortune guided his hand.
Hǎoyùn sìhū yìzhí péibànzhe tā。
好运似乎一直陪伴着他。
She will be with you momently.
Tā shíkè dōuhuì péibànzhe nǐ。
她时刻都会陪伴着你。
The maiden was alone with only her melancholy for company.
Nàge shàonǚ hěn gūdú，zhǐyǒu yí gè tóngbàn péizhe tā。
那个少女很孤独，只有一个同伴陪着她。
I went with her as a companion for the long journey.
Wǒ zuòle tā de tóngbàn，péitóng tā qù chángtú lǚxíng。
我作了她的同伴，陪同她去长途旅行。
His daughters are virtually imprisoned in their own house; he does not let them go out without a chaperone.
Tā de nǚer shíjì shàng dōubèi guān zài tāmen zìjǐ de jiāzhōng；rúguǒ méiyǒu nǚbàn péihù，tā bú ràng tāmen chūmén。
他的女儿实际上都被关在她们自己的家中；如果没有女伴陪护，他不让她们出门。
我今天晚上感觉特别凄冷，你来陪陪我吧。
Wǒ jīntiān wǎnshàng gǎnjué tèbié qīlěng，nǐ lái péipéi wǒ ba。
I feel extremely dreary and cold tonight, would you come here to stay with me?
恕不奉陪。
Shùbúfèngpéi。
Sorry I won\'t be able to keep you company.
今天晚上来和我们玩桥牌，好吗？ —好极啦，我一定奉陪到底。
Jīntiān wǎnshàng lái hé wǒmen wán qiáopái，hǎo ma? —Hǎo jí la，wǒ yídìng fèngpéidàodǐ。
Will you come and join us at a bridge party this evening? —Yes, I\'ll be glad to, and I\'ll stay at the party until the very end.
由审判员一人，人民陪审员二人组成的合议庭
Yóu shěnpànyuán yì rén，rénmín péishěnyuán èr rén zǔchéng de héyìtíng。
a collegial panel composed of one judge and two people\'s assessors
我陪你到农场去。
Wǒ péi nǐ dào nóngchǎngqù。
I\'ll accompany you to the farm.
陪外宾参观工厂
péi wàibīn cānguān gōngchǎng
show foreign visitors round a factory
陪病人
péi bìnɡrén
look after a patient
老太太要找个人陪伴。
Lǎotàitai yào zhǎo gè rén péibàn。
The old lady wants someone to keep her company. or The old lady wants to find a companion.
红旗在雪山的陪衬下，显得分外鲜艳。
Hóngqí zài xuěshān de péichèn xià，xiǎnde fēnwài xiānyàn。
The red flags stood out in sharp relief against the snow mountains.
大夫请她陪护病人
Dàifu qǐngtā péihù bìngrén。
The doctor asked her to stay and nurse the patient.
他每天都要陪练好几个小时。
Tā měitiān dōuyào péiliàn hǎo jǐgè xiǎoshí。
Every day he spends several hours training with top athletes.
所有的磁带都随录音机陪送。
Suǒyǒu de cídài dōu suí lùyīnjī péisong。
All the tapes are included as gifts with the tape recorder.
学生们都由父母陪送到考场。
Xuéshēngmen dōu yóu fùmǔ péisongdào kǎochǎng。
All the students were accompanied by their parents to the examination locations.
陪同前往参观
péitóngqiánwǎngcānguān
accompany sb. on a visit
她今晚陪夜。
Tā jīn wǎn péi yè。
She will stay with the patient tonight.
我陪妈妈上了一趟街。
Wǒ péi māma shàng le yí tàngjiē。
I went shopping with my mother.
出国“陪读”，犹如当年插队一样，只不过是洋插队罢了。
Chūguó“péidú”，yóurú dāngnián chāduì yíyàng，zhǐ búguò shì yángchāduì bàle。
Accompanying a spouse abroad is like settling in the countryside, the only difference being that it\'s in a foreign country instead of China.
陪外宾游园
péi wàibīn yóuyuán 
accompany a foreign guest on a visit to a park
他要我陪他一块到厂里转转。
Tā yào wǒ péi tā yíkuài dào chǎnglǐ zhuànzhuan。
He asked me to show him round the plant.
我左右闲着没事，就陪你走一趟吧。
Wǒ zuǒyòu xián zhe méi shì，jiù péi nǐ zǒu yí tàngba。
Anyway I\'m free now. Let me go with you.
有长者在，我就打横作陪了。
Yǒu zhǎngzhě zài，wǒ jiù dǎhéng zuòpéi le。
Since there is a venerable elder here, I\'ll just take the least important seat.
今年寒假，我陪妻子归省。
Jīnnián hánjià，wǒ péi qīzǐ guīxǐng。
This winter holiday, I will accompany my wife to see her parents.
有各位前辈老师在这里，我只能陪个末座。
Yǒu gè wèi qiánbèi lǎoshī zài zhèlǐ，wǒ zhǐnéng péi gè mòzuò。
Since seniors and teachers are present here, I just take the least prominent seat.
《红楼梦》里的平儿，是王熙凤的陪房丫环。
《Hónglóumèng》lǐ de Píng\'ér，shì Wáng Xīfèng de péifáng yāhuán。
Ping\'er in the novel &quot;A Dream of the Red Mansions&quot;, is a maid servant brought by the bride from her parents\' home.
清明那天我跟随着老师去陪祭了他的母亲。
Qīngmíng nàtiān wǒ gēnsuí zhe lǎoshī qù péijì le tā de mǔqīn。
I assisted my teacher in presiding over the memorial ceremony of his mother on Tomb Sweeping Day.
奶奶出嫁时家里太穷，根本没什么陪奁。
Nǎinai chūjià shí jiā lǐ tài qióng，gēnběn méi shénme péilián。
My grandma\'s family was poor at the time she got married, so she had only a small dowry.
今天小刘第一次以陪审员的身份出席庭审现场。
Jīntiān Xiǎo Liú dìyīcì yǐ péishěnyuán de shēnfèn chūxí tíngshěnxiànchǎng。
Today, Xiao Liu attends a court trial as a juror for the first time.
她尽心尽力陪侍生病的奶奶，奶奶夸她是个好孩子。
Tā jìnxīn jìnlì péishì shēngbìng de nǎinai，nǎinai kuā tā shì gè hǎoháizi。
She takes good care of her sick grandma, and was praised by her as a good child.
陪同皇帝游历的这几天，我一直是如临深渊，如履薄冰，生怕自己做错事。
Péitóng huángdì yóulì de zhè jǐ tiān，wǒ yìzhí shì rúlín shēnyuān，rúlǚbóbīng，shēngpà zìjǐ zuò cuòshì。
Those days when I accompanied the emperor on his tour, I was afraid of doing something wrong, as if I was standing on the edge of an abyss or treading on thin ice.
每天傍晚舅父都会陪着舅母在海边闲步。
Měitiān bàngwǎn jiùfù dōuhuì péi zhe jiùmǔ zài hǎibiān xiánbù。
My uncle goes to walk with my aunt by the sea in the dusk every day.
相公，明日我父亲过七十大寿，你陪我回家祝寿吧！
Xiànggong，míngrì wǒ fùqīn guò qīshí dàshòu，nǐ péi wǒ huíjiā zhùshòu ba！
Dear husband, my father is going to have his 70th birthday, go and visit him with me, please!
姐姐明天晚上要陪朋友去听管弦乐音乐会。
Jiějie míngtiān wǎnshàng yào péi péngyou qù tīng guǎnxiányuè yīnyuèhuì。
My sister is going to accompany her friends to the orchestral music concert tomorrow night.

Péishěnzhì yǒulìyú shíxiàn fǎtíng shěnpàn de gōngzhèng。
The jury system is of benefit in achieving justice in the court.

Zài tāde péibàn xià，wǒ huídàole gùxiāng。
He accompanied me back to my hometown.
谁想下棋，我都愿奉陪。
Shuí xiǎng xiàqí，wǒ dōu yuàn fèngpéi。
If anyone wants to play a game of chess, I\'d be glad to join them.
她恳求朋友陪她一起去。
Tā kěnqiú péngyou péi tā yìqǐ qù.
She begged her friend to go with her.
陪他聊聊，别冷落了他。
Péi tā liáoliáo，bié lěngluòle tā.
Why don\'t you go chat to him – you shouldn\'t be leaving him out.
我要陪母亲去医院。
Wǒ yào péi mǔqīn qù yīyuàn.
I have to go to the hospital with my mother.
我不用你陪。
Wǒ búyòng nǐ péi.
You don\'t need to come with me.
陪考
péikǎo
assistant examiner

我得先走一步，少陪了。
Wǒ děi xiān zǒu yíbù，shǎopéile。
I\'m afraid I really have to go.
我有事，先失陪了。
Wǒ yǒushì，xiān shīpéile。

我自己去就行，不用你陪着。

I\'ll go by myself; you don\'t have to come.

这名教师穿着背带裤，戴着眼镜，头上还有一顶圆形东欧帽。
A stunned waiter clutched his napkin to his breast.
Yí wèi ràng rén dàdiēyǎnjìng de fúwù shēng bǎ cānjīn bié zài xiōngqián。
一位让人大跌眼镜的服务生把餐巾别在胸前。

他把眼镜摘下来放在圆桌上。
She clutched at the glass on the table.
Tā zhuāzhù zhuōshàng de yǎnjìng。
她抓住桌上的眼镜。

Wǒ zuówǎn zài yǒngchí bǎ yǐnxíng yǎnjìng nòngdiū le。
我昨晚在泳池把隐形眼镜弄丢了。
Are those presciption glasses?
Nàxiē shì yànyǎn de yǎnjìng ma？
那些是验眼的眼镜吗？
I remember Mr. Smith only for his receding chin and prominent spectacles.
Wǒ jìdé Shǐmìsī xiānsheng，zhǐshì yīnwèi tā hòusuō de xiàba hé tūchū de yǎnjìng。
我记得史密斯先生，只是因为他后缩的下巴和突出的眼镜。
I couldn\'t read the fine print without my glasses.
Wǒ bú dài yǎnjìng jiù kànbùqīng nàxiē xiǎo zìtǐ。
我不戴眼镜就看不清那些小字体。
The frames of my glasses were broken.
Wǒ de yǎnjìngjià huài le。
我的眼镜架坏了。
He chewed up my glasses, and had my alarm clock the other night.
Tā nònghuài le wǒ de yǎnjìng，zài bùjiǔ qián de wǎnshang，yòu bǎ wǒ de nàozhōng gěi nònghuài le。
他弄坏了我的眼镜，在不久前的晚上，又把我的闹钟给弄坏了。
He put his glass on the table.
Tā bǎ tā de yǎnjìng fàngzài zhuō shàng。
他把他的眼镜放在桌上。
These eyeglasses do not spoil face.
Zhèxiē yǎnjìng búhuì ràng rén kàn qǐlái gèng chǒu。
这些眼镜不会让人看起来更丑。
His glasses steamed up when he came in from the cold.
Dāng tā cóng hánlěng de dìfang zǒu jìnlái de shíhou，yǎnjìng shàng bùmǎnle shuǐqì。
当他从寒冷的地方走进来的时候，眼镜上布满了水汽。
I trained my telescope on the moon.
Wǒ bǎ wàngyǎnjìng duìzhǔn yuèliang。
我把望眼镜对准月亮。
I was trying to pick up my contact lenses without using my hands.
Wǒ zhèngzài chángshì bú yòng shǒu lái qǔchū yǐnxíngyǎnjìng。
我正在尝试不用手来取出隐形眼镜。
Her glasses left marks on the bridge of her nose.
Tā de yǎnjìng zài tā bíliáng shàng liúxiàle yìnjì。
她的眼镜在她鼻梁上留下了印迹。
The new contact lenses will correct for his myopia.

这副新隐形眼镜将帮助矫正他的近视。
The king cobra is the most dangerous snake.
Yǎnjìngshé shì zuì wēixiǎn de shé。
眼镜蛇是最危险的蛇。

Did you find your glasses?
Nǐ zhǎo jiàn nǐ de yǎnjìng le ma？
你找见你的眼镜了吗？

At last he came across the aftermath of crash, broken glass and blood was everywhere.

I remember Mr. Smith only for his receding chin and prominent spectacles.

I was trying to pick up my contact lenses without using my hands.
