我正在尝试不用手来取出隐形眼镜。
The mirror reveals a tired young woman with big round lemur eyes.
镜子映出一个疲惫的年轻女子，有着一双又大又圆狐猴一样的眼睛。
Our words are distortable things--as in a crooked mirror held up to nature.
Wǒmen de huà dōu kěnéng bèi niǔqū，jiùxiàng zài hāhājìng zhōng yìngchū de shìjiè yíyàng。
我们的话都可能被扭曲，就像在哈哈镜中映出的世界一样。
Her sunglasses reflected his image.
Tā de tàiyángjìng lǐ fǎnshè chū tā de yǐngzi。
她的太阳镜里反射出他的影子。
Then a bald man with sunglasses on walked through the door.
Yí gè dàizhe mòjìng de guāngtóu nánzǐ zǒu chū le dàmén。
一个带着墨镜的光头男子走出了大门。
The resolution of light through a prism renders its spectral make up.
穿透棱镜的光被分解并且显示出它的光谱成分。
To minimise a large nose, choose glasses with a low bridge.
Yào xiǎng shǐ dà bízi búnàme tūchū，jiù yīngdāng xuǎnzé dī bíliáng jià de yǎnjìng。

这副太阳镜成了她的标志，戴着它无论走到哪里，都会被别人认出来。
她辛辛苦苦地攒了几个钱。
Tā xīnxīnkǔkǔ de zǎn le jǐgè qián。
She saved up some money with great difficulty.

Tā měitiān dōu xīnxīnkǔkǔ de láozuò zhe。

这些小钱是我辛辛苦苦赚来的，不能乱花。

bùcí xīnláo

bǎocháng jiānxīn

jìnjì xīnlà yóunì

lìjìn jiānxīn

历尽千辛万苦
lìjìn qiānxīnwànkǔ

辛辣的味道
xīnlà de wèidào
a sharp (or pungent) flavour
辛辣的讽刺
xīnlà de fěngcì
bitter irony; biting sarcasm
日夜辛劳
rìyè xīnláo
toil day and night
不辞辛劳
bùcí xīnláo
spare no pains

xīnqín láodònɡ
work hard; labour assiduously
辛酸泪
xīnsuānlèi
hot and bitter tears
辛酸的往事
xīnsuān de wǎngshì

bù cí xīnkǔ

Wǒ zài chēzhàn xiánguàngle yíhuìr，kànzhe rénmen dōu cōngmáng zhe gǎn tāmen de chēcì。
我在车站闲逛了一会儿，看着人们都匆忙着赶他们的车次。
The old lady is pottering around in the garden.

这位老妇人正在花园中闲逛。
Vicious gossip is a rub to sensitive people.
对敏感的人来说，恶意中伤的闲话很伤感情。
Many recruiters will begin the interview with some small talk.

很多招聘人员面试时会先从闲谈开始。
We cannot legislate how people spend their free time.
Wǒmen bùnéng guīdìng rénmen rúhé dǎfa tāmen de xiánxiá shíjiān。
我们不能规定人们如何打发他们的闲暇时间。
John was taking a break from the hard grind of political life.
Yuēhàn zài zhémó rén de zhèngzhì shēnghuó zhōng mánglǐtōuxián。
约翰在折磨人的政治生活中忙里偷闲。
A group of young people are sitting at a large table and chatting away.
Yì qún niánqīngrén zhèng zuòzài yì zhāng dàzhuōzi páng xiántán。
一群年轻人正坐在一张大桌子旁闲谈。

她真是好管闲事，自己的事还没管好呢就来管别人的。
This is what I always imagined myself doing in the south of France, sitting idly, drinking coffee, watching the people.
Zhè jiùshì wǒ yìzhí huànxiǎng zìjǐ zài Fǎguó nánbù suǒ zuò de shìqing —— yōuxián de zuòzhe，yìbiān hēzhe kāfēi，yìbiān kànzhe dāngdì de rénmen。
这就是我一直幻想自己在法国南部所做的事情——悠闲地坐着，一边喝着咖啡，一边看着当地的人们。
She progressed to a range of general likes and dislikes, favourite foods, politics and leisure pursuits.
Tā cóngshì yí xìliè xǐhuan de、bù xǐhuan de shì，kěkǒu de shíwù、zhèngzhì hé yōuxián de fùyè。
她从事一系列喜欢的、不喜欢的事，可口的食物、政治和悠闲的副业。
我们车间里的机器没有一台是空闲的。

None of the machines in our workshop are idle.

空闲的时候到氧吧吸氧有利于身体健康。

空闲时与朋友一起吟诗作对乃是人生一大快事。
Kòngxián shí yǔ péngyou yìqǐ yínshī zuòduì nǎishì rénshēng yídà kuàishì。
It\'s a real delight of life to chant poetry and write couplets with my friends during my spare time.
等我空闲下来再去拜访你。

I\'ll call on you when I\'m free.

Zhège cāochǎng kòngxián liǎngnián le.
This games area has been unused for two years.
他一有空闲就下棋。

She often drops in to have a chat.

Shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò shì jiùshí qǔyì de yìzhǒng，yìbān zài xiàng shēng zhīqián yǎnchàng yǐ zhāolǎn shēngyì。

现在的曲艺演员已经很少有人能够演唱什不闲儿莲花落了。

yōuxián
leisurely and carefree
他退休之后就过着清闲的日子，不禁感叹髀肉复生。
Tā tuìxiū zhīhòu jiù guò zhe qīngxián de rìzi，bùjīn gǎntàn bìròu fùshēng。
He lived an easy life after retirement, and signed for his idleness.
一片苍绿的草原上，有几只山羊在悠闲地吃着草。
Yí piàn cānglǜ de cǎoyuán shàng，yǒu jǐ zhī shānyáng zài yōuxián de chī zhe cǎo。
Some goats are casually eating grass on a green prairie.
午休时她们就坐在田边扯闲篇了。
Wǔxiū shí tāmen jiù zuòzài tiánbiān chěxiánpiān le。
They sat by the field, and chatted during the noon break.
这样闲散的机构，早就应该被撤并了。
Zhèyàng xiánsǎn de jīgòu，zǎo jiù yīnggāi bèi chèbìng le。
Such idle institutions should have been stopped, or merged with other institutions.
他以此道为生，倒也清闲。
Tā yǐ cǐdào wéishēng，dǎo yě qīngxián。
He makes a living this way, which is pretty idle.
她穿了件粹白的休闲服。
Tā chuān le jiàn cuìbái de xiūxiánfú。
She is wearing pure white casual clothes.
每到农闲，他们就外出打短工。
Měi dào nóngxián，tāmen jiù wàichū dǎ duǎngōng。
When the farm work is out of season, they will go and look for odd jobs.
趁着冬闲，我们出去打工吧。
Chènzhe dōngxián，wǒmen chūqù dǎgōng ba。
Since it\'s the slack winter season, let\'s go out to find a temporary job, shall we?
村长打算利用今年的农闲时节，组织一次冬学。
Cūnzhǎng dǎsuan lìyòng jīnnián de nóngxián shíjié，zǔzhī yícì dōngxué。
The village head is planning a learning program for villagers in this year\'s slack winter season.
这里的村民们都喜欢在农闲的时候斗鸡。
Zhèlǐ de cūnmínmen dōu xǐhuan zài nóngxián de shíhou dòujī。
The villagers have a lot of fun watching cock fighting in their leisure time.
天边有几丝淡淡的风烟，正悠闲地飘散。
Tiānbiān yǒu jǐ sī dàndàn de fēngyān，zhèng yōuxián de piāosǎn。
Waves of mist drift slowly on the horizon.
我家的锅灶只在过年的几天用，平时一直闲着。
Wǒjiā de guōzào zhǐ zài guònián de jǐtiān yòng，píngshí yìzhí xián zhe。
The pot, and stove in my house are used only during Spring Festival.
他是这家公司的后座职员，工作相当清闲。
Tā shì zhè jiā gōngsī de hòuzuò zhíyuán，gōngzuò xiāngdāng qīngxián。
He is a backseat staf memberf in the company, and his work is quite easy.
打水的人在井栏旁闲聊起来。
Dǎshuǐ de rén zài jǐnglán páng xiánliáo qǐlái。
People fetching water chat with each other by the rails of the well.
在办案现场闲杂人等不得越过警戒线。
Zài bànàn xiànchǎng xiánzárénděng bùdé yuèguò jǐngjièxiàn。
People without fixed duties mustn\'t walk past the crime scene\'s police cordon.
这个老婆子可讨厌了，总是传闲话，勾惹矛盾。
Zhège lǎopózi kě tǎoyàn le，zǒngshì chuán xiánhuà，gōurě máodùn。
The old biddy is nasty. She always gossips and arouses conflict.
我们在茶馆里闲坐聊天儿。
Wǒmen zài cháguǎn lǐ xiánzuò liáotiānr。
We sat in the tea shop, chatting.
他是一名流失生，整天游手好闲。
Tā shì yìmíng liúshīshēng，zhěngtiān yóushǒu hàoxián。
He is a dropout, and messes around all day.
门上的告示写着：“闲杂人等，不得擅入”。
Ménshàng de gàoshi xiě zhe ：“xiánzárén děng，bù de shànrù”。
The door has a notice that miscellaneous people may not enter.
十不闲儿莲花落是旧时曲艺的一种，一般在相声之前演唱以招揽生意。
Shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò shì jiùshí qǔyì de yìzhǒng，yìbān zài xiàng shēng zhīqián yǎnchàng yǐ zhāolǎn shēngyì。
&quot;Shibuxianlianhualuo&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments) is an old folk art form, which is generally performed before a comic dialogue to attract attention.
现在的曲艺演员已经很少有人能够演唱什不闲儿莲花落了。
Xiànzài de qǔyì yǎnyuán yǐjing hěnshǎo yǒurén nénggòu yǎnchàng shíbùxiánr liánhuāluò le。
Few of today\'s opera actors can sing &quot;Shibuxian\'erlianhuala&quot; (a singing form accompanied by music on ten percussion instruments).
收秋之后紧接着就要种麦，农忙时节就是这样一刻也不得清闲。
Shōuqiū zhīhòu jǐnjiē zhe jiùyào zhòngmài，nóngmáng shíjié jiùshì zhèyàng yíkè yě bùdé qīngxián。
Wheat has to be planted immediately after the autumn harvest, so there is no time for rest during the busy season.
空闲的时候到氧吧吸氧有利于身体健康。
Kòngxián de shíhou dào yǎngbā xīyǎng yǒulìyú shēntǐjiànkāng。
最近几年，农民们纷纷利用夏闲时间外出打工。
Zuìjìn jǐ nián，nóngmínmen fēnfēn lìyòng xiàxián shíjiān wàichū dǎgōng。
In recent years, many rural labourers go to work for others in their spare time during summer.
每天傍晚舅父都会陪着舅母在海边闲步。
Měitiān bàngwǎn jiùfù dōuhuì péi zhe jiùmǔ zài hǎibiān xiánbù。
My uncle goes to walk with my aunt by the sea in the dusk every day.
她是个多愁善感的人，总觉得满腹闲愁无处诉说。
Tā shì gè duōchóushàngǎn de rén，zǒng juédé mǎnfù xiánchóu wúchù sùshuō。
She is a sentimental person, and always feels like having no one to talk about her sentiments.
张老师的儿子已经18岁了，却整天闲荡，无所事事。
Zhāng lǎoshī de érzi yǐjing shíbāsuì le，què zhěngtiān xiándàng，wúsuǒ shìshì。
Teacher Zhang\'s son is already 18, but he fools around every day.
奶奶正在安享晚年闲静的生活。
Nǎinai zhèngzài ānxiǎng wǎnnián xiánjìng de shēnghuó。
My grandmother is enjoying the quiet life of old age.
表妹是个温柔闲静的女孩，到哪都不爱多说话。
Biǎomèi shì gè wēnróu xiánjìng de nǚhái，dào nǎ dōu búài duō shuōhuà。
My cousin is a quiet girl who seldom speaks wherever she goes.
虽然闲居在家几个月了，可他一点都不想找工作。
Suīrán xiánjū zài jiā jǐgè yuè le，kě tā yìdiǎn dōu bùxiǎng zhǎo gōngzuò。
Having idled at home for several months, he had no intention to find a job.
你怎么总是在扯闲篇？能不能讲点正题？
Nǐ zěnme zǒngshì zài chěxiánpiān？Néngbunéng jiǎng diǎn zhèngtí？
Why are you always talking about irrelevant things? Can you get to the point?
雨中登泰山其实也是别有一番闲趣的。
Yǔ zhōng dēng Tài Shān qíshí yěshì biéyǒu yì fān xiánqù de。
It is another kind of pleasure to climb Mount Taishan in rain.
大家考虑一下是否可以利用这片闲田开发房地产？
Dàjiā kǎolǜ yíxià shìfǒu kěyǐ lìyòng zhèpiàn xiántián kāifā fángdìchǎn？
Can we consider if it is possible to use this patch of spare land for real estate?
表姐拿着勺子闲雅地搅着咖啡的样子很迷人。
Biǎojiě názhe sháozi xiányǎ de jiǎozhe kāfēi de yàngzi hěn mírén。
The way my cousin holds her spoon to mix her coffee is very charming.
这个世上恐怕很少有男人会对闲雅的女人发脾气。
Zhège shìshàng kǒngpà hěn shǎo yǒu nánrén huì duì xiányǎ de nǚrén fāpíqi。
There are few men in this world who get mad at graceful women.
有的时候，太过闲逸的生活很容易让人丧失斗志。
Yǒu de shíhou，tài guò xiányì de shēnghuó hěn róngyì ràng rén sàngshī dòuzhì。
Sometimes leading an easy life can make one forget to struggle.
那家跨国集团决定精减所有部门的闲员。
Nà jiā kuàguó jítuán juédìng jīngjiǎn suǒyǒu bùmén de xiányuán。
The international company decided to lay off its redundant staff in all its departments.
我喜欢在闲在时约几个朋友去公园逛逛。
Wǒ xǐhuan zài xiánzài shí yuē jǐgè péngyou qù gōngyuán guàngguàng。
I enjoy walking in the garden with several friends when I am free.
画上的闲章说明这不是齐白石的作品。
Huà shàng de xiánzhāng shuōmíng zhè búshì Qí Báishí de zuòpǐn。
The seal indicates that it  was not painted by Qi Baishi.
空闲时与朋友一起吟诗作对乃是人生一大快事。
Kòngxián shí yǔ péngyou yìqǐ yínshī zuòduì nǎishì rénshēng yídà kuàishì。
It\'s a real delight of life to chant poetry and write couplets with my friends during my spare time.
他饶有闲趣地在自己的小屋前自斟自酌。
Tā ráoyǒu xiánqù de zài zìjǐ de xiǎo wū qián zìzhēn zìzhuó。
He is leisurely drinking by himself in front of his small house.
因过竹院逢僧话，又得浮生半日闲。
Yīn guò zhú yuàn féng sēng huà，yòu dé fú shēng bàn rì xián。
I met a monk and talked with him for half a day when passing the temple and enjoyed a leisurely time again.

xiánchě
chat

gōngzuò hé xiūxián chuānchājìnxíng

闲话家常
xiánhuàjiācháng

Děng wǒ kòngxián xiàlái zài qù bàifǎng nǐ.
I\'ll call on you when I\'m free.
这个操场空闲两年了。
Zhège cāochǎng kòngxián liǎngnián le.
This games area has been unused for two years.
他一有空闲就下棋。
Tā yìyǒu kòngxián jiù xiàqí.
When he has free time he plays chess.
闲人免进
xiánrén miǎn jìn

Tā zhídào tuìxiū hòu cái xiánxiàlái。
Only when he retired did he start to take it easy.

xián fáng

xián tián
fallow fields

I never expected you to be in the mood for fishing.

xiánzhìzījīn

Xiūxián fúzhuāng
casual clothes
刚才大家闲聊了半天，现在言归正传吧。
Gāngcái dàjiā xiánliáole bàntiān，xiànzài yánguīzhèngzhuàn ba。
We\'ve been chatting for ages – now let\'s get back to business.
一个游手好闲、不愿工作的人很难得到尊重。
Yígè yóushǒuhàoxián 、 búyuàn gōngzuò de rén hěnnán dédào zūnzhòng。
It\'s very difficult for people who are idle and unwilling to work to gain respect.
他当了总经理后终日不得闲。
Tā dāngle zǒngjīnglǐ hòu zhōngrì bù dé xián。
After taking up the post of general manager he was busy the whole day long.
我把种花作为一种休闲方式。
Wǒ bǎ zhònghuā zuòwéi yìzhǒng xiūxiánfāngshì。
I regard gardening as a form of relaxation.

你应该设法好好利用你的闲暇时间。

这篇文章指出，女性空闲时的活动一般是另一种形式的工作，例如购物和做家务。

有了闲空，咱们去看场电影。
Between work and studies she has no time left.
她又工作，又学习，没有空闲时间了。
Reading engages his spare time.
阅读占去了他的空闲时间。
leisure time
空闲时间
vacant time
空闲时间
When dad has free time, he does jobs around the house.
每当爸爸空闲的时候，都会在屋子周围干些杂活。
I thought to myself, it\'s time to take a free weekend.
我暗自想，是时候享受一下空闲的周末了。
I have very few days available at the moment.
我目前没几天是空闲的。
They don\'t have much free time.
他们没有多少空闲时间。
This article says that women\'s leisure activities are usually another form of work, such as shopping and doing housework.
这篇文章指出，女性空闲时的活动一般是另一种形式的工作，例如购物和做家务。
Heather likes to read in her leisure time.
希瑟喜欢在空闲时间看书。

有时间空闲的购物者很多时候只看不买。

空闲的时候，我舅舅就以木雕为乐。

Nǐ kěyǐ zài kòngxián shíjiān wánchéng zuòyè。

好管闲事
hào guǎn xiánshì
meddlesome; officious
爱管闲事

like to poke one\'s nose into other people\'s business

Bié guǎn xiánshì！

他是个爱管闲事的主儿。
Tā shì gè ài guǎn xiánshì de zhǔr。
He is the busybody type.
少管闲事。
shǎo guǎn xián shì。
Mind your own business.
没有闲心管这种事
méiyǒu xiánxīn guǎn zhèzhǒng shì
be too busy to think about such matters; not be in the mood to bother about such matters
管闲事
懒得管闲事。
论说他不该管这闲事。
Mind your own business.
Guǎnhǎo nǐ zìjǐ de shì！（ shǎoguǎnxiánshì ）

it\'s none of your business

primary colors
原色(指红、黄、蓝等)

绿色(或青色)是由蓝黄两色调合而成。

穿蓝衣的修女
blue eyed
长蓝眼睛的
to have blue eyes
有一双蓝眼睛
blue heat in metals
金属的蓝热
light blue
淡蓝色
chose red over blue
先选红色的后选蓝色的
patches of blue sky
(天空的)蓝天部分

呈带状的蓝天
winner of a blue ribbon

various shades of blue
深浅不同的蓝色

一架飞机划破蓝天而过。

蓝天衬着白云。

primary colors
原色(指红、黄、蓝等)

人迹罕至的溪流在黎明的时候呈乳白色，在阳光下呈剑蓝色，而在朦胧的月色下则呈银灰色。
Behind you the coastal hills plunge to the incredibly blue sea backed by the Turkish mountains.

我看着蓝烟在无风的空气中缓慢地飘散开去。

The uplifting of the clouds revealed the blue of a summer sky.

Catarrhal fever is any of several respiratory or oral diseases of livestock such as bluetongue in horses and sheep.
Kǎtārè shì jǐ lèi jiāqín hūxīxìng huò kǒuqiāngxìng jíbìng zhōng de rènhé yì zhǒng jíbìng，rú mǎ hé yáng de lánshébìng。
卡他热是几类家禽呼吸性或口腔性疾病中的任何一种疾病，如马和羊的蓝舌病。
Winter coats had been navy or dark grey.
Dōngtiān de wàiyī yǐshì hǎijūnlán huò ànhuīsè。
冬天的外衣已是海军蓝或暗灰色。

像葡萄酒红或海军蓝一样的深色
妈妈有一件淡蓝色的绢绸旗袍，特别漂亮！
Māma yǒu yíjiàn dànlánsè de juànchóu qípáo，tèbié piàoliàng！
Mother has a light blue silk cheongsam, it is very beautiful.
他的眼珠是淡蓝色的。

light blue

我记得他是穿的一套淡蓝色西装。
The flowers vary from pale lemon yellow through lilac, purple and blue.

这些花多为淡紫色，紫色和蓝色，与淡柠檬黄的花不同。
The sun vanished behind them; even the blue of the sky paled to a bleary grey.

太阳消失在他们背后，甚至天空的蓝色也变成淡灰色。

咱俩比一比，看谁高。
Zánliǎ bǐyibǐ，kàn shuí gāo。
Let\'s stand back to back and see who is taller.
不信咱俩比试比试。
Búxìn zánliǎ bǐshi bǐshi。
If you don\'t believe me, let\'s have a competition and see.
咱俩都是穷苦出身。
Zán liǎ dōushì qióngkǔ chūshēn。
We are both from poor families.
咱俩搭档吧。
Zánliǎ dādàng ba。
Let us two team up.
咱俩分工不分家。
Zán liǎ fēngōng bùfēnjiā。
Let\'s divide the work but still work together.
咱俩的婚事赶年下再办吧。
Zánliǎ de hūnshì gǎn niánxià zài bàn ba。
Let\'s put off our wedding till the Spring Festival.
等你空闲的时候，咱俩谈谈心。
Děngnǐ kòngxián de shíhou，zánliǎ tántan xīn。
The next time you\'re free, let\'s have a heart-to-heart talk.
咱俩
zánliǎ 
we two; both of us; the two of us
咱俩结为夫妻，也是前缘。
Zánliǎ jiéwéi fūqī，yě shì qiányuán。
It is our foreordained affinity that we should become husband and wife.
要是嚷嚷出去，对咱俩都没好处。
Yàoshì rāngrang chūqù，duì zánliǎ dōu méi hǎochu。
Letting this out wouldn\'t do either of us any good.
咱俩赛一赛看。
Zán liǎ sàiyisài kàn。
Let\'s have a competition.
咱俩同路，一块儿走吧。
Zán liǎ tónglù，yíkuàir zǒu ba。
Come along with me. I\'m going that way too.
咱俩又在一起了，真是有缘分。
Zán liǎ yòu zài yìqǐ le，zhēn shì yǒu yuánfèn。
So we\'re together again. It must be fate.
咱俩交情这么好，就不用通过拜盟的形式吧。
Zán liǎ jiāoqíng zhème hǎo，jiù búyòng tōngguò bàiméng dìxíngshì ba。
We are already sworn brothers.
咱俩说的事根本不搭界。
Zánliǎ shuō de shì gēnběn bùdājiè。
There was no connection between what we said.
咱俩泛舟西湖，那该多美啊！
Zánliǎng fànzhōu xīhú，nà gāi duō měi a！
How wonderful it will be if we two go boating on the West lake.
把咱俩的钱总和在一起也不少了。
Bǎ zánliǎ de qián zǒnghé zài yìqǐ yě bùshǎo le。
If we add up all the money we have, it is quite a large amount .
咱俩是老朋友了，用不着说这种客套话！
Zánliǎ shì lǎo péngyǒu le，yòngbùzháo shuō zhèzhǒng kètàohuà！
We are so familiar with each other that we should discard all this formality and politeness.
明天出差，咱俩是一路。
Míngtiān chūchāi，zánliǎ shì yílù。
When we go on business tomorrow, we\'re going the same way.
咱们俩把这筐土搭走。
Zánmenliǎ bǎ zhè kuāng tǔ dāzǒu。
Let\'s carry this basket of earth away.
咱们俩的上班时间掉换一下好吗？
Zánmenliǎ de shàngbān shíjiān diàohuàn yíxià hǎo ma?
Would you mind swopping shifts with me?
咱们俩是一根藤上的苦瓜。
Zánmen liǎ shì yìgēnténgshàng dekǔguā。
We are two bitter gourds on the same vine.
老弟，咱哥俩儿没得说。
Lǎodì，zán gē liǎr méi de shuō。
My boy, we are buddies, aren\'t we?
咱们俩都是受过苦的。
Zanmen liǎ dōushì shòu guò kǔ de。
Both of us have suffered hardships.
如果需要帮忙就来找我，咱们俩没说的。
Rúguǒ xūyào bāngmáng jiù lái zhǎo wǒ，zánmen liǎ méishuō de。
Tell me if you need help. There is no need to argue.
咱们玩桥牌，我们俩一头，你们俩一头。
Zánmen wán qiáopái，wǒmen liǎ yìtóu，nǐmen liǎ yìtóu。
Let\'s play bridge, we two against you two.
咱俩四六分成
咱俩才抬100斤，人家一个人就挑30斤。
有空儿咱俩好好唠一唠
咱俩。
咱俩是朋友，我不能让你坐蜡。
咱俩比试比试，看谁先到终点。
这里很安静，咱俩说说悄悄话挺方便
我也去商场，咱俩正好就伴
咱俩同庚。
去广州，咱俩同路。
这个忙一定帮，咱哥俩没说的。
don\'t lie, both you and I ate that cake.
别撒谎，那块蛋糕咱俩都吃了。
咱们玩桥牌，我们俩一头，你们俩一头。
Zánmen wán qiáopái，wǒmen liǎ yìtóu，nǐmen liǎ yìtóu。
Let\'s play bridge, we two against you two.
他们俩相爱已经多年。
Tāmen liǎ xiāng\'ài yǐjing duō nián。
They have been in love for a number of years.
夫妇俩一直梦想着为自己建立一个安乐窝。
Fūfù liǎ yìzhí mèngxiǎng zhe wèi zìjǐ jiànlì yígè ānlèwō。
The couple always dreamed of building a cosy nest for themselves.
他俩是挺般配的一对儿。
Tā liǎ shì tǐng bānpèi de yíduìr。
The two of them can make a very good couple.
他们俩的技术半斤八两，差不多。
Tāmen liǎ de jìshù bànjīnbāliǎng，chàbuduō。
So far as their skills are concerned, it\'s six of one and half a dozen of the other.
他俩同辈。
Tāliǎ tóngbèi。
They belong to the same generation.
笨拙的伎俩
bènzhuō de jìliǎng 
stupid tricks
咱俩比一比，看谁高。
Zánliǎ bǐyibǐ，kàn shuí gāo。
Let\'s stand back to back and see who is taller.
不信咱俩比试比试。
Búxìn zánliǎ bǐshi bǐshi。
If you don\'t believe me, let\'s have a competition and see.
他们俩素来不对。
Tāmenliǎ sùlái búduì。
The two of them have always been in disagreement.
如果你要用钱，我可以给你，我们姐妹俩还分什么彼此。
Rúguǒ nǐ yào yòngqián，wǒ kěyǐ gěi nǐ，wǒmen jiěmèiliǎ hái fēn shénme bǐcǐ。
If you need money, I\'ll give you some. You and I are sisters—what\'s the difference between yours and mine?
姐妹俩长相差不多。
Jiěmèiliǎ zhǎng xiàng chàbuduō。
The two sisters look very much alike.
他们俩高矮差不多。
Tāmenliǎ gāo\'ǎi chàbuduō。
The two of them are about the same height.
他俩常常通信，交换学术上的看法。
Tāliǎ chángcháng tōngxìn，jiāohuàn xuéshù shàng de kànfǎ。
The two of them frequently write to each other, exchanging views on academic questions.
他们俩各不相让，吵闹不休。
Tāmen liǎ gè bùxiāng ràng，chǎonào bùxiū。
As neither of them was willing to give ground, they quarrelled on and on.
咱俩都是穷苦出身。
Zán liǎ dōushì qióngkǔ chūshēn。
We are both from poor families.
他们俩处得很好。
Tāmen liǎ chǔ de hěn hǎo。
They get along quite well.
他们俩吹了。
Tāmen liǎ chuī le。
That couple have broken up.
咱们俩把这筐土搭走。
Zánmenliǎ bǎ zhè kuāng tǔ dāzǒu。
Let\'s carry this basket of earth away.
咱俩搭档吧。
Zánliǎ dādàng ba。
Let us two team up.
以前他俩合不来，彼此不搭腔。
Yǐqián tāliǎ hébulái，bǐcǐ bùdāqiāng。
In the past the two of them did not get on at all well; they weren\'t even on speaking terms.
他俩见面不打招呼，仿佛谁也不认得谁。
Tāliǎ jiànmiàn bùdǎ zhāohu，fǎngfú shuí yě bú rèn de shuí。
The two of them never greet each other and behave as if they were strangers.
咱们俩的上班时间掉换一下好吗？
Zánmenliǎ de shàngbān shíjiān diàohuàn yíxià hǎo ma?
Would you mind swopping shifts with me?
他们俩一向很对劲儿。
Tāmenliǎ yí xiàng hěn duìjìnr。
The two of them have always got along very well.
他俩对面坐着。
Tāliǎ duìmiàn zuò zhe。
The two of them sat facing each other.
过去他俩不大对头，现在却合得来了。
Guòqù tāliǎ búdà duìtóu，xiànzài què hé delái le。
The two didn\'t get along in the past but now they hit it off well.
他俩从来没有翻过脸。
Tāliǎ cónglái méiyǒu fān guò liǎn。
The two of them have never quarrelled.
咱俩分工不分家。
Zán liǎ fēngōng bùfēnjiā。
Let\'s divide the work but still work together.
弟兄俩分开已经三年了。
Dìxiōng liǎ fēnkāi yǐjing sān nián le。
It is three years since the two brothers parted.
他们俩附耳谈了几句。
Tāmen liǎ fù\'ěr tán le jǐ jù。
They whispered a few words to each other.
咱俩的婚事赶年下再办吧。
Zánliǎ de hūnshì gǎn niánxià zài bàn ba。
Let\'s put off our wedding till the Spring Festival.
他俩咕唧了半天。
Tāliǎ gūji le bàn tiān。
They whispered to each other for a long time.
惯用伎俩
guànyòngjìliǎng
customary tactics; old tricks
他们俩是老同学，过往很密。
Tāmenliǎ shì lǎotóngxué，guòwǎnghěn mì。
The two of them have been friends since school days and see much of each other.
他俩从来没有红过脸。
Tāliǎ cónglái méiyǒu hóngguò liǎn。
There has never been a cross word between the two of them.
他们俩叽叽咕咕地说些什么？
Tāmen liǎ jijigugu de shuō xiē shénme?
What are those two whispering to each other about?
“分而治之”是帝国主义者惯用的伎俩。
Fēn ér zhì zhī shì dìguózhǔyìzhě guànyòng de jìliǎng。
&quot;Divide and rule&quot; has long been a favourite trick of the imperialists.
玩弄卑劣的伎俩
wánnòngbēiliè de jìliǎng
play a nasty trick
他俩经常见面。
Tā liǎ jīngchángjiànmiàn。
They see a lot of each other.
等你空闲的时候，咱俩谈谈心。
Děngnǐ kòngxián de shíhou，zánliǎ tántan xīn。
The next time you\'re free, let\'s have a heart-to-heart talk.
咱们俩是一根藤上的苦瓜。
Zánmen liǎ shì yìgēnténgshàng dekǔguā。
We are two bitter gourds on the same vine.
他们俩是郎舅。
Tāmen liǎ shì lángjiù。
Those two are brothers-in-law.
他们俩的浪漫史在中学时代就开始了。
Tāmen liǎ de làngmànshǐ zài zhōng xué shídài jiù kāishǐ le。
Their romance began in middle school.
咱俩
zánliǎ 
we two; both of us; the two of us
这种冰棍儿一块钱俩。
Zhèzhǒng bīnggùnr yíkuàiqián liǎ。
You can get two of these popsicles for a yuan.
给他俩钱儿。
Gěi tā liǎ qiánr。
Give him some money.
那么多事情，这么俩人干不了。
Nàme duō shìqing，zhème liǎ rén gān bu liǎo。
There\'s so much to do that these few people can hardly cope. or There\'s too much work here for so few people.
他们的伎俩，我们早就领教过了。
Tāmen de jìliǎng，wǒmen zǎo jiù lǐngjiào guò le。
We\'ve encountered their tricks before.
他俩轮流值夜班。
Tā liǎ lúnliú zhí yèbān。
They work on night shifts in turn.
他们俩已经忙活了一上午了。
Tāmen liǎ yǐjing mánghuo le yí shàngwǔ le。
The two of them have been busy the whole morning.
他俩在闹矛盾。
Tā liǎ zài nào máodùn。
The two of them have fallen out.
老弟，咱哥俩儿没得说。
Lǎodì，zán gē liǎr méi de shuō。
My boy, we are buddies, aren\'t we?
他俩谈得怎样了？ —没戏！
Tā liǎ tán de zěnyàng le? —Méixì！
How is their talk going? — Nothing will come of it!
他俩的面貌十分相似。
Tāliǎ de miànmào shífēn xiāngsì。
The two of them look very much alike.
他俩为了一点小事儿就闹翻了。
Tā liǎ wèi le yìdiǎn xiǎo shìr jiù nàofān le。
They fell out with each other over some little thing.
他们俩怎么又闹嘴啦？
Tāmen liǎ zěnme yòu nào zuǐ la?
Why are they bickering again?
娘儿俩
niángr liǎ
mother and son or daughter
他俩结婚缺乏感情基础，是双方家长硬把他们捏合在一起的。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn quēfá gǎnqíngjīchǔ，shì shuāngfāngjiāzhǎngyìngbǎ tāmen niēhé zài yìqǐ de。
Their marriage was not a love match; it was their parents who brought them together against their wishes.
这事他俩一捏弄就那么办了。
Zhè shì tā liǎ yì niēnongjiù nàme bàn le。
The two of them discussed the matter in private and then got it all settled.
老夫妇俩相亲相爱，没有破过一回脸。
Lǎo fūfùliǎ xiāngqīnxiāng\'ài，méiyǒu pòguò yì huí liǎn。
The old couple love each other dearly and have never quarrelled with each other.
他们俩谈恋爱是我牵的线。
Tāmen liǎ tán liàn\'ài shì wǒ qiān de xiàn。
I acted as a go-between for them to meet and fall in love.
他们俩前后脚儿到的。
Tāmen liǎ qiánhòujiǎor dào de。
They arrived at almost the same time.
咱俩结为夫妻，也是前缘。
Zánliǎ jiéwéi fūqī，yě shì qiányuán。
It is our foreordained affinity that we should become husband and wife.
他俩同年，生日又是同一天，真是巧合。
Tāliǎ tóngnián，shēngrì yòushì tóngyì tiān，zhēnshi qiǎohé。
What a coincidence it is that they were born in the same year and on the same day.
他俩非常亲密。
Tāliǎ fēichángqīnmì。
The two of them are on very intimate terms.
要是嚷嚷出去，对咱俩都没好处。
Yàoshì rāngrang chūqù，duì zánliǎ dōu méi hǎochu。
Letting this out wouldn\'t do either of us any good.
他们俩相处得十分融洽。
Tāmen liǎ xiāngchǔ de shífēn róngqià。
The two of them are on very good terms (or are getting on very well together).
咱俩赛一赛看。
Zán liǎ sàiyisài kàn。
Let\'s have a competition.
他俩已聊上天了。
Tāliǎ yǐ liáoshàngtiān le。
The two of them are having a good chat.
他俩只要一见面，就天南海北地神聊起来。
Tā liǎ zhǐyào yí jiànmiàn，jiù tiānnán hǎiběi de shénliáo qǐlai。
Whenever they met, they would start chattering away about everything under the sun.
弟兄俩失和有好几个月了。
Dìxiōng liǎ shīhé yǒu hǎo jǐgè yuè le。
The brothers have been estranged for months.
咱们俩都是受过苦的。
Zanmen liǎ dōushì shòu guò kǔ de。
Both of us have suffered hardships.
由于志趣不同，他俩的关系渐渐疏淡了。
Yóuyú zhìqù bùtóng，tā liǎng de guānxì jiànjiàn shū dàn le。
Pursuing different interests, they gradually drifted apart.
他们俩谁也说不服谁。
Tāmen liǎ shuí yě shuō bu fú shuí。
Neither of them could convince the other.
我们别参与，让他们俩去厮拼。
Wǒmen bié cānyù，ràng tāmenliǎ qù sīpīn。
We should not get involved but let the two of them fight it out.
他俩
tā liǎ
the two of them
他们俩(仨)
tāmen liǎ（sā）
the two (three) of them
他俩抬起杠来就没完。
Tā liǎ táiqǐ gàng lái jiù méi wán。
Those two can go on arguing for hours and hours.
他们哥儿俩天南地北，见一次面不容易。
Tāmen gēr liǎ tiānnándìběi，jiàn yícì miàn bùróngyì。
The two brothers live so far apart they don\'t often get a chance to see each other.
咱俩同路，一块儿走吧。
Zán liǎ tónglù，yíkuàir zǒu ba。
Come along with me. I\'m going that way too.
他们俩脾气很投合。
Tāmen liǎ píqi hěn tóuhé。
The two of them are quite congenial.
他们俩往来密切。
Tāmen liǎ wǎnglái mìqiè。
The two of them are in close contact. or They see a lot of each other.
她俩正在院子里闲聊呢。
Tā liǎ zhèngzài yuànzi lǐ xiánliáo ne。
They are in the courtyard chatting.
兄弟俩面貌相似。
Xiōngdì liǎ miànmào xiāngsì。
The two brothers look alike.
从此，母女俩相依为命。
Cóngcǐ，mǔnǚ liǎ xiāngyīwéimìng。
Since then the mother and the daughter had been dependent on each other for survival.
姐妹俩长得很像。
Jiě mèi liǎ zhǎng de hěn xiàng。
The two sisters are very much alike.
她们俩从小就很要好。
Tāmen liǎ cóngxiǎo jiù hěn yàohǎo。
The two of them have been close friends since childhood.
爷儿俩并肩战斗。
Yér liǎ bìngjiān zhàndǒu。
Father and son fought side by side.
他们俩一般高。
Tāmen liǎ yìbān gāo。
The two of them are the same height.
老见他们俩在一块儿。
Lǎo jiàn tāmenliǎ zài yíkuàir。
The two of them are always seen together.
哥儿俩相貌一样，脾气也一样。
Gēr liǎ xiàng mào yíyàng，píqi yě yíyàng。
The two brothers are alike in appearance and temperament.
有了鸳鸯房作为过渡性用房，他俩马上办了婚事。
Yǒu le yuānyāngfángzuòwéi guòdùxìngyòngfáng，tā liǎ mǎshàngbàn le hūnshì。
They got married as soon as they obtained a mandarin duck apartment as their temporary home.
咱俩又在一起了，真是有缘分。
Zán liǎ yòu zài yìqǐ le，zhēn shì yǒu yuánfèn。
So we\'re together again. It must be fate.
看她们的长相好像是姐儿俩。
Kàn tāmen de zhǎng xiàng hǎo xiàng shì jiěr liǎ。
They look like sisters.
他俩结婚以来连句重话都没有过。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn yǐlái lián jù zhònghuà dōu méiyǒu guò。
Hardly a harsh word has passed between them ever since their marriage.
他们俩又抓挠起来了。
Tāmen liǎ yòu zhuā nao qǐlái le。
The two of them have got into a fight again.
他俩生有一子二女。
Tā liǎ shēngyǒu yì zǐ èr nǚ。
The couple have a son and two daughters.
他俩的性格不配。
Tāliǎ de xìnggé búpèi。
他俩是安危与共的好哥们儿。
Tā liǎ shì ānwēi yǔgòng de hǎo gēmenr。
They are the kind of friends who can share what they have, in both good and bad times.
他俩上次掰脸后就再也没有说过话。
Tā liǎ shàngcì bāiliǎn hòu jiù zài yě méiyǒu shuōguò huà。
They have never spoken to each other since they fought last time.
咱俩交情这么好，就不用通过拜盟的形式吧。
Zán liǎ jiāoqíng zhème hǎo，jiù búyòng tōngguò bàiméng dìxíngshì ba。
We are already sworn brothers.
他俩明天就要拜天地了，家里人忙得不可开交。
Tā liǎ míngtiān jiùyào bàitiāndì le，jiā lǐ rén máng de bùkě kāijiāo。
Tomorrow will be their wedding day. Both their families are busy today preparing for the wedding ceremony.
他俩背对背的坐在草地上，谁也不说话。
Tā liǎ bèiduìbèi de zuò zài cǎodìshàng，shéi yě bùshuōhuà。
The two of them are sitting on the grass back-to-back, no one is speaking a word.
我俩冰炭不容，怎么可能不吵架呢。
Wǒ liǎ bīngtàn bùróng，zěnme kěnéng bùchǎojià ne。
We are like fire and ice, how can we not fight each other ?
她俩在班里的学习成绩差不大离。
Tā liǎ zài bān lǐ de xuéxí chéngjì chàbúdàlí。
They are equally good at their studies.
大家都看出来他俩关系不对劲儿了。
Dàjiā dōu kànchūlái tā liǎ guānxì búduìjìnr le。
Everyone can see that they are not on good terms.
你俩穿连裆裤，别以为我们不知道。
Nǐ liǎ chuān liándāngkù，bié yǐwéi wǒmen bùzhīdào。
Come on, we know you two are ganging up together.
警察一眼就识破了他们串谋作伪证的伎俩。
Jǐngchá yìyǎn jiù shípò le tāmen chuànmóu zuò wěizhèng de jìliǎng。
The police immediately saw through their trick of collaborating to give false testimony.
你俩粗估出来的数字怎么差距这么大。
Nǐ liǎ cūgū chūlái de shùzì zěnme chājù zhème dà。
There is a huge disparity between the numbers you two roughly estimated.
看到他俩在一起，她顿生醋意。
Kàndào tā liǎ zài yìqǐ，tā dùnshēng cùyì。
A sudden feeling of jealousy hit her when seeing the two together.
你们俩怎么搭钩上了？
Nǐmen liǎ zěnme dāgōushàng le？
How did you two establish contact?
咱俩说的事根本不搭界。
Zánliǎ shuō de shì gēnběn bùdājiè。
There was no connection between what we said.
这条街车多，你俩别打闹了。
Zhè tiáo jiē chē duō，nǐ liǎ bié dǎnào le。
You should stop playing near the street, there are too many cars.
这夫妻俩，一年到头地打闹。
Zhè fūqī liǎ，yì nián dàotóu de dǎnào。
The couple argues year round.
你们兄弟俩打内战，多不像话！
Nǐmen xiōngdì liǎ dǎ nèizhàn，duō bú xiàng huà！
It\'s scandalous that there is conflict between your brothers.
我给你们俩做大媒吧。
Wǒ gěi nǐmen liǎ zuò dàméi ba。
I\'d like to be your matchmaker.
你们俩还抵不上他一个人干得多呢。
Nǐmen liǎ hái dǐbúshàng tā yígèrén gàn de duō ne。
He has done more than both of you have done together.
祝你们俩的友情地久天长。
Zhù nǐmen liǎ de yǒuqíng dìjiǔ tiāncháng。
May your friendship go on forever.
谁不知道他俩经常背地里吊膀子呀？！
Shéi bùzhīdào tā liǎ jīngcháng bèidìlǐ diàobàngzi ya？！
Who doesn\'t know that those two often secretly flirt with each other!
他俩已经订亲了，明年就会举行婚礼。
Tā liǎ yǐjing dìngqīn le，míngnián jiùhuì jǔxíng hūnlǐ。
They are already engaged, and will hold the wedding ceremony next year.
她俩用自己的名贵首饰暗中斗富。
Tā liǎng yòng zìjǐ de míngguì shǒushì àn zhōng dòufù。
The two women showed off their wealth through their expensive jewelry.
这俩人冰场斗技，引来不少人围观。
Zhè liǎng rén bīngchǎng dòujì，yǐn lái bùshǎo rén wéiguān。
The two competed with each other in skills, attracting a crowd of onlookers.
他俩是儿时的好友。
Tā liǎng shì érshí de hǎoyǒu。
They were good friends in their childhood.
这个手机的质量太差，不到俩月就需要返修了。
Zhège shǒujī de zhìliàng tài chà，bú dào liǎng yuè jiù xūyào fǎnxiū le。
This cell phone is poor quality, it needed repair after less than two months.
咱俩泛舟西湖，那该多美啊！
Zánliǎng fànzhōu xīhú，nà gāi duō měi a！
How wonderful it will be if we two go boating on the West lake.
他俩方枘圆凿，互不相容。
Tāliǎng fāngruìyuánzáo，hùbùxiāngróng。
They are as incompatible as a round peg and a square hole.
他俩是极好的朋友，也学着古人的样子焚香结拜了兄弟。
Tā liǎ shì jíhǎo de péngyou，yě xué zhe gǔrén de yàngzi fénxiāng jiébài le xiōngdì。
The two best friends burnt incense and swore to be brothers in the way ancient people did.
经过多年风风雨雨的并肩创业，他俩的友谊更深厚了。
Jīngguò duōnián fēngfēngyǔyǔ de bìngjiān chuàngyè，tā liǎ de yǒuyì gèng shēnhòu le。
Their friendship deepened after working together through hardships for many years.
他俩不是桴鼓相应，而是貌合神离。
Tā liǎ búshì fúgǔ xiāngyìng，érshì màohé shénlí。
On the surface they are in harmony, but essentially they are at variance.
他俩好几天没说话，敢是闹别扭了？
Tā liǎ hǎojǐtiān méi shuōhuà，gǎn shì nàobiéniǔ le？
They haven\'t talked to each other for a couple of days, is it possible that they have fallen out?
为了点儿小事你俩就干仗？
Wèile diǎnr xiǎoshì nǐ liǎ jiù gànzhàng?
You are fighting over such a trifle?
这哥儿俩是双胞胎。
Zhè gēr liǎ shì shuāngbāotāi。
The two brothers are twins.
他们哥儿俩打小就是好朋友。
Tāmen gēr liǎ dǎ xiǎo jiùshì hǎopéngyou。
The two of them have been good friends since they were children.
他俩一到一起就咕叽个不停，就好像有多少话要说。
Tā liǎ yídào yìqǐ jiù gūjī gè bùtíng，jiù hǎo xiàng yǒu duōshǎo huà yào shuō。
The moment they meet each other, they keep whispering without stopping as though they have a great deal to say to each other.
挂羊头卖狗肉是那些奸商常用的伎俩。
Guà yángtóu mài gǒuròu shì nàxiē jiānshāng chángyòng de jìliǎng。
Palming off goods inferior to what they purport to be is a common trick of unscrupulous merchants.
虚假招聘惯常的伎俩是先收费后培训，最后毫无音讯。
Xūjiǎ zhāopìn guàncháng de jìliǎng shì xiān shōufèi hòu péixùn，zuìhòu háowú yīnxùn。
A common trick of fake employment is to charge first, offer training and then disappear completely.
他俩呼吸相通，经常在一起讨论生活上遇到的问题。
Tā liǎ hūxī xiāngtōng，jīngcháng zài yìqǐ tǎolùn shēnghuó shàng yùdào de wèntí。
They hold the same opinions, and often discuss problems that they confront in their lives.
他们俩从小就是亲密无间的好火伴。
Tāmen liǎ cóng xiǎo jiùshì qīnmì wújiān de hǎohuǒbàn。
They have been close friends since childhood.
他俩的这段畸恋给他以后的生活造成了很大的影响。
Tā liǎ de zhè duàn jīliàn gěi tā yǐhòu de shēnghuó zàochéng le hěndà de yǐngxiǎng。
Their abnormal love had a great impact on his future life.
老夫妻俩回忆起甜蜜的往事，一边赏月一边叙旧。
Lǎofūqī liǎ huíyìqǐ tiánmì de wǎngshì，yìbiān shǎngyuè yìbiān xùjiù。
While appreciating the moon, the couple recounted their happy stories.
这姐俩每天胶附在一起，形影不离。
Zhè jiě liǎ měitiān jiāofù zài yìqǐ，xíngyǐngbùlí。
The two sisters are always together.
为了这么点事儿，你俩至于结冤吗？
Wèile zhème diǎn shìr，nǐ liǎ zhìyú jiéyuān ma？
Is it worthwhile to hate each other over such a trifle?
我俩从小学开始就是好姐们儿。
Wǒ liǎ cóng xiǎoxué kāishǐ jiùshì hǎojiěmenr。
We have been like good sisters since primary school.
他俩不顾门卫的阻拦，径行向这里走来。
Tā liǎ búgù ménwè de zǔlán，jìngxíng xiàng zhèlǐ zǒulái。
They walked straight over here, regardless of the guards\' objections.
他俩打架打急了眼，一直打到一方把另一方开瓢儿，才罢手。
Tā liǎ dǎjià dǎjí le yǎn，yìzhí dǎdào yìfāng bǎ lìng yìfāng kāipiáor，cái bàshǒu。
They were greatly enraged in their fight and didn\'t stop until one hurt the other\'s head.
刀剑相碰，声音铿然，他俩比武没分出上下。
Dāojiàn xiāngpèng，shēngyīn kēngrán，tā liǎ bǐwǔ méi fēnchū shàngxià。
The swords clashed clearly and loudly, but they were equally matched in the martial arts contest.
再次睽离，他俩又要忍受相思之苦了。
Zàicì kuílí，tā liǎ yòu yào rěnshòu xiāngsī zhī kǔ le。
Leaving each other again, they will miss each other from afar once more.
他俩本来就是认识的，这摆明了是在拉偏架嘛！
Tā liǎ běnlái jiùshì rènshi de，zhè bǎimíng le shì zài lāpiānjià ma！
Since they already know each other, it is obvious that are partial to one another.
老俩口每天照顾孙子，忙得不亦乐乎。
Lǎoliǎkǒu měitiān zhàogù sūnzi，máng de búyì lèhū。
The old couple are awfully happy to take care of their grandson.
他们俩家定下了婚约，立此存照。
Tāmen liǎ jiā dìngxià le hūnyuē，lìcǐ cúnzhào。
The two families struck an affiance, and kept a record.
你俩是天造地设的连枝，还是尽早结婚吧。
Nǐ liǎ shì tiānzào dìshè de liánzhī，háishi jìnzǎo jiéhūn ba。
You are an ideal couple. You\'d better get married quickly.
你俩的结合真是良缘天配。
Nǐ liǎ de jiéhé zhēnshì liángyuán tiānpèi。
Your combination is destined to be good match for marriage.
他俩走在林荫路上，畅想着未来。
Tā liǎ zǒuzài línyīnlù shàng，chàngxiǎng zhe wèilái。
Walking on the avenue, they think freely about their future.
他俩关系不太好，经常骂架。
Tā liǎ guānxì bú tài hǎo，jīngcháng màjià。
They do not get along well with each other, and often quarrel.
他俩说的话满拧，真是奇怪。
Tā liǎ shuō de huà mǎnnǐng，zhēnshì qíguài。
It is very strange that those two are completely opposite to each other.
如果需要帮忙就来找我，咱们俩没说的。
Rúguǒ xūyào bāngmáng jiù lái zhǎo wǒ，zánmen liǎ méishuō de。
Tell me if you need help. There is no need to argue.
他俩的性格都很绵善，所以很少吵架。
Tā liǎ de xìnggé dōu hěnmiánshàn，suǒyǐ hěnshǎo chǎojià。
The two are mild and gentle, so they seldom quarrel.
她俩一看就是母女，她长得真像她的妈妈！
Tā liǎ yíkàn jiùshì mǔnǚ，tā zhǎng de zhēn xiàng tā de māma！
You know they are mother and daughter the moment you see them. She resembles her mother in every way.
离别时刻他们俩难分难舍，又说了好多惜别的话。
Líbié shíkè tāmenliǎ nánfēn nánshě，yòu shuō le hǎo duō xībié de huà。
At the time to bid farewell, the two could hardly tear themselves apart from each other, and kept talking.
经过几天的你来我往，他俩很快就成了朋友。
Jīngguò jǐtiān de nǐlái wǒwǎng，tā liǎ hěnkuài jiù chéng le péngyou。
After being together for several days, the two very quickly became friends.
赛场上他俩是你争我夺的对手，生活中却是好兄弟。
Sàichǎng shàng tā liǎ shì nǐzhēng wǒduó de duìshǒu，shēnghuó zhōng què shì hǎoxiōngdì。
They are competitive rivals on the court, but they are like brothers in real life.
他俩都年轻气盛，几句话不和就打了起来。
Tā liǎ dōu niánqīng qìshèng，jǐ jù huà bùhé jiù dǎ le qǐlái。
Both of them are young people full of vim and vigor, they get into a fight whenever they have a disagreeable conversation.
小娃娃胖嘟嘟的脸儿上，笑起来还有俩酒窝呢。
Xiǎowáwá pàngdūdū de liǎnrshàng，xiàoqǐlái háiyǒu liǎ jiǔwō ne。
The baby shows two dimples on his chubby cheeks when he smiles.
他俩棋力悬殊，开局不多时，一方就被另一方杀了个片甲不留。
Tā liǎ qílì xuánshū，kāijú bùduō shí，yìfāng jiù bèi lìng yìfāng shā le gè piànjiǎ bùliú。
There was a wide gap between their chess skills, and not long after the game started, one side was completely wiped out by the other.
近来我们俩的来往比较频密！
Jìnlái wǒmen liǎ de láiwǎng bǐjiào pínmì！
Recently, we have had a close relationship.
这次大赛上，他俩势均力敌平分秋色。
Zhècì dàsài shàng，tā liǎ shìjūnlìdí píngfēnqiūsè。
They two are evenly matched in power and strength in the tournament.
看来我俩的情缘还没有了结。
Kànlái wǒ liǎ de qíngyuán hái méiyǒu liǎojié。
It seems that the love between us has not fulfilled its course.
他俩日夕相伴，形影不离。
Tā liǎ rìxī xiāngbàn，xíngyǐng bùlí。
They are together day and night, you never see them apart.
他俩不仅有上下级关系，而且还是好朋友。
Tā liǎ bùjǐn yǒu shàngxiàjí guānxì，érqiě hái shi hǎopéngyou。
They are not only superior and subordinate, but also friends.
有机会我一定绍介你们俩互相认识。
Yǒujīhuì wǒ yídìng shàojiè nǐmen liǎ hùxiāng rènshi。
I\'ll introduce you two if there is an opportunity.
我俩约好了，明天去申领结婚证！
Wǒ liǎ yuēhǎo le，míngtiān qù shēnlǐng jiéhūnzhèng ！
We have arranged to apply for a marriage certificate tomorrow.
在共同的战斗生活中，他俩成了生死交。
Zài gòngtóng de zhàndòu shēnghuó zhōng，tā liǎ chéng le shēngsǐjiāo。
They became best friends through fighting and living together.
怪不得他俩长得那么像，原来是一对双生子。
Guàibùdé tā liǎ zhǎng de nàme xiàng，yuánlái shì yí duì shuāngshēngzǐ。
No wonder they look so much like each other. It turns out that they are twins.
他俩结仇的原委说来话长了，有时间我跟你慢慢道来。
Tā liǎ jiéchóu de yuánwěi shuōlái huàcháng le，yǒu shíjiān wǒ gēn nǐ mànmàn dàolái。
Why they became enemies is a long story, I\'ll tell you when there is time.
他俩的私怨很深，为什么这样我们都不清楚。
Tā liǎ de sīyuàn hěnshēn，wèishénme zhèyàng wǒmen dōu bùqīngchu。
They bear a deep grudge against each other, but we don\'t know why this is so.
他俩厮守多年，感情越来越深。
Tā liǎ sīshǒu duōnián，gǎnqíng yuèláiyuè shēn。
They have been together for many years, and are more and more in love with each other.
把那个抬筐拿过来，你俩把这些货物抬到车上去。
Bǎ nàge táikuāng náguòlái，nǐliǎ bǎ zhèxiē huòwù táidào chēshàng qù。
Bring that big basket here, carry all the goods to the truck.
他俩在婚礼上发誓要相爱到天荒地老。
Tā liǎ zài hūnlǐ shàng fāshì yào xiāngài dào tiānhuāng dìlǎo。
The two vowed in their wedding ceremony that they would love each other forever.
他俩最终反目，都是你挑拨离间造成的。
Tā liǎ zuì zhōng fǎnmù，dōushì nǐ tiǎobō líjiān zàochéng de。
They turned against each other, primarily because you had been trying to drive a wedge between them.
我们俩是铁哥们儿，他有困难我一定会帮忙的。
Wǒmen liǎ shì tiěgēmenr，tā yǒu kùnnan wǒ yídìng huì bāngmáng de。
We are very close friends and whenever he has difficulties, I\'ll help him out.
他俩打得不可开交，丝毫没有要停手的意思。
Tā liǎ dǎ de bùkěkāijiāo，sīháo méiyǒu yào tíngshǒu de yìsi。
The two are busily engaged in fighting, and have no signs of stopping.
我俩是同生共死的好战友。
Wǒ liǎ shì tóngshēng gòngsǐ de hǎo zhànyǒu。
We are close comrades-in-arms, willing to live and die together.
他俩有共同的艺术主张，真可谓同声相应，同气相求。
Tā liǎ yǒu gòngtóng de yìshù zhǔzhāng，zhēn kěwèi tóngshēng xiāngyìng，tóngqì xiāngqiú。
Having the same artistic view, they can be considered congenial companions.
他俩早就偷香窃玉，暗自私通了。
Tā liǎ zǎo jiù tōuxiāng qièyù，ànzì sītōng le。
They have long indulged in illicit sexual relations.
他俩在大街上相互推搡，打了起来。
Tā liǎ zài dàjiē shàng xiānghù tuīsǎng，dǎ le qǐlái。
They pushed and jostled each other in the street, which then turned into a fight.
多年来，他俩一直息息相通。
Duōnián lái，tā liǎng yìzhí xīxī xiāngtōng。
They have accompanied each other all these years.
由于时间匆忙，老师没来得及细问他俩的事。
Yóuyú shíjiān cōngmáng，lǎoshī méi láidejí xìwèn tā liǎ de shì。
Due to the time pressure, the teacher had no time to inquire about their conditions.
说到关键问题的时候，他们俩总是乡谈。
Shuōdào guānjiàn wèntí de shíhou，tāmenliǎ zǒngshì xiāngtán。
They always withdraw when talking about the key issues.
他俩难得有意见相合的时候。
Tā liǎ nándé yǒu yìjiàn xiānghé de shíhou。
They seldom agree with each other.
夫妻俩之间就算有什么矛盾也不能拳脚相加。
Fūqī liǎ zhījiān jiùsuàn yǒu shénme máodùn yě bùnéng quánjiǎo xiāngjiā。
No matter what happens, couples should not fight.
听你们的口音，你们俩应该是小同乡吧！
Tīng nǐmen de kǒuyīn，nǐmen liǎ yīnggāi shì xiǎotóngxiāng ba！
Judging from your accents, you must be from the same place.
他们俩是形影不离的好朋友。
Tāmen liǎ shì xíngyǐng bùlí de hǎopéngyou。
The two friends are always together.
他们俩表面上很合得来，其实内心里各有异趣。
Tāmen liǎ biǎomiàn shàng hěn hédélái，qíshí nèixīn lǐ gè yǒu yìqù。
They seem to get along well with each other, actually they have different interests.
他们俩意气相投，自然而然走到了一起。
Tāmen liǎ yìqì xiāngtóu，zìrán érrán zǒudào le yìqǐ。
They have the same likes and dislikes, so they naturally became friends.
在他们的结婚仪式上，由老所长给他俩做证婚人。
Zài tāmen de jiéhūn yíshì shàng，yóu lǎosuǒcháng gěi tāliǎng zuò zhènghūnrén。
At their wedding ceremony, the old bureau chief was their chief witness.
把咱俩的钱总和在一起也不少了。
Bǎ zánliǎ de qián zǒnghé zài yìqǐ yě bùshǎo le。
If we add up all the money we have, it is quite a large amount .
按照族谱，我们俩竟是一家。
Ànzhào zúpǔ，wǒmenliǎ jìngshì yìjiā。
It is so surprising that we belong to the same family, according to the clan tree.
咱俩是老朋友了，用不着说这种客套话！
Zánliǎ shì lǎo péngyǒu le，yòngbùzháo shuō zhèzhǒng kètàohuà！
We are so familiar with each other that we should discard all this formality and politeness.
她俩期末考试并列第一。
Tāliǎ qīmòkǎoshì bìnglièdìyī。
They came equal first in the end of term exams.
他俩并列冠军。
Tāliǎ bìnglièguànjūn。
They are joint champions.
他俩不分伯仲。
Tāliǎ bùfēnbózhòng。
There\'s little to choose between them.

他们俩在会上眉目传情。
Tāmenliǎ zàihuìshàng méimùchuánqíng。
They were eyeing each other up at the meeting.
他俩串通作伪证。
Tāliǎ chuàntōng zuòwěizhèng。
The two men colluded as false witnesses.

Dāngchū tāliǎ jiù bùhé。
Even in those days they didn\'t get on.
夫妻俩睹物思人，想起了远在他乡的儿子。
Fūqīliǎ dǔwùsīrén，xiǎngqǐle yuǎnzàitāxiāngde érzi。
The couple saw something that reminded them of their son who was far away from home.
夫妻俩努力工作以扶养父母和孩子。
Fūqīliǎ nǔlìgōngzuò yǐ fúyǎng fùmǔ hé háizǐ。
The couple work hard to provide for their parents and children.
俩人相差个两三岁。
Liǎrén xiāngchàgè liǎngsānsuì。
There\'s about two or three years between them.
他俩好得像是焊在了一起。
Tāliǎ hǎode xiàngshì hànzàile yìqǐ。
The two of them go about as if they were joined at the hip.

Táopiào shì tā guànyòng de jìliǎng.

Wǒmen shípòle tā de jìliǎng.
We saw through his ploy.

俩人的观点有距离。

笨手笨脚地撞倒人/某物
to catch sb doing sth
撞见某人做某事
to collide with sth/sb
与某物/某人碰撞
to be on a collision course
[lit] 必然相撞
to crack one\'s head/knee on sth
头/膝盖在某物上撞了一下
a car/plane crash
撞车/飞机失事
to crash into sth
猛地撞上某物
he crashed the car into a wall
他把车撞到了墙上
The brakes failed and his car crashed into a tree.
由于刹车失灵，他的车撞树上了。
The truck had hit a wall.
卡车撞了墙。
(up)on impact
在碰撞时
he just missed the wall
他差点撞到墙上
to send sth flying
把某物撞飞
to slam into sth
猛然撞上某物
to smash through sth
撞穿某物
The unaccommodating bus driver pulled out when she was banging on the door.
那个冷漠的公共汽车司机突然发动了车，她就重重地撞在了门上。
I know you crashed my car, but don\'t worry. It\'s cool. I wanted a new one anyway.
我知道你撞坏了我的车，不过别担心。太好了，我正想换辆新的。

只有在汽车前段受到撞击时，安全气囊才会打开。
The trucks had an accident and exploded on impact.
这些卡车遇到了事故，因碰撞而发生了爆炸。

他因冲撞射门球员而得了一张红牌。

从大楼反射的光线使他暂时失明并导致他撞车。

门砰的一声巨响, 把她的脸撞了.

他摔在地板上发出一声可怕的撞击声。

横冲直撞
héngchōngzhízhuàng
push one\'s way by shoving or bumping; jostle and elbow one\'s way; dash around madly; barge about; charge about
他带着几个家丁在路上横冲直撞，简直目中无人。

héngchōngzhízhuàng

He grimaced when he saw the amount of homework he had to do.
Kànzhe nà yí dà duī bìxū wánchéng de zuòyè，tā mǎnliǎn chóuróng。
看着那一大堆必须完成的作业，他满脸愁容。
She took copious notes.
Tā jìle yí dà duī bǐjì。
她记了一大堆笔记。
I am brimful of chowder.
Wǒ chīle yí dà duī záhuì。
我吃了一大堆杂烩。
He found a haystack and，exhausted，lay down to sleep.
Tā fāxiàn yí gè gāncǎo duī，jīnpílìjìn de tǎngxià jiù shuì le。
他发现一个干草堆，筋疲力尽地躺下就睡了。
She then proceeded to stack up a pile of CD\'s in the corner.
Ránhòu tā jìxù zài jiǎoluò lǐ duīqǐ yì dié CD chàngpiàn。
然后她继续在角落里堆起一叠CD唱片。
The books were piled up helter-skelter.
Shū bèi húluàn de duī zài yìqǐ。
书被胡乱地堆在一起。
The books lay all together in a heap.
Shū dōu duī zài yìqǐ。
书都堆在一起。
They were piled up higgledy-piggledy.
Tāmen bèi záluàn de duīfàng zài yìqǐ。
它们被杂乱地堆放在一起。
I\'d clawed my way back up the mountain of rubble like an animal.
Wǒ bìxū xiàng zhī dòngwù yíyàng páhuí suìshí duīchéng de xiǎoshān shàngqù。
我必须像只动物一样爬回碎石堆成的小山上去。
The atomic reactor used a gas coolant.
Zhège yuánzǐ fǎnyìngduī shǐyòngle yì zhǒng qìtài lěngdòngjì。
这个原子反应堆使用了一种气态冷冻剂。
The whole family clustered around the fire for warmth.
Zhè yìjiārén dōu jùzài huǒduī páng qǔnuǎn。
这一家人都聚在火堆旁取暖。
This heap of stones will act as a barrier.
Zhè duī shítou jiāng shì yí dào píngzhàng。
这堆石头将是一道屏障。
He lit a book match and let it fall among the tangle.
Tā diǎnrán le yì gēn huǒchái，bǎ tā diū jìn nà duī luànzāozāo de dōngxi lǐ。
他点燃了一根火柴，把它丢进那堆乱糟糟的东西里。
The stack of the blighted rootstock will soon felt together.
这堆枯死的根茎不久就会粘结在一起。
Piles of fallen leaves carpeted the forest floor with gold.
Chéngduī de luòyè wèi sēnlín zhōng de dìmiàn pūshàngle yì céng jīnhuángsè de tǎnzi。
成堆的落叶为森林中的地面铺上了一层金黄色的毯子。
We stacked up everything to make the room tidy for Christmas.
Wǒmen bǎ suǒyǒu dōngxi dōu tuǒshàn duījī qǐláile，yǐbiàn shèngdànjié de shíhou fángjiān néng zhěngqí yìxiē。
我们把所有东西都妥善堆积起来了，以便圣诞节的时候房间能整齐一些。
土堆
tǔduī
mound
路上的壅土堆得太高，以致于堵住了道路。
Lùshàng de yōngtǔ duī de tài gāo，yǐzhìyú dǔzhù le dàolù。
The rise in the road is so high that it is impassable.
马王堆出土的殉葬品有很高的考古价值。
Mǎwángduī chūtǔ de xùnzàngpǐn yǒu hěngāo de kǎogǔ jiàzhí。
The sacrificial objects unearthed in Mawangdui are of high value to archeological researches.
工地里堆放了大量建房用的灰土。
Gōngdì lǐ duīfàng le dàliàng jiànfáng yòng de huītǔ。
On the building site, there was a lot of limestone soil piled up for house building.
匡一匡这堆土有多少方
a hill of potatoes
甘薯根部的小土堆
Blown soil mounded on the window sill.
Chuī luò de chéntǔ duījī zài chuāngtái shàng。
吹落的尘土堆积在窗台上。
In a few centuries the collapsed building looks very much like a mound of earth.
几个世纪过后，这些坍塌的大楼看起来只不过是一堆尘土而已。
They built small mounds to hide behind.
Tāmen duīle xiē xiǎotǔdūn lái yǐncáng。
他们堆了些小土墩来隐藏。

马王堆(在湖南)

废料堆
fèiliàoduī
scrap heap; waste heap
用特殊材料堆焊制成的零件，使用寿命更长。
Yòng tèshū cáiliào duīhàn zhìchéng de língjiàn，shǐyòng shòumìng gèng cháng。
Spare parts welded from special materials can last longer.
各种木料乱堆在一起。
Gè zhǒng mùliào luàn duī zài yìqǐ。

院子里堆满了等待加工的生料。

The courtyard is filled with raw materials waiting to be processed.
写文章要学会剪裁，不要堆砌材料。

柴火堆
cháihuǒduī
a pile (or stack) of firewood
大家围着火堆，烘烤着冻得发僵的手。
Dàjiā wéi zhe huǒduī，hōngkǎo zhe dòng de fā jiāng de shǒu。
Everybody sat round the fire, warming their frozen hands.
在野外生一个火堆就不会有野兽来攻击你了。
Zài yěwài shēng yígè huǒduī jiù búhuì yǒu yěshòu lái gōngjī nǐ le。
A bonfire in the wilderness can help you keep beasts away.
干燥的柴禾在火堆里噼啪作响。
Gānzào de cháihé zài huǒduī lǐ pīpā zuòxiǎng。
The dry faggots crackled in the fire.
燃起一堆篝火
ránqǐ yì duī gōuhuǒ
light a bonfire
堆在那边的木柴捆子是用来烧火的。
Duīzài nàbiān de mùchái kǔnzi shì yònglái shāohuǒ de。
The bales of firewood piled there are used to make fire.
围着火堆取暖。
We made a bonfire of windrow in the garden.
我们在花园里点燃火堆把枯叶烧掉。
I threw the fagot into the fire.
我把柴捆扔进火堆里。
The campers sat around the fire deep into the night.

露营者深夜围在火堆周围。
They set up their bunk for the night around the fire.

他们在火堆旁边支起睡床准备过夜。

Wǎnshang，rénmen wéizhe huǒduī tiàowǔ。

They lit a fire to smoke the mosquitoes away.
Tāmen shēng qǐyìduīhuǒ xūn wénzi。
他们生起一堆火熏蚊子。
The widow leapt into the funeral pyre.

这个寡妇跳进火葬柴堆。

Tā de yǐzi fàngzài yì duī shūběn zázhì zhōng。
他的椅子放在一堆书本杂志中。
The storm left the drivewaylittered with sticks nd debris.
Tā de cángshūshì hěn luàn，yǐzi shàng fàngzhe yìduīduī de shū。
他的藏书室很乱，椅子上放着一堆堆的书。
Among the eyes of newts and toes of frogs are mounds of dried seahorses.
yìduīduī gàn hǎimǎ bǎifàng zài róngyuán yǎn Hétián jītuǐ zhōngjiān。
一堆堆干海马摆放在蝾螈眼和田鸡腿中间。
You should add the remaining laptops into the pile over there.
Nǐ yīngdāng bǎ shèngyú de bǐjìběndiànnǎo fàngdào nàbiān de huò duī zhōng。
你应当把剩余的笔记本电脑放到那边的货堆中。
The running of the reactor will evolve tremendous heat.
反应堆在运行过程中会释放大量的热。
菜市场门外摆着成堆的蔬菜。
Càishìchǎng ménwài bǎizhe chéngduī de shūcài。
Vegetables are piled (or heaped) up outside the food market.
我们不要等问题成了堆才去解决。
Wǒmen búyào děng wèntí chéng le duī cái qù jiějué。
We shouldn\'t wait until problems pile up before we try to solve them.

duīqì cízǎo

bǎ màijiē duī zài chǎngshàng

废料堆
fèiliàoduī
scrap heap; waste heap
你估一估这堆西红柿有几斤。
Nǐ gūyigū zhè duī xīhóngshì yǒu jǐ jīn。
Can you tell how many jin of tomatoes there are in this heap?
他埋头于故纸堆中，不问世事。
Tā máitóu yú gùzhǐduī zhōng，bú wèn shìshì。
He buried himself in his musty old books and took no notice of the outside world.
屋子里横七竖八地堆放着许多杂物。
Wūzi lǐ héngqīshùbā de duīfàng zhe xǔduō zá wù。
The room was cluttered with all sorts of things.
大家围着火堆，烘烤着冻得发僵的手。
Dàjiā wéi zhe huǒduī，hōngkǎo zhe dòng de fā jiāng de shǒu。
Everybody sat round the fire, warming their frozen hands.
胡诌了一大堆理由
húzhōu le yí dà duī lǐyóu
cook up a lot of excuses

他躲进了柴堆，才逃过这一劫。

He piled up all the magazines that he has read on the table.
他把刚买来的大白菜堆垛在地窖里。

The cabbages he bought are all piled up in the cellar.

国庆节的时候，大概有几万人堆集在广场上。

These maths questions really baffled Xiao Ming.

这个过厅里堆满了杂物，又脏又乱。

在野外生一个火堆就不会有野兽来攻击你了。

The indignation long accumulated in my heart can not be removed easily.
堆在那边的木柴捆子是用来烧火的。

The bales of firewood piled there are used to make fire.

His heart seems to be pressed by piles of stones. He wants to talk but can\'t.

The courtyard is filled with wood and tiles for building houses.

Chuī luò de chéntǔ duījī zài chuāngtái shàng。
吹落的尘土堆积在窗台上。
His library was a cluttered room with piles of books on every chair.
Tā de túshūshì língluànbùkān，jiùlián měi zhāng yǐzi shàng dōu duīmǎnle shū。
他的图书室凌乱不堪，就连每张椅子上都堆满了书。
She took copious notes.
Tā jìle yí dà duī bǐjì。
她记了一大堆笔记。
I am brimful of chowder.
Wǒ chīle yí dà duī záhuì。
我吃了一大堆杂烩。
an undigested mass of facts gathered at random
wèijīng zhěnglǐ、 suíyì duījī de shìshí

把我吓一跳
bǎ wǒ xiàyítiào
give me a start (or scare)
急遽的敲门声把她吓了一跳。
Jíjù de qiāomén shēngbǎ tā xià le yí tiào。
A sudden sharp knock on the door startled her.
她的声音突然变成高八度，把在场的人吓了一跳。
Tā de shēngyīn tūrán biànchéng gāo bādù，bǎ zài chǎng de rén xià le yítiào。
She raised her voice high, which gave a start to the people around.
他咬牙切齿地说出仇人的名字，吓我们一跳。
Tā yǎoyá qièchǐ de shuōchū chóurén de míngzi，xià wǒmen yítiào。
He spoke out his enemy\'s name between clinched teeth, which gives us a fright.
他冷孤丁地从黑处蹦了出来，吓了我一大跳。
Tā lěnggūdīng de cóng hēichù bèng le chūlái，xià le wǒ yí dà tiào。
He jumped out from the dark suddenly, which frightened me badly.
冷不丁地钻出来一个人，吓了我一跳。
terrified at the sight
一看见这情景就吓了一跳
The flit of the cat surprised everyone in the room.
Nà zhǐ māo yìshǎn\'érguò，bǎ wūlǐ de měi gè rén dōu xiàle yí tiào。
那只猫一闪而过，把屋里的每个人都吓了一跳。
That\'s when I learned to my horror that she was coming here.
得知她要来这儿的时候，真是把我吓了一跳。
The explosion made a loud noise and scared us all.
爆炸产生巨响，我们都被吓了一跳。
The earthquake made everybody jump.
突如其来的地震让每个人都吓了一跳。
The men were thrilled by a loud whistle blow.
Rénmen bèi jùdà de kǒushào shēng xià le yí tiào。
人们被巨大的口哨声吓了一跳。
She surprised the couple.
Tā bǎ zhè duì fūfù xiàle yítiào。
她把这对夫妇吓了一跳。
A sudden loud scream upstairs scared me last night.
昨晚，楼上忽然传来的一声尖叫吓了我一跳。
He stepped out of the shadows and gave me such a fright.
他从阴影中走了出来，吓了我一跳。
Her huge cough startled me.
她咳嗽的声音很大，吓了我一跳。
it gave me quite a turn
[inf] 吓了我一跳
This let me in for a big surprise.
Zhè xiàle wǒ yí dà tiào。
这吓了我一大跳。
It caused her to start back in terror.
她被惊吓得往后跳了一下。
吓破了胆
xià pò le dǎn
be scared out of one\'s wits
我们的几次反击吓破了敌人的心胆。
Wǒmen de jǐ cì fǎnjī xiàpò le dírén de xīndǎn。
Our attacks frightened the enemies greatly.
吓破了心胆。
to be terrified of sth
被某事吓破胆
一开头她吓坏了，后来才定下神来。
Yì kāitóu tā xiàhuài le，hòulái cái dìngxià shén lái。
At first she was terrified, then she pulled herself together.
吓坏了
xiàhuài le
be badly scared
看你凶神恶煞的样子，都把孩子吓坏了。
Kàn nǐ xiōngshén èshà de yàngzi，dōu bǎ háizi xià huài le。
You look so frightening, and the kids are really scared.
电梯忽然掉了下来，吓坏了等电梯的人们。
Diàntī hūrán diào le xiàlái，xiàhuài le děng diàntī de rénmén。
The elevator suddenly dropped, scaring the people in it.
汽车突然起火，乘客都吓坏了。
The little girl was scared when she saw the ghost.
这个小女孩看到鬼魂的时候被吓坏了。

银行职员被罪犯的威胁吓坏了，所以他没有按报警器。
The lonely traveler was scared by the yip of tykes.
那个孤独的旅行者被野狗的狂吠声给吓坏了。

卧室传来的声响吓坏了那个胆怯的小偷，他马上逃跑了。
His dark humor tends to scare people instead of making them feel at ease.
Tā de hēisè yōumò wǎngwǎng bǎ rénmen xiàhuài le，érbúshì shǐ tāmen fàngsōng。
他的黑色幽默往往把人们吓坏了，而不是使他们放松。
His erratic behavior scared the other students.
Tā de gǔguài jǔdòng xiàhuàile qítā tóngxué。
他的古怪举动吓坏了其他同学。
Your hired bullies did a good job on poor Joe last.
Nǐ gù lái de èbà zuìhòu bǎ kělián de qiáo xià huài le。
你雇来的恶霸最后把可怜的乔吓坏了。

Réng hěn xūruò de Àolìfú bèi zhè tiáo kuángfèi de gǒu xiàhuài le。

He\'s not going to be frightened unless we\'ve got something he can\'t argue away.

The girl was frightened by her first petit mal.
Dì-yī cì diānxián de fāzuò bǎ nàgè nǚhái xiàhuài le。
第一次癫痫的发作把那个女孩吓坏了。
The nightlife of Montmartre awed the unsophisticated tourists.
Méngmǎtèqū de yèshēnghuó xiàhuàile zhèxiē méi jiànguò shìmiàn de lǚyóuzhě。

她开车技术很好，但是她在路上不计后果地超车行为可把我吓坏了。

Nàzhǒng dāizhì de yàngzi xiàhuàile tā de péngyǒumen。
那种呆滞的样子吓坏了他的朋友们。
任何时候我们都不能被眼前的困难吓倒。
Rènhé shíhou wǒmen dōu bùnéng bèi yǎnqián de kùnnan xiàdǎo。
At anytime, we should not be frightened by the difficulties in front of us.
旱情诚然是严重的，但是它吓不倒我们。

True, the drought is serious, but it can\'t scare us.
歹徒的凶蛮相是无论如何也吓不倒我们的。

Gangsters can never threaten us by their cruelty.

kǒnghè

xià dāi le

xià de fādǒu

He turned ashen pale and trembled with fear.
吓瘫了
xià tān le
be paralysed with fright

Zhèngrén shòudào wēihè wèi néngzuòzhèng。
The witness was kept from testifying by intimidation.

Bùzhī cóng nǎlǐ chuánlái le yìshēng cǎnháo，xià de tā húnbúfùtǐ。

车祸就发生在眼前，我吓得都快掉魂儿了。

You look so frightening, and the kids are really scared.
她的声音突然变成高八度，把在场的人吓了一跳。

She raised her voice high, which gave a start to the people around.
他最爱讲些诡诞的故事，来吓唬胆小的女孩儿。

He is fond of telling exaggerated, and unusual stories to scare cowardly girls.
你不要冒充鬼物吓唬人了，没人怕你。

The criminals fled in panic after the shout of the police.

不能逼迫人家承认错误。
The scandal drove him to leave the company.
这个丑闻逼迫他离开了公司。
How does he act like a literal slave driver?
他怎么就知道逼迫下属干活呢？
to do sth under constraint
受逼迫而做某事
to screw sth out of sb
[esp BRIT] [inf] 逼迫某人拿出某物
She looked him in the eye and forced herself to tell him the truth.
Tā zhíshìzhe tā，bīpò zìjǐ bǎ zhēnxiàng gàosu tā。
她直视着他，逼迫自己把真相告诉他。

Tiānsè yǐjing bījìn huánghūn。
Dusk is closing in.
敌军已逼近城门。
Díjūn yǐbījìn Chéngmén。

Mr. Li junior is not happy recently, he was forced to marry against his will.

逼近领先的赛跑运动员

他在最后一轮比赛中逼近了他的对手。
The female dolphins closed in on him, led by an old one who has obviously had much practice at settling sharks.

雌性海豚逼近他，其中一只领队的雌海豚显然有对付鲨鱼的丰富经验。
The challenger is gaining ground on the leader.
Tiǎozhànzhě zhèngzài bījìn lǐngxiānzhě。
挑战者正在逼近领先者。
An hour after dark，the bulk of a ridge loomed up before them.
Tiānhēi yì xiǎoshí hòu，jùdà de shānjǐ cháo tāmen miànqián bījìn guòlái。
天黑一小时后，巨大的山脊朝他们面前逼近过来。
The marshal slowly moved in on the suspect.
Zhège jūnguān mànmàn xiàng yífàn bījìn。
这个军官慢慢向疑犯逼近。
The soldiers were pressing in on the enemy.
Shìbīngmen zhèng bījìn díjūn。
士兵们正逼近敌军。
He could see the sharks closing in on him.
Tā kěyǐ kàndào shāyú xiàng tā bījìn。
他可以看到鲨鱼向他逼近。
They gained ground step by step.
Tāmen zhúbù bījìn。
他们逐步逼近。

竞争将他们逼到了绝境。
提高执法人员素质，可以避免逼供信现象的发生。
Tígāo zhífǎ rényuán sùzhì，kěyǐ bìmiǎn bīgòngxìn xiàn xiàng de fāshēng。
By improving the quality of the law-enforcement staff we can avoid the occurrence of extorted a confessions.

bī mǒurén zhāogòng

bī mǒurén zhāogòng

步步进逼
bùbù jìnbī 
press forward steadily

bùbù jǐn bī

The usurer forced her father to pay back the debt at once.
他动不动就对别人横加指责，气势逼人。
Tā dòngbudòngjiù duì biérén héngjiā zhǐzé，qìshì bīrén。
He\'s always making unwarranted accusations against others. His manner is intolerably aggressive.
我并不想来，是被强逼着来的。
Wǒ bìngbùxiǎnglái，shì bèi qiángbī zhe lái de。
I didn\'t want to come; I was forced to.

quán chǎng jǐnbī

xíngxùn bīgòng

bī de zǒutóuwúlù

bīhuán zūzhài

逼债
bīzhài
press for payment of debts; dun
威逼
wēibī
threaten by force; coerce; intimidate

In the championship, our school was forced to a tie.

He kept calling to me to ask me to do a task that I could not do.
这场球赛双方队员都很积极，场上逼抢十分激烈。
Zhèchǎng qiúsài shuāngfāng duìyuán dōu hěnjījí，chǎng shàng bīqiǎng shífēn jīliè。
Players from both teams were quite active that day, the play was marked by fierce competition.
竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
他被债主逼得走投无路，蹈海而亡。
Tā bèi zhàizhǔ bī de zǒutóu wúlù，dǎohǎi ér wáng。
He drowned himself in the sea after having been driven to the wall by his creditors.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。

The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
那些秦始皇兵马俑的方阵整齐，气势逼人。
Nàxiē Qínshǐhuáng bīngmǎyǒng de fāngzhèn zhěngqí，qìshì bīrén。
The Sculpture Legion in the Museum of Chin Shi Huang\'s mausoleum is full of power and grandeur.

《Hónglóumèng》（Cáo Xuěqín）dìshíqīhuí：“yìnián sānbǎi liùshírì，fēngdāo shuāngjiàn yánxiāngbī。”
&quot;I am surrounded by the knives of wind and swords of frost 360 days a year.&quot;--A Dream of the Red Chamber, chapter 17.
他通常使用徽墨来绘画，这样的画十分逼真。
Tā tōngcháng shǐyòng huīmò lái huìhuà，zhèyàng de huà shífēn bīzhēn。
He usually paints with Huizhou ink, which makes the paintings look very real.
这匹马被画得活龙活现，十分逼真。

This horse was painted vividly, true to life.
连日的降水使这条河流水位直逼警戒水位线。

The precipitaion of recent days has raised the water level almost to the warning line.
我军已直逼敌军的警戒线。
Wǒ jūn yǐ zhíbī díjūn de jǐngjièxiàn。
We are heading to our enemy\'s front line.
古代，穷苦百姓抗捐多是因为被逼无奈。
Gǔdài，qióngkǔ bǎixìng kàngjuān duōshì yīnwèi bèibī wúnài。
In ancient times, poor common people fought against unreasonable levies because they had no other choice.
清政府黑暗软弱，再加上税赋沉重，曾经逼得各地农民不断地抗粮起义。
Qīngzhèngfǔ hēi\'àn ruǎnruò，zài jiāshàng shuìfù chénzhòng，céngjīng bīdé gè dì nóngmín búduàn de kàngliáng qǐyì。
The government of the Qing Dynasty was corrupt and weak and also had heavy levies. Farmers from all over China rose up in revolt and resisted the grain levy one after another.
在秦朝的苛法逼迫下，终于发生了农民起义。
Zài Qíncháo de kēfǎ bīpò xià，zhōng yú fāshēng le nóngmín qǐyì。
The peasants were constrained by the harsh laws of the Qin Dynasty and staged an uprising.
借助珂啍版印刷术，我们复制出了几幅完美逼真的敦煌壁画。
Jièzhù kēhēngbǎn yìnshuāshù，wǒmen fùzhì chū le jǐ fú wánměi bīzhēn de dūnhuáng bìhuà。
With the help of collotype printing, we copied several Dunhuang frescoes, which are quite similar to the originals.
你这样凌逼百姓，早晚是要受到惩罚的。
Nǐ zhèyàng língbī bǎixìng，zǎowǎn shì yào shòudào chéngfá de。
You will be punished sooner or later for persecuting the common people.
债主三番两次地前来讨债，都快把他逼急了。
Zhàizhǔ sānfānliǎngcì de qiánlai tǎozhài，dōu kuài bǎ tā bījí le。
The renters came for debts again and again, which almost drove him crazy.

[inf] 逼得某人发疯
to put the screw(s) on
[inf] 威逼
to screw sth out of sb
[esp BRIT] [inf] 逼迫某人拿出某物
true to life
逼真的

在聚会上汉娜和托尼对质，逼他说出和自己分手的原因。

敌人围困了这个城，想逼他们投降。

她顶头上司的恶劣态度把她逼到了发怒的边缘。

这幅画很逼真。

kāikěn huānɡshān
bring barren hills under cultivation

最大的移民发生在1846年开始的饥荒之后。
We opened up large tracts of wasteland.
我们开垦了大片荒地。
The once inhospitable landscape is now tamed.
Nà céngjīng huāngliáng de tǔdì xiànzài yǐjīng bèi kāikěn chūlái le。
那曾经荒凉的土地现在已经被开垦出来了。
This silly excuse won\'t wash in traffic court.
Zhèzhǒng huāngtáng de jièkǒu zài jiāotōngfǎtíng shàng bù néng bāng nǐ kāituō。
这种荒唐的借口在交通法庭上不能帮你开脱。
The large desert land is waiting for exploration and exploitation.
大面积的荒无人烟的土地等待着人们的探索和开发。
Of those who survived the famine，many were forced to emigrate to greener pastures.
Nàxiē zài jīhuāng zhōng cúnhuó xiàlái de rén，hěn duō dōu bèipò qiānjū dào wèijiā kāikěn de cǎoyuán shàng。
那些在饥荒中存活下来的人，很多都被迫迁居到未加开垦的草原上。
在荒原上开拓出大片农田
zài huāngyuán shàngkāituò chū dà piàn nóngtián
open up large areas of wasteland and turn them into farmland
他的这幅画很有意思：空漠的荒原上只有一串人的脚印。
Tā de zhèfúhuà hěnyǒu yìsi：kōngmò de huāngyuán shàng zhǐyǒu yíchuàn rén de jiǎoyìn。
His painting is very interesting: an empty desert with a string of footprints.
漠北的荒原上很少有树木和草。
Mòběi de huāngyuán shàng hěnshǎo yǒu shùmù hé cǎo。
There are few trees, and grass on the wasteland south of the desert in Mongolia.
荒漠的草原
huāngmò de cǎoyuán 
desolate and boundless grasslands

Today the old wasteland is a forest of skyscrapers.
把荒漠变为绿色的原野
bǎ huāngmò biànwéi lǜsè de yuányě 
turn the wilderness into green fields
原本肥沃的土地由于失去了肥力被人们荒弃了。
Yuánběn féiwò de tǔdì yóuyú shīqù le féilì bèi rénmen huāngqì le。
The former fertile land was deserted by people because of the loss of fertility.
莽莽荒原。
过量放牧导致草原荒漠化。

原是一片荒地。
这里原先是一片荒滩，而今变成了林区
The barren icy wasteland slowly warmed to become thick woodland.
Bīngxuě fùgài de huāngyuán zhújiàn nuǎnhuó qǐlái，biànchéngle nóngmì de líndì。
冰雪覆盖的荒原逐渐暖和起来，变成了浓密的林地。
Only in winter the wolf emerged to stalk the snow wastes and the bare forest for prey.
Zhǐyǒu zài dōngtiān，láng cáihuì zài jīxuě huāngyuán hé guāngtūtū de sēnlín zhōng sōubǔ lièwù。
只有在冬天，狼才会在积雪荒原和光秃秃的森林中搜捕猎物。
Many flowers of the heath grow on the central plateau.

许多荒原上的花儿在中央高地上生长。

huāngwúrényān de dìdài

何其荒唐！
Héqí huāngtáng！
How absurd!
荒唐可笑
huāngtángkěxiào 
ridiculous; absurd
荒唐透顶
huānɡtánɡ tòudǐnɡ 
absolutely ridiculous; preposterous
他对这个问题的看法极其荒唐。
Tā duì zhège wèntí de kànfǎ jíqí huāngtáng。
His views on this subject are absolutely ridiculous.
近于荒唐
jìn yú huānɡtánɡ
little short of preposterous; bordering on the absurd
他的讲话真荒唐，但有很多人随声附和。
Tā de jiǎnghuà zhēn huāngtáng，dàn yǒu hěnduō rén suíshēngfùhè。
What he says is ridiculous, yet many people echo his words.
荒唐可笑。
生活十分荒唐。
What nonsense!
多么荒唐的话！
the decision was a joke
[inf] 这个决定真是荒唐
it is ludicrous to suggest that...
建议…真是荒唐
it\'s ludicrous that...
…真是荒唐

Wúfǎ zìyóu sīkǎo dǎozhì huāngtáng de xìnyǎng hé míxìn。
无法自由思考导致荒唐的信仰和迷信。
His assumption that he\'s the best is ridciulous.
Tā rènwéi zìjǐ zuì yōuxiù de xiǎngfǎ shì huāngtángkěxiào de。
他认为自己最优秀的想法是荒唐可笑的。
Do not censor any thoughts, however ridiculous they might sound
Búyào shěnchá rènhé xiǎngfǎ，jǐnguǎn zhèxiē xiǎngfǎ tīng qǐlái kěnéng hěn huāngtáng。
不要审查任何想法，尽管这些想法听起来可能很荒唐。
You\'ve just wakened me from the most ridiculous dream.
Nǐ gāng bǎ wǒ cóng zuì huāngtáng de mèngzhōng jiàoxǐng。
你刚把我从最荒唐的梦中叫醒。
We have to make a stand against this ridiculous scheme.
Wǒmen bìxū fǎnduì zhège huāngtáng de jìhuà。

This silly excuse won\'t wash in traffic court.

Shìtú jiàchē chuānyuè bàofēngxuě jiǎnzhí shì huāngtáng zhī jí。
试图驾车穿越暴风雪简直是荒唐之极。
It was an over-the-top experience.
Zhè shì yí cì huāngtáng de jīnglì。
这是一次荒唐的经历。

去适应一个荒唐的社会简直愚不可及。
That\'s a cockeyed idea.

the frozen polar wastes
严寒的南(或北)极荒地
《聊斋志异》所记鬼怪故事诚属荒诞不经，然而却能引人入胜，多年来为无数读者所喜爱。
《Liáozhāi ZhìYì》suǒ jì guǐguàigùshì chéngshǔ huāngdànbùjīng，rán\'ér quènéng yǐnrénrùshèng，duōniánlái wéi wúshù dúzhě suǒxǐ\'ài。
Though admittedly wild and fanciful, the ghost stories of the Liao Zhai Zhi Yi have a beauty that has captivated countless readers over the years.
我们打算复垦这块儿荒地。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn fùkěn zhè kuàir huāngdì。
We plan to dig up the wasteland.
去年垦种的荒地，今年都有了很好的收获呢！
Qùnián kěnzhòng de huāngdì，jīnnián dōu yǒu le hěnhǎo de shōuhuò ne！
All the wasteland opened up last year will have a good harvest this year.
他俩在婚礼上发誓要相爱到天荒地老。
Tā liǎ zài hūnlǐ shàng fāshì yào xiāngài dào tiānhuāng dìlǎo。
The two vowed in their wedding ceremony that they would love each other forever.
村民们利用先进设备拓垦荒地，成绩显著。
Cūnmínmen lìyòng xiānjìn shèbèi tuòkěn huāngdì，chéngjì xiǎnzhù。
The villagers used advanced instruments to open up wasteland, and have achieved notable results.
他破天荒地给妻子买了一束玫瑰。
Tā pòtiānhuāng de gěi qīzǐ mǎile yíshù méiguī.
In an unprecedented move, he bought his wife a bouquet of roses.
这一带经济落后，尚是一片蛮荒之地。

This area is under-developed, it is an uncivilized region.
地荒了。
Dì huāng le。
The land lies waste.
我们村里没有一亩地是荒废的。
Wǒmen cūn lǐ méiyǒu yì mǔ dì shì huāngfèi de。
Not a single mu of land in our village lies waste.
这些耕地丢荒了，真让人可惜。

It is a pity to let this cultivated land lie idle.
此地粮荒严重，政府已经在调拨救济粮了。

荒无人烟的地带
huāngwúrényān de dìdài 
a region with no sign of human habitation

Farmers in this area are faced with the problem of reclaiming alkaline waste land.
这片土地已经撂荒好几年了。
Zhè piàn tǔdì yǐjing liàohuāng hǎo jǐnián le。
The field has been wasted for years.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。

这部小说真实地反映了拓荒者的生活。

This novel gives a faithful representation of (or is a mirror of) the life of the pioneers.

desolate and boundless grasslands
漠北的荒原上很少有树木和草。
Mòběi de huāngyuán shàng hěnshǎo yǒu shùmù hé cǎo。
There are few trees, and grass on the wasteland south of the desert in Mongolia.
荒草蓬乱。
田园荒芜，蒿草丛生。
那块地再不锄，就要闹草荒了
过量放牧导致草原荒漠化。
大灾之年，靠树皮草根度荒
Of those who survived the famine，many were forced to emigrate to greener pastures.
Nàxiē zài jīhuāng zhōng cúnhuó xiàlái de rén，hěn duō dōu bèipò qiānjū dào wèijiā kāikěn de cǎoyuán shàng。
那些在饥荒中存活下来的人，很多都被迫迁居到未加开垦的草原上。
把荒漠变为绿色的原野
bǎ huāngmò biànwéi lǜsè de yuányě 
turn the wilderness into green fields
储粮备荒
chǔliánɡ bèihuānɡ 
store up grain against natural disasters
这部小说真实地反映了拓荒者的生活。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō zhēnshí de fǎnyìng le tuòhuāngzhě de shēnghuó。
This novel gives a faithful representation of (or is a mirror of) the life of the pioneers.
何其荒唐！
Héqí huāngtáng！
How absurd!
洪荒时代
hónɡhuānɡ shídài
primeval ages; remote antiquity
地荒了。
Dì huāng le。
The land lies waste.
别把功课荒了。
Bié bǎ gōngkè huāng le。
Don\'t neglect your lessons.
好久不下棋，荒了。
Hǎojiǔ bú xiàqí，huāng le。
It\'s a long time since I played chess. I\'m out of practice.
他的英语荒掉了。
Tā de yīngyǔ huāngdiào le。
His English is rusty.
荒诞的想法
huāngdàn de xiǎngfǎ 
a fantastic idea
荒诞的情节
huāngdàn de qíngjié 
an incredible plot
《聊斋志异》所记鬼怪故事诚属荒诞不经，然而却能引人入胜，多年来为无数读者所喜爱。
《Liáozhāi ZhìYì》suǒ jì guǐguàigùshì chéngshǔ huāngdànbùjīng，rán\'ér quènéng yǐnrénrùshèng，duōniánlái wéi wúshù dúzhě suǒxǐ\'ài。
Though admittedly wild and fanciful, the ghost stories of the Liao Zhai Zhi Yi have a beauty that has captivated countless readers over the years.
荒诞无稽之谈
huāngdàn wújī zhī tán 
a tall story; a preposterous statement
我们村里没有一亩地是荒废的。
Wǒmen cūn lǐ méiyǒu yì mǔ dì shì huāngfèi de。
Not a single mu of land in our village lies waste.
这所别墅荒废已久。
Zhè suǒ biéshù huāngfèi yǐ jiǔ。
This villa has long fallen into disuse.
她一边说话一边干活，不肯荒废半点功夫。
Tā yìbiān shuōhuà yìbiān gànhuó，bùkěn huāngfèi bàn diǎn gōngfu。
She worked while she chatted, not wasting a single moment.
荒废学业
huānɡfèi xuéyè 
neglect one\'s studies
一片荒凉
yí piàn huāngliáng
a scene of desolation
过去这里是荒凉的穷山沟。
Guòqù zhèlǐ shì huāngliáng de qióngshāngōu。
This used to be a bleak and barren gully.
荒凉的景色
huāngliáng de jǐngsè 
wild scenery
荒谬的说法
huāngmiù de shuōfǎ 
an absurd formulation
这种评论荒谬绝伦。
Zhèzhǒng pínglùn huāngmiùjuélún。
This comment is absolutely preposterous.
荒漠的草原
huāngmò de cǎoyuán 
desolate and boundless grasslands
荒僻的山区
huāngpì de shānqū 
a desolate mountain area
荒时暴月，他们就向亲友乞哀告怜。
Huāngshíbàoyuè，tāmen jiù xiàng qīnyǒu qǐ\'āigàolián。
In hard times, they piteously beg help from relatives and friends.
好多年不拉提琴了，现在都已荒疏了。
Hǎoduō nián bùlā tíqín le，xiànzài dōu yǐ huāngshū le。
I\'m out of practice since I haven\'t played the violin for many years.
因为长期居住国外，我的汉语有点荒疏了。
Yīnwèi chángqī jūzhù guówài，wǒ de hànyǔ yǒu diǎn huāngshū le。
My Chinese is a little rusty after a long residence abroad.
荒唐可笑
huāngtángkěxiào 
ridiculous; absurd
荒唐透顶
huānɡtánɡ tòudǐnɡ 
absolutely ridiculous; preposterous
荒无人烟的地带
huāngwúrényān de dìdài 
a region with no sign of human habitation
由于连年战乱，百姓流离，田园荒芜。
Yóuyú liánnián zhànluàn, bǎixìnɡ liúlí, tiányuán huānɡwú。
Owing to long years of war, people left their homes and the land was allowed to lie waste.
过着荒淫无耻的生活
guò zhe huāngyínwúchǐ de shēnghuó 
lead a life of shameless dissipation
有些设备一次未用就被荒置在露天里。
Yǒu xiē shèbèi yícì wèi yòngjiù bèi huāngzhì zài lùtiān lǐ。
Some equipment was dumped in the open and never used.
过着荒淫无耻、昏天黑地的生活
guò zhe huāngyínwúchǐ、hūntiānhēidì de shēnghuó 
lead an immoral life, given to dissipation and sensuality
一九三四年中国发生过一次大饥荒。
Yījiǔsānsì nián Zhōngguó fāshēngguo yícì dà jīhuāng。
In 1934, there was a severe famine in China.
解放前我家月月闹饥荒。
Jiěfàngqián wǒjiā yuèyuè nào jīhuāng。
Before liberation my family ran short of cash month after month.
他对这个问题的看法极其荒唐。
Tā duì zhège wèntí de kànfǎ jíqí huāngtáng。
His views on this subject are absolutely ridiculous.
近乎荒谬的论点
jìnhū huāngmiù de lùndiǎn
an argument little short of being ridiculous; an argument bordering on the absurd
近于荒唐
jìn yú huānɡtánɡ
little short of preposterous; bordering on the absurd
生产救荒
shēnɡchǎn jiùhuānɡ
tide over a crop failure by production
开垦荒山
kāikěn huānɡshān
bring barren hills under cultivation
在荒原上开拓出大片农田
zài huāngyuán shàngkāituò chū dà piàn nóngtián
open up large areas of wasteland and turn them into farmland
要好好用功，不可荒废课业。
Yào hǎohāo yònggōng，bùkě huāngfèi kèyè。
Study hard and never neglect schoolwork.
他们的荒谬提案理所当然地被否决了。
Tāmen de huāngmiù tí\'àn lǐsuǒdāngrán de bèi fǒujué le。
Of course their absurd proposal was rejected.
荒谬的论调
huāngmiù de lùndiào 
an absurd argument
满目荒凉。
Mǎnmù huāngliáng。
A scene of desolation met the eye on every side.
快到发工资那几天他就闹饥荒。
Kuài dào fā gōngzī nà jǐtiān tā jiù nào jīhuāng。
He\'s always hard up before payday.
荒丘
huāngqiū
a barren hillock
拓荒者
tuòhuāngzhě 
pioneer; pathbreaker; trailblazer
荒谬到了无以复加的地步
huāngmiù dào le wúyǐfùjiā de dìbù
be absurd in the extreme
昔日荒坡，今日良田。
Xīrì huānɡpō, jīnrì liánɡtián。 
The once barren hillsides are now good farmland.
这里以往是一片荒野。
Zhèlǐ yǐwǎngshì yípiàn huāngyě。
This place used to be a vast expanse of wasteland.
去年他老家闹了灾荒。
Qùnián tā lǎojiā nào le zāihuāng。
Famine hit his home district last year.
贮粮备荒
zhù liánɡ bèi huānɡ 
store grain against a lean year
荒诞
huāngdàn
fantastic; absurd; incredible
荒村
huāngcūn
a deserted village
荒年
huāngnián
famine (or lean) year
荒谬
huāngmiù
absurd; preposterous
垦荒
kěnhuāng
reclaim wasteland; bring wasteland under cultivation; open up virgin soil
荒芜
huāngwú
lie waste; go out of cultivation
过度的放牧使该地区被覆遭到破坏，土地开始荒漠化。
Guòdù de fàngmù shǐ gāi dìqū bèifù zāodào pòhuài，tǔdì kāishǐ huāngmòhuà。
Over-grazing has damaged the vegetation cover of this area, and the land is beginning to show signs of desertification.
连年兵革，这里早已人烟荒芜。
Liánnián bīnggé，zhèlǐ zǎo yǐ rényān huāngwú。
The war went on for years, and made the place deserted.
经过近十年的努力，这座荒山现在已经绿树成林了。
Jīngguò jìn shínián de nǔlì，zhè zuò huāngshān xiànzài yǐjing lǜshù chénglín le。
After ten years of hard work, the barren hill is now covered with green tress.
解放前，每年都有因为春荒饿死的人。
Jiěfàng qián，měinián dōu yǒu yīnwèi chūnhuāng èsǐ de rén。
Before liberation, there were people dying from spring famine every year.
就是打饥荒，也得供孩子上学。
Jiùshì dǎ jīhuāng，yě děi gōng háizi shàngxué。
Even if the family is in debt, the parents have to paying for the children\'s schooling.
即使等到地老天荒，他也决不放弃。
Jíshǐ děng dào dìlǎo tiānhuāng，tā yě juébú fàngqì。
He will never give up, even if wait for eternity.
这些耕地丢荒了，真让人可惜。
Zhèxiē gēngdì diūhuāng le，zhēn ràngrén kěxī。
It is a pity to let this cultivated land lie idle.
由于饥荒，经常有人在街上冻馁而死。
Yóuyú jīhuāng，jīngcháng yǒurén zài jiēshàng dòngněi ér sǐ。
Often there are people who die of hunger and exposure in the street.
我们打算复垦这块儿荒地。
Wǒmen dǎsuàn fùkěn zhè kuàir huāngdì。
We plan to dig up the wasteland.
他这种行为简直是荒诞不经。
Tā zhèzhǒng xíngwéi jiǎnzhí shì huāngdàn bùjīng。
His behavior is so ridiculous.
他的尸体被丢在荒沟中，无人认领。
Tā de shītǐ bèi diūzài huānggōu zhōng，wúrén rènlǐng。
His corpse was abandoned in a deserted ditch, and no one claimed it.
这部科幻小说讲述的是主人公回到荒古时代的所见所感。
Zhèbù kēhuàn xiǎoshuō jiǎngshù de shì zhǔréngōng huídào huānggǔ shídài de suǒjiàn suǒgǎn。
This sci-fi told about the feelings and findings of the dramatis personae\' who had gone back to the remote antiquity times.
他不愿回到荒寂的家乡，因为那里实在是太穷了。
Tā búyuàn huídào huāngjì de jiāxiāng，yīnwèi nàlǐ shízai shì tài qióng le。
He was unwilling to return to his desolate and bleak hometown because it was too poor.
村民把荒坡进行了开发，将其用于种植果树。
Cūnmín bǎ huāngpō jìnxíng le kāifā，jiāng qí yòngyú zhòngzhí guǒshù。
The villagers have cultivated the deserted sloping field to plant fruit trees.
原本肥沃的土地由于失去了肥力被人们荒弃了。
Yuánběn féiwò de tǔdì yóuyú shīqù le féilì bèi rénmen huāngqì le。
The former fertile land was deserted by people because of the loss of fertility.
人们在荒丘上种植了树木，以减少水土流失。
Rénmen zài huāngqiū shàng zhòngzhí le shùmù，yǐ jiǎnshǎo shuǐtǔ liúshī。
People planted trees on the waste hills to decrease water and soil loss.
仙人掌可以在荒沙中成活并且繁衍生长。
Xiānrénzhǎng kěyǐ zài huāngshā zhōng chénghuó bìngqiě fányǎn shēngzhǎng。
Cactus can survive, and multiply in desolate deserts.
战败后，败兵们纷纷逃入了荒山秃岭。
Zhànbài hòu，bàibīngmen fēnfēn táorù le huāngshān tūlǐng。
After losing the bell, the defeated soldiers escaped in succession into the bald hills.
科学家研究了一种生态治理模式能让荒滩变为绿洲。
Kēxuéjiā yánjiū le yìzhǒng shēngtài zhìlǐ móshì néng ràng huāngtān biànwéi lǜzhōu。
Scientists have studied on a zoology fathering mode which can turn deserted bottomland into an oasis.
开垦碱荒成了这个地区农民的难事。
Kāikěn jiǎnhuāng chéng le zhège dìqū nóngmín de nánshì。
Farmers in this area are faced with the problem of reclaiming alkaline waste land.
去年垦种的荒地，今年都有了很好的收获呢！
Qùnián kěnzhòng de huāngdì，jīnnián dōu yǒu le hěnhǎo de shōuhuò ne！
All the wasteland opened up last year will have a good harvest this year.
他的这幅画很有意思：空漠的荒原上只有一串人的脚印。
Tā de zhèfúhuà hěnyǒu yìsi：kōngmò de huāngyuán shàng zhǐyǒu yíchuàn rén de jiǎoyìn。
His painting is very interesting: an empty desert with a string of footprints.
年底不能拉饥荒呀！还有这么多工人等着发工资呢！
Niándǐ bùnéng lājīhuāng ya！Háiyǒu zhèmeduō gōngrén děng zhe fā gōngzī ne！
The company can not be in debt at the end of the year, because so many people are waiting for their salaries!
此地粮荒严重，政府已经在调拨救济粮了。
Cǐdì liánghuāng yánzhòng，zhèngfǔ yǐjing zài diàobō jiùjìliáng le。
Famine here is very serious. The government has already given out  relieving grain to this area.
这片土地已经撂荒好几年了。
Zhè piàn tǔdì yǐjing liàohuāng hǎo jǐnián le。
The field has been wasted for years.
警察一声喝斥，吓得犯罪分子落荒而逃。
Jǐngchá yìshēng hēchì，xià de fànzuìfènzǐ luòhuāng ér táo。
The criminals fled in panic after the shout of the police.
几百万年前，人类还处在蛮荒时代。
Jǐ bǎi wàn niánqián，rénlèi hái chǔzài mánhuāng shídài。
Millions of years ago, human beings were in barbarous age.
这一带经济落后，尚是一片蛮荒之地。
Zhè yídài jīngjì luòhòu，shàngshì yípiàn mánhuāng zhī dì。
This area is under-developed, it is an uncivilized region.
漠北的荒原上很少有树木和草。
Mòběi de huāngyuán shàng hěnshǎo yǒu shùmù hé cǎo。
There are few trees, and grass on the wasteland south of the desert in Mongolia.
这五万貔貅之师将十万敌军打得落荒而逃。
Zhè wǔwàn píqiū zhī shī jiāng shíwàn díjūn dǎ de luòhuāng ér táo。
The enemy, with a hundred thousand soldiers, were defeated by the brave troops, with only fifty thousand soldiers, and fled the battlefield.
灾荒年月，饿死的黔首成千上万。
Zāihuāng niányuè，èsǐ de qiánshǒu chéngqiān shàngwàn。
In these famine years, tens of thousands of common people starved to death.
我们要最大限度地开发山荒来种植粮食。
Wǒmen yào zuì dà xiàndù de kāifā shānhuāng lái zhòngzhí liángshi。
We will exploit the waste land on the mountain by planting the maximum possible crops.
他俩在婚礼上发誓要相爱到天荒地老。
Tā liǎ zài hūnlǐ shàng fāshì yào xiāngài dào tiānhuāng dìlǎo。
The two vowed in their wedding ceremony that they would love each other forever.
我们要勇于尝试，做前沿学科的拓荒者。
Wǒmen yào yǒngyú chángshì，zuò qiányán xuékē de tuòhuāngzhě。
We should be brave to try new things, and be pioneers in those advanced subjects.
村民们利用先进设备拓垦荒地，成绩显著。
Cūnmínmen lìyòng xiānjìn shèbèi tuòkěn huāngdì，chéngjì xiǎnzhù。
The villagers used advanced instruments to open up wasteland, and have achieved notable results.
见到我军主力，敌人亡魂丧胆，落荒而逃。
Jiàndào wǒ jūn zhǔlì，dírén wánghún sàngdǎn，luòhuāng ér táo。
Seeing the main force of our army, the enemies were terror-stricken and fled.
寻找了好久，我终于在荒山上看到了於菟。
Xúnzhǎo le hǎo jiǔ，wǒ zhōng yú zài huāngshān shàng kàndào le yútú。
Having searched for a long time, I finally spotted a tiger in the mountain.
落荒而逃的敌人隐避在大别山深处。
Luòhuāng értáo de dírén yǐnbì zài Dàbiéshān shēnchù。
The runaway enemy is hiding in the the deep jungles of Dabie Mountain.
这部小说让读者觉得荒诞之极。
Zhèbù xiǎoshuō ràng dúzhě juédé huāngdàn zhī jí。
The readers feel that this fiction is very ridiculous.
年年采伐导致这里只剩下濯濯荒山了。
Niánnián cǎifá dǎozhì zhèlǐ zhǐ shèngxià zhuózhuó huāngshān le。
Continuous lumbering has changed this place into bare mountains.
这个皇帝暴戾恣睢，荒淫无度。
Zhège huángdì bàolì zìsuī，huāngyín wúdù。
The emperor is reckless and debauched.
他毕业后选择了坐机关，荒废了自己在学校学的技术。
Tā bìyè hòu xuǎnzé le zuò jīguān，huāngfèi le zìjǐ zài xuéxiào xué de jìshù。
After the graduation, he chose to work in an office, and wasted the skills he had learned in school.
这些学生天天吸烟喝酒，长此以往肯定荒废学业。
Zhèxiēxuésheng tiāntiān xīyānhējiǔ，chángcǐyǐwǎng kěndìng huāngfèixuéyè。
These students smoke and drink every day – if they carry on this way they\'ll certainly neglect their studies.
原本荒凉的郊外，而今已是高楼林立。
Yuánběn huāngliángde jiāowài，érjīn yǐshì gāolóulínlì。
Today the old wasteland is a forest of skyscrapers.
真是荒谬之极。
Zhēnshì huāngmiù zhī jí.
This is absurd in the extreme.
绿化荒山
lǜhuàhuāngshān
plant trees on the mountains
小报凭空捏造最荒谬的新闻。
Xiǎobào píngkōng niēzào zuì huāngmiù de xīnwén.
The tabloids make up the most ridiculous stories out of thin air.
他破天荒地给妻子买了一束玫瑰。
Tā pòtiānhuāng de gěi qīzǐ mǎile yíshù méiguī.
In an unprecedented move, he bought his wife a bouquet of roses.
他的讲话真荒唐，但有很多人随声附和。
Tā de jiǎnghuà zhēn huāngtáng，dàn yǒu hěnduō rén suíshēngfùhè。
What he says is ridiculous, yet many people echo his words.
荒冢。
储粮备荒

荒滩
荒僻。

荒诞。
荒淫。

荒谬绝伦。
荒谬

生荒地
荒疏。
荒山秃岭。
拓荒。
荒芜。
原是一片荒地。
连年灾荒，哀鸿满路。
暴尸荒郊。
兵事频仍，田园荒芜。
闹春荒
春荒时借下的债。

储粮备荒
chǔliánɡ bèihuānɡ 
store up grain against natural disasters
贮粮备荒
zhù liánɡ bèi huānɡ 
store grain against a lean year
村民们利用先进设备拓垦荒地，成绩显著。
Cūnmínmen lìyòng xiānjìn shèbèi tuòkěn huāngdì，chéngjì xiǎnzhù。
The villagers used advanced instruments to open up wasteland, and have achieved notable results.
有些设备一次未用就被荒置在露天里。
Yǒu xiē shèbèi yícì wèi yòngjiù bèi huāngzhì zài lùtiān lǐ。
Some equipment was dumped in the open and never used.

存粮备荒。
丰年不忘备荒。

开辟专栏
kāipì zhuānlán
start a special column (in a newspaper, etc.)
另辟专栏
lìngpì zhuānlán
start a new column (in a newspaper, etc.)
书评专栏
shūpínɡ zhuānlán 
book review column; book reviews

我们提议先增加贷款以求扩大需求。
The business was growing very rapidly and expanding abroad.
Gāi yèwù zēngzhǎng shífēn xùnsù，dōu kuòzhāng dàole hǎiwài。
该业务增长十分迅速，都扩张到了海外。
This expansion of education has not brought about a similar increase in social mobility.
Jiàoyù de kuòzhāng bìngwèi zài shèhuì liúdòngxìng fāngmiàn yǐnqǐ xiāngsì de zēngzhǎng。
教育的扩张并未在社会流动性方面引起相似的增长。
彩色扩印。
安装扩音器
ānzhuāng kuòyīnqì 
set up a megaphone
扩音器不响了。
Kuòyīnqì bùxiǎng le。
The loudspeaker\'s stopped working.
这个扩大器的声音很大，有点闹了！
Zhège kuòdàqì de shēngyīn hěndà，yǒu diǎn nào le！
The loudspeaker is too loud and thus a bit noisy.
老年人常用的助听器里就有扩音机。
Lǎoniánrén cháng yòng de zhùtīngqì lǐ jiù yǒu kuòyīnjī。
Hearing aids, frequently used by the old, contain loudspeakers in them.
His name was paged over the speakers.
Kuòyīnqì lǐ zài hǎn tā de míngzi。
扩音器里在喊他的名字。
She tended to blast when speaking into a microphone.
Duìzhe kuòyīnqì jiǎnghuà shí，tā de shēngyīn dà de xiàng bàozhà yíyàng。
对着扩音器讲话时，她的声音大得像爆炸一样。

kuòsàn yáoyán
spread rumours
扩散影响
kuòsán yǐngxiǎng
extend influence
不让废气扩散
bú ràng fèiqì kuòsán
prevent the diffusion of waste gas
病菌扩散
bìngjūn kuòsán
proliferation of germs
防止疾病扩散
fángzhǐ jíbìng kuòsàn
prevent disease from spreading
防止核扩散。
癌细胞已经扩散
化工厂排放的污染物不断扩散。
The medicine is only a stay of the expanding tumor cells.
这种药只能延缓癌细胞的扩散。
Cancer is a disease characterised by the rapid and uncontrolled proliferation of cells.
Áizhèng shì yì zhǒng yǐ xìbāo xùnsù qiě wúfǎ kòngzhì de kuòsàn wéi tèzhēng de jíbìng。
癌症是一种以细胞迅速且无法控制地扩散为特征的疾病。
A little wave rippled over her feet, then another.
Tā jiǎobiān jīqǐle yìquān xìxiǎo de shuǐbō，ránhòu yìquān yòu yìquān de kuòsàn kāi qù。
她脚边激起了一圈细小的水波，然后一圈又一圈的扩散开去。
They tried to freeze the gangrene from spreading.
Tāmen shìtú zǔzhǐ huàijūbìng jìxù kuòsàn。
他们试图阻止坏疽病继续扩散。
Diffuse the sunlight, do not block it out.
Búyào zhēzhù kuòsàn de yángguāng。
不要遮住扩散的阳光。
Two million gallons of radioactive chemicals have poured out from the nuclear plant.
Liǎngbǎiwàn jiālún fàngshèxìng huàxué wùpǐn yǐ cóng hégōngchǎng lǐ kuòsàn kāilái。
两百万加仑放射性化学物品已从核工厂里扩散开来。
Lung cancer and breast cancer can both spread to the brain.
Fèi\'ái hé rǔxiàn\'ái dōu kěyǐ kuòsàn dào dànǎo。
肺癌和乳腺癌都可以扩散到大脑。
As nuclear weapons proliferate，preventing war becomes imperative.
Suízhe héwǔqì búduàn kuòsàn，zǔzhǐ zhànzhēng yuèláiyuè jǐnpò le。
随着核武器不断扩散，阻止战争越来越紧迫了。
Bigotry is a virus that must not be allowed to spread.
Piānzhí sīxiǎng shì yì zhǒng bìngdú，jué bù yǔnxǔ kuòsàn。
偏执思想是一种病毒，决不允许扩散。
We must not proliferate nuclear arms.
Wǒmen juébùnéng kuòsàn héwǔqì。
我们决不能扩散核武器。
The disease extended into the remote mountain provinces.
Zhè zhǒng jíbìng yìzhí kuòsàn dào piānyuǎn de shānqū shěngfèn。
这种疾病一直扩散到偏远的山区省份。
We must prevent the cancer from spreading.
Wǒmen bìxū fángzhǐ zhèzhǒng áizhèng kuòsàn。
我们必须防止这种癌症扩散。
The movement of a solute down its concentration gradient is called diffusion.
Róngzhì yánzhe nóngdù tīdù róngjiě de yùndòng guòchéng bèi chēngzuò fēnzǐ kuòsàn yùndòng。
溶质沿着浓度梯度溶解的运动过程被称作分子扩散运动。
Metastasis has rendered the tumor inoperable.
Kuòsàn shǐde gāi zhǒngliú wúfǎ zuò shǒushù。
扩散使得该肿瘤无法做手术。
The bacteria quickly aerosolised.
Xìjūn hěn kuài kuòsàn chūqù。
细菌很快扩散出去。
The disease will run on unchecked.
Zhèzhǒng jíbìng jiāng bú shòu xiànzhì de kuòsàn。
这种疾病将不受限制地扩散。
Diffusion is an exergonic process.
Kuòsàn shì shìfàngnéngliàng de guòchéng。
扩散是释放能量的过程。
The cancer had metastasized and the patient could not be saved.
Áixìbāo yǐ kuòsàn，zhè míng huànzhě wúfǎ wǎnjiù le。
癌细胞已扩散，这名患者无法挽救了。
Nuclear disarmament and nonproliferation are closely related goals.
Cáijiǎn héwǔqì hé fángzhǐ hékuòsàn shì mìqiè-xiāngguān de liǎng gè mùbiāo。
裁减核武器和防止核扩散是密切相关的两个目标。
They protested that the nonproliferation treaty was just a plot to maintain the hegemony of those who already had nuclear weapons.
Tāmen biànchēng hé bú kuòsàn tiáoyuē zhǐshì wéihù nàxiē yǐjīng yōngyǒu héwǔqì de guójiā de bàquán de yí gè yīnmóu。
他们辩称核不扩散条约只是维护那些已经拥有核武器的国家的霸权的一个阴谋。
The big challenge is to spread higher incomes across the whole country.
dà de tiǎozhàn shì jiāng jiào gāo de shōurù kuòsàn zhì Quánguógèdì。
大的挑战是将较高的收入扩散至全国各地。
扩军备战
kuòjūn bèizhàn 
arms expansion and war preparations
名义上裁军，实际上扩军
míngyì shàngcáijūn，shíjì shàngkuòjūn
disarmament in name, armament in reality
扩充军备
kuòchōnɡ jūnbèi
engage in arms expansion
扩军备战
扩军
扩军备战。
扩编军队。
During the Crusades, Western Europe tried to contain the spread of Islam.
十字军东征期间，西欧各国设法遏制伊斯兰势力的扩张。
